64b1(mdo sde): 'das mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba skyes so//dga' ba skyes nas/bcom ldan 'das grul ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
64b2(mdo sde): 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir steng du bor nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus pad+ma de shing rta'i phang lo tsam du gyur te/bcom ldan 'das gshegs na ni 'gro'o//zhwa
64b3(mdo sde): na ni sbed do//de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma des cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas/lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
64b4(mdo sde): tu smon lam btab pa/kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang
64b5(mdo sde): zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur
64b6(mdo sde): cig ces byas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' ra ba'i srungs med la bka' stsal pa/bzhin zangs legs lags so//maM los pa'i dus na khyod 'jig rten long ba 'dren
64b7(mdo sde): pa med pa ston pa med par/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu
65a1(mdo sde): gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/blu na ma ga/sgra dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sa sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i bla mya zhes bya bar 'gyur zhes smras so//byung ma//
65a2(mdo sde): gnyis pa ni/gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa de nyid na/kun dga' ra ba srung ba zhig 'dug pa'i mtsho'i nang nas/dus ma yin par pad+ma zhig
65a3(mdo sde): skyes te/de'i blo skyes pa pad ma 'ang bdag gis rgyal po gsal rgyal la dbul bar bya'o//'on tang bdag gi longs spyod chen po dag gi 'byung kung du 'gyur ro snyam nas/de
65a4(mdo sde): khyer te rgyal po'i pho brang du chas te song ngo //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bskyod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/rnam po gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyas pa/ma
65a5(mdo sde): 'dris pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/skye mched drug la mkhas pa/
65a6(mdo sde): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul b+ha/rnam byar thar pa brgyad la byasam gtan pa/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa/dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa to
65a7(mdo sde): stobs dang ldan pa/yang dag par seng ga'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis/
65b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten la gzigs te/su ni rgud/su ni dang /su ni phongs shing 'dug/su ni nyam nga bar 'dug/su ni gnod pa dang ldan/su ni phongs pa dang //nyams dra ba dang gnod pa dang ldan//
65b2(mdo sde): su ni ngan song du gzhol/su ni ngan seMng du 'byag/sun+ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/mtho ris dang thar pa dang /'bras bu la gzhag par bya/su ni nyes par spyod pa'i ldum du bying ba las
65b3(mdo sde): lag nas drang bar bya/su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/su ni dge ba'i rno ba rnams
65b4(mdo sde): bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin po las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i
65b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'bras bu yod par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas//dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid//gdul bar bya ba'i sras
65b6(mdo sde): rnams la//sangs rgyas dus las yal ba med//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa//kun dga'ar ba'i srungs ma dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
65b7(mdo sde): las phyir mi ldog par sems bskyed par 'gyur ro//snyam du dgongs nas/snga dro sham thabs dang /chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas/mnyan du yod par bsod
66a1(mdo sde): snyoms la gshegs so//de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma des/thag ring po zhig nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang /
66a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur to//dga' bar gyur nas bsams pa/bdag gis rgyal po gsal rgyal btang la/bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid kyis mchod
66a3(mdo sde): par bya'o snyam nas/des pad+ma de bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi nam mkha' la bor ba las/bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus pad+ma de shing rta'i phang lo tsam du gyur te/bcom
66a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das gshegs na ni 'gro'o//gzhis na ni sdod do//de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma des cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas/lhag par bcom ldan 'das la shin tu
66a5(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'das na/bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa/ston
66a6(mdo sde): pa med par/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes
66a7(mdo sde): bu gdul bya'i kha lo bsgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/kun
66b1(mdo sde): dga' ra ba'i sgra sa mya de la bka' stsal pa/bzhin bzangs logs so logs so//ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/khyod lag long ba 'dron pa med pa/ston pa med pa/ra banan
66b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa gA/bcom pa yang dgu phyir rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang nabs su ldan pa/bde ba gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/stes bu gdul bya'i khu lo sbyar
66b3(mdo sde): bla na med pa/lce dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bla ma zhes bye bar 'gyur ro//zhes gsung so//lte ba zhes bya ba ni/gling gzhi menyon du yod po na bzhu
66b4(mdo sde): t+ye/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang mnyam pa/rnam zos kyi dri
66b5(mdo sde): nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas te/khyim bdag de yang byams pa'i rang bzhin can/snying rje dang ldan pa sems can la mnyos gshin pa/sbyin pa la skyed pa/ya mtshan can thams cad dang /
66b6(mdo sde): lte ba mtshungs pa/sbyin pa la blo snyoms bya zhig ste/de dus dus su mchod sbyin chen po byed la/bstan bcos spyod pa thams cad kyi zhud spyod par byed de/des bltas na tharas
66b7(mdo sde): cad kyang bdag la ni bstod/gzhan la ni smod par byed pas/de dag gis khyi ma bdag dor sems pa'i'o//de nas phyi zhig ni khyim 'i dag des bcom ldan 'das kyi bsngags pa
67a1(mdo sde): thos nas/de 'di snyam du sems te/des chos thams cad rtogs pa las na/bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin par nges so snyam nas/
67a2(mdo sde): bsngags pa de thos ma thag tu sems bskyed pa/kye ma bcom ldan 'das de bdag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas 'dir gshegs kyang ci ma rung snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
67a3(mdo sde): dgongs pa/bdag gis khyim bdag de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed par bya/dgos la/'di las brten nas gdul bar bya ba phal po che drang du yod do snyam nas/rgyal bu rgyal byed
67a4(mdo sde): kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te/khyim bdag de'i mchod sbyin gyi gnas na bzhugs par gyur to//de nas khyim bdag des thag ring po zhig nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
67a5(mdo sde): mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang dga' bo skyes so//dga' ba skyos nas/bcom ldan 'das sprul ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
67a6(mdo sde): te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//kye mo bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas su gshegs te/longs spyod par mdzad du gsol//de
67a7(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dag slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par
67b1(mdo sde): rig nas/rang gi lhag nas bza' ba dang bca' da gsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim pAr h+ya sa te/tsa ldand pa' stabs nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go//de nas bcom ldan
67b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spro ba bskyed nas/khyim do dag de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'dod pa skyes nas/des sangs rgya
67b3(mdo sde): sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum spyan drangs te/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du yo byad thams cad sbyar nas/sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la'o//
67b4(mdo sde): byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas te/tha ma'i nyin pararo sangs rgyas la sogs pa/dge slong gi dog 'dun rnams lo zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das
67b5(mdo sde): lan bza' 'bum ri ba phul lo//dge slong gzhan dag la ya re re la ras zung re phul nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su smon lam btab ste/kye me dge
67b6(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba'i das na bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa
67b7(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so//
68a1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de la bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag legs so legs so//ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/khyod 'jig rten long ba dran pa
68a2(mdo sde): med pa/ston pa med par/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang /zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa//
68a3(mdo sde): skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das legs mthong zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so///
68a4(mdo sde): bom po sum cu gcig pa/rin po che zhes bya ba ni/glang gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa nas ded dpon zhig gis zong khyer te rgya mtsho chen po'i nang
68a5(mdo sde): du chas so//ded dpon de yang mo ltas gtso bor 'dzin pa zhig ste/des zong rnams rnga mo dang /bong bu la sogs pa la bkal nas/mnyan du yod pa'i phyi sgro chen po'i nang nas
68a6(mdo sde): byung ste/lam po cher zhugs nas/des sems 'di lta bu bskyed de/gal te bdag rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas/nye zho med par bde bar 'os te/rgya mtsho'i gru po che'i don grub nas
68a7(mdo sde): phyir 'khor bar gyur na/sgo 'dir bdag gis sgo'i dus ston bya'o//lam po che 'dir yang lam gya dus ston bya'o//zhes byas nas/rgya mtsho chen por song ngo //de nas de rin po
68b1(mdo sde): che'i gling bgrod pa bsgrubs te/rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas 'gram du byung nas des bsams pa/bdag gru bo chas rgyu margya chen po'i nang du zhugs te/des na bdag gis nor chen ngos
68b2(mdo sde): bsgrubs kyis/bdag gis rgya mtsho'i 'gram 'di nyid du rgya mtsho'i lha rnams dang /gru bo che la gnas pa'i lha rnams la bkur bsti bya'o snyam nas/des rgya mtsho'i 'gram de nyid du lha rnams
68b3(mdo sde): la bkur bsti chen po byas te mnyan du yod par chas so//de nas ngo mthar gyis rgyu zhing song song ba las//mnyan du yod par phyin nas/mnyan du yod par zong rnams bzhag ste/des grong
68b4(mdo sde): khyer gyi phyi sgo chen po do dang /lam po che'i lha rnams la mchod pa chen po byas ni sa/sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams ngag byed pa la zhugs te/des rin po che'i phung po chen po spungs nas//
68b5(mdo sde): dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /spyod pa dang /kun tu rgyu ba dang /sdug cing phongs pa dang /bkris pa rnams la sbyin pa byed pa la zhugs so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgod pa gcig
68b6(mdo sde): bu'i lam ston pa/rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa
68b7(mdo sde): 'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/skye mched drug la mkhas pa/byang chub kyi phan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/mthar gyis
69a1(mdo sde): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsnyoms par 'jug pa/stobs bcu'i stongs dang ldan pa/yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni
69a2(mdo sde): chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/su ni rgud/su ni dang /su ni phongs shing 'dug/su ni
69a3(mdo sde): nyam nga bar gyur/su ni gnod pa dang ldan/su ni phongs pa dang /nyam nga ba dang /gnod pa dang ljon/su ni ngan song du gzhol su ning na sang du 'bag/su ni ngan song du bgasu ni ngas ngan song nas phyung
69a4(mdo sde): mno dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor
69a5(mdo sde): bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par
69a6(mdo sde): bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu yod par bya snyam du ye
69a7(mdo sde): shes gzigs pa 'jug go/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas//dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid//gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la//sangs rgyas dus las yol ba
69b1(mdo sde): med//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ded dpon 'dis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi zlog par sems bskyed par 'gyur ro//snyam du dgongs nas/
69b2(mdo sde): sA do sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/lhung bzad bsnams nas/dge slong mang pos zham ring byas te/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/sgo de nyid nas mnyan du yod/
69b3(mdo sde): pa'i nang du gshegs pa dang /ded dpon des thag ring po zhig nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing spa bar byas pa
69b4(mdo sde): mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang nga bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' ba skyes so//dga' ba skyes nas des rin po che spar gyis btab ste/bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas/de dag
69b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du lding khang lta bur chags te 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das gshegs na ni 'gro//gzhes na ni sdod do//de nas ded dpon des cho 'phrul
69b6(mdo sde): de lta bu mdzong nas/lhag par yang dga' ba skyes so//dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te gsol pa/zla ba gsum gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das dge
69b7(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i na bza' dang //zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams sbyar bar 'tshal nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis
70a1(mdo sde): bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas ded yon da la gnang ngo //de nas ded yon das bcom ldan 'das kyis
70a2(mdo sde): ca mig smra bar gan ba gnas/rgyam thun byed kyi tshal du po byad sems cad m+b+ha hA/sa sa rgyas mi sogs pa da /slong gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum skye bai du la byed
70a3(mdo sde): thams ca kyis bsnyen gla byas nas/zas nyon par smra sa r+g+haM so la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhas byas ro dang ldan pa gsal nas/ ldan 'das
70a4(mdo sde): na bza' 'dum ra ba suM la lo///slong gzhan dgal yang re re la sa zung rardul nas/blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung rgya tu ston lam btub ste/kye me dge ba'i
70a5(mdo sde): pa 'dis na/bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa/ston pa med par/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/
70a6(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/skye dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces
70a7(mdo sde): byas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dod dpon leg sa legs so//ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyod 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa/ston pa med par/
70b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo bsgyur ba/
70b2(mdo sde): bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug tor can zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so//noro zhes bya ba ni/gling gzhi mo nyan du
70b3(mdo sde): yod pa na bzhugs te/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des/thabs zla bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/di de dang spyan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgung spyod pa
70b4(mdo sde): las/phyi zhin de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/de zla ba dgu 'am/bcu lon pa dang /bu gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas
70b5(mdo sde): nas/rigs dang 'thun pa'i mang btags te/de 'o ma dang /zho dang /mar dang //zhun mar dang /mar gyi snying kus bskyes bsrings nas/de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge
70b6(mdo sde): dang /khong rjes dang /shod dgod pa dang /lag rtsis dang /dbyung ba dang /smra ba dang /dgram pa dang /gos byurtag pa dang /nor bu brtag pa dang //rin po che brtag
70b7(mdo sde): pa dang /spos brtag pa dang /spen brtag pa dang /glang po brtag pa dang /rta brtag pa dang /go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te/yi ge mkhas pa dang /klog mkhas pa dang /mdzes
71a1(mdo sde): pa dang /bya ba la gsal ba dang /yid gzhungs pa dang /brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to//de nas phyi zhig na/des zong khyer te/rgya mtsho'i nang
71a2(mdo sde): du song ba las/rgya mtsho'i gru bo che'i don grub nas phyir 'ongs so//khyim bdag des kyang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la brten nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad
71a3(mdo sde): ba rnyed de/skyabs su 'gro ba dang /bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so//de nas phyi zhig na/khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du spyan drang te//
71a4(mdo sde): rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang /bca' ba gtsang ba bzang po mang pos tshim par byas nas/ci bzhed pa bstabs te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan
71a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis khyim bdag de'i bsam pa dang /bag la nyal dang /khams dang /shes pa dang /rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/des na khyim bdag de
71a6(mdo sde): 'khor dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'khod pa bzhin du 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum
71a7(mdo sde): du byas te/des bden pa mthong nas yang dang yang du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'gro zhing bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan par byed do//bdeg ge bu yang dang yang du dran par byed de/
71b1(mdo sde): kye ma de yang 'ding 'ongs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed par gyur la/chos 'di lta bu dag kyang thob na ci ma rung snyam mo//de nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag gi bu de rgya mtsho'i klu bo
71b2(mdo sde): tshe'i don grub ste/phyir 'ongs te des bskyed mos tshal du rjes rnams bzhag nas/pha ma gnyis bsti pa'i phyir shin tu rings par bdag gi Sh+yom du song po las/de'i pham gnyis chos
71b3(mdo sde): mnyan pa'i phyir rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas/khyim bdag gi bu des pha mi gnyis chos mnyan pa'i phyir/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo zhes thos so//thos nas kyang de yang rgyal
71b4(mdo sde): bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de nyid du song ste/de der phyin nas bdag gis pha ma gnyis blta bar bya'o snyam pa las khyim bdag gi bu des pha ma gnyis chos mnyan pa'i phyir/bcom
71b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal to/pa ma gnyis
71b6(mdo sde): kyi mgul nas 'jus nas/chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de'i mdun du bla na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
71b7(mdo sde): byang chub tu spro ba skyed par 'gyur ba'i gtam bka' stsal to//de nas de thos ma thag tu khye'u de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'dod pa skyes so//de nas khyim bdag de bcom
72a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das las chos thos nas bu dang lhan cig tu bdag gre khyim du song ngo //der song nas de gnyis kyis bu de la smras pa/bu khyod kyis rgya mtsho chen
72a2(mdo sde): po'i nang nas bdag cag gnyis la ci zhig khyer te 'ongs/khye'us smras pa/rin po tshe rin thang che ba dag 'tshal ta mchiso//pha ma gnyis kyis de la smras pa/bu khyod kyis ni
72a3(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i nang du song nas/sdug bsngal stong phrag 'grangs pa myong ste/rin po che tha mal pa dag khyer te ljongs so//bdag cag gis ni 'di nyid na 'dug bzhin du tshogs chung
72a4(mdo sde): rus rin po che rin thang chen po dge rnyed do//khye'us smras pa/'o na tshegs chung ngus rnyed pa'i rin po che de dag ci 'dra ba blta bar 'tshal lo//de nas pha mi gnyis kyis de la
72a5(mdo sde): bdag cag gnyis kyi yon tan rgyas par brjod do//de nas de thos ma thag tu khye'u de lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das la dga' bar gyur to//dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
72a6(mdo sde): der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa de'i rkyen du 'tsham pa'i
72a7(mdo sde): chos bstan to//de nas khyim bdag gi bu des bcom ldan 'das kyi gtom 'jug rdzogs par rig nas/stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/bcom ldan
72b1(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//zla ba gsum gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i na
72b2(mdo sde): bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /spun gsos dang /sman zong rnams sbyar bar 'tshal na/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/
72b3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gi bu de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas khyim bdag gi bu des bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/rgyal
72b4(mdo sde): bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du yo byad thams cad sbyar te/sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum gyi bar du yi byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas/tha ma'i nyin
72b5(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong go dge 'dun la zhol zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das la na bzo'i 'bum ri ba phul lo//dge slong gzhan dag la yang
72b6(mdo sde): rerang la yang ras zung re phul nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa/ston
72b7(mdo sde): pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu gdul bya'i/
73a1(mdo sde): lo sgyur ba/blun med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyed de la
73a2(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag gi bu leg so legs so//ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyod 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa/ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
73a3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu gdum bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs
73a4(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu rlabs shes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so//stobs 'phrog ces bya ba ni/gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/de'i tshe byang phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i
73a5(mdo sde): rgyal po dang /lho phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i rgyal po gnyis phan tshun du mi 'thun par gyur te/dus dus su skye bo phal po che kha 'dog par byed do//de gnyis kyi mdza' bo bshes shing gtsugs
73a6(mdo sde): pa ni rgyal po gus la rgyal yin te/rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsams pa/bdag gis thabs ji lta bu nig gis de gnyis bsdum par bya/snyam nas de'i blo skyes pa/bcom
73a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das ni mdul ba 'dul ba yin na/ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba gdab po snyam nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das
73b1(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/phyogs cig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa byang phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i rgyal po dang /lho phyogs/
73b2(mdo sde): kyi phan tsa la'i rgyal po gnyis phon tshun mi mthun par gyur te/de gnyis kyis dus dus su skye bo phal po che kha 'dog par bgyid do//bcom ldan 'dis ni ma dul ba 'dul ba lags na/thugs
73b3(mdo sde): brtse ba'i slad du de gnyis kyi kho na sbyang ba'i slad du nan tan mdzad par gsol/dri nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal
73b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstad de/rje su yi rang nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das kyi thang nas song ngo //de nas
73b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te/byang phyogs kyi yul ban tsa la dang /lho phyogs kyi yul pan tsa la gnyis kyi bar mtshams su gshegs te/
73b6(mdo sde): bzhugs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas de dag 'thab par sems pa de lta bur byin gyis brlabs//de nas byang phyogs kyi phan tsa la'i rgyal po dang /lho phyogs kyi ngan tsa la'i rgyal po
73b7(mdo sde): gnyis kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas/g.yul 'gyed par phyir so so nas drangs so//de dag g.yul 'gyed par brtsams pa las sangs rgyas kyi mthus de gnyi gas rang
74a1(mdo sde): rang bam ste ma nus nas/gzhan gyis thub par mthong ste/de gnyis so so nas shing rta re re la zhon te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom
74a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ci nas de gnyis gcig gis gcig mi mthong bar byin gyis brlabs te/
74a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/'di gnyis las gcig ni nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyin mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro//
74a4(mdo sde): gcig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par sems bskyed par 'gyur ro//snyam du dgongs nas/gcig la ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i
74a5(mdo sde): gtam gsungs so//gcig la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la spro bar 'gyur ba'i gtam gsungs so//de nas lho phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i rgyal po bstan las langs te/
74a6(mdo sde): bla gos phrag gcig tu gzar nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag legs par
74a7(mdo sde): gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung ni/bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par
74b1(mdo sde): 'tshal lo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste/bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/de la lung yang phog ste/des kyang brtson pa dang /dasgrub/
74b2(mdo sde): pa dang /'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//byang phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i rgyal po yang stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzir
74b3(mdo sde): nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//zla ba gsum gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun
74b4(mdo sde): dang bcas pa'i ni bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims che dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams sbyar bar 'tshal na/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang ba mdzad du gsol
74b5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i rgyal po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas byang phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i rgyal pos/bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig
74b6(mdo sde): nas/sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rang gi yul du spyan drangs te/sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum gyi bar du yo byad zad sbyar nas/yo
74b7(mdo sde): byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas te/tha ma'i nyin par sangs rgyas las sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das la na bza' 'bum
75a1(mdo sde): rib phul lo//dge slong gzhan dag la yang re re la ras zung re phul nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ston+da lam bstab ste/kye ma dag pa'i
75a2(mdo sde): rtsa ba 'dis na//bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa/ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/
75a3(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so//
75a4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pan tsa lnga'i rgyal po de la bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po legs sngo legs so//ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rgyal po chen po khyod 'jig rten ldong po 'dren/
75a5(mdo sde): med pa/ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes
75a6(mdo sde): bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so//las brgya tham pa las/
75a7(mdo sde): sdoms kyi tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa rdzogs so////sdom ni bu dang ri'i cong rong glud//'thab dang gnyis gzung gong ma sreg/pha dang mi rgod sha za dang //dbang po'i mgo ni tha ma
75b1(mdo sde): yin//bu zhes bya ba ni/gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/de'i cha mnyan du yod pa na/bram ze cig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las/chung ma blangs te/de de dang lhan cig rno zhing dga' /
75b2(mdo sde): dga' dgur spyad pa las/phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/de zla ba dgu 'am/bcu lon pa dang /khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/de'i btsas ston
75b3(mdo sde): rgyas par byas nas/rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming btags te/'o ma dang /zho dang /mar dang /zhun mar dang /mer gyi snying kus bskyed bsrings so//'dod pa rnams ni tsha chu dang 'dra ste/
75b4(mdo sde): bsngon pa de tsam du skye bar 'gyur ba/danas kyis tsung mdza gyis zlum de khrugaciganas gnyis nis bdud gyi bar du byu na pa de rnams sa nga 'dzin pa'i byed ba rtags
75b5(mdo sde): ma dang /zho dang /mar dang /zhun mar dang /mar gyi snying kus bskyed bsrings nas/de dag gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/yi ge dang /bram ze'i spyod lam dang /spyod pa dang /oM zhes
75b6(mdo sde): bya ba dang /b+h+yo zhes bya ba dang /gtsang sbra dang /cho ga dang thul po blang ba/ril ba thogs pa dang /nges brjod kyi rig byed dang /mchod sbyin rig byed dang /snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /
75b7(mdo sde): srid srung gi rig byed dang /mchod sbyin bye ba dang /mchod sbyin byed du gzhug pa dang /sbyin pa dang /blang ba dang /kha ton dang /kha ton slob tu gzhug pa'i thabs bslabs nas/las
76a1(mdo sde): rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram zer gyur to//de nas phyi zhig na bram ze des bu de dag thams cad khyim phub ste/bram ze de'i khyim na nor ci yod pa
76a2(mdo sde): de dag thams cad so sor bgos nas bu de dag la byin no//de nas phyi zhig na bram ze de'i chung ma yang shi/bram ze de yang rgas te mig mithong bar gyur nas/de bu de rnams kyis khyim
76a3(mdo sde): nas bskrad de/de bzhin dag gi khyim du slong zhing /'tsho bar byed do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang /ye shes la
76a4(mdo sde): mnga' brnyes pa/ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsumo la mkhas pa/mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/skyes ched drug la
76a5(mdo sde): mkhas pa/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/stobs
76a6(mdo sde): bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/yang dag pa'i song ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyan dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
76a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten la gzigs te/su ni rgud/su ni dang /su ni 'phongs shing 'dug/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/su ni gnod pa dang ldan/su ni 'ongs pa dang /nyam nga ba dang /gnod pa dang ldan/su ni
76b1(mdo sde): ngan song du gzhol/su ni ngan song du 'bab/su ni ngas song du byab/su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/mtho ris dang thar pa dang /'bras bu la gzhag par bya/su ni nyes par spyod pa'i
76b2(mdo sde): 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nur bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/so ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed
76b3(mdo sde): pa las bskyed par bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu yod par
76b4(mdo sde): bya snyam du ye shes kyi gzigs pa 'jug go/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/dus rlab yol bar 'gyur yang srid//gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la//sangs rgyas dus las yol ba/
76b5(mdo sde): med//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de gdul ba'i dus la bab par dgongs nas snga dro chos gos dang /shem thabs gsol te/lhung bzed bsnams nas/mnyan du yod par bsod
76b6(mdo sde): snyoms la gshegs te/bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod par gshegs pa na/bram ze rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa/khar ba dang /snod thogs shing gzhan dag gi khyim du spong
76b7(mdo sde): bad gzigs so//gzigs nas kyang bram ze de la bka' stsal pa/bram ze rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa khyod ci'i phyir khar ba dang snod thogs shing gzhan gyi khyim du song zhing 'du
77a1(mdo sde): bram zes gsol pa/kye go'u ta ma bdag gi bu bdun mchis te//de rnams bdag gis gsos nas bskyed bsrings nas/thos pas kyang mthar phyin par
77a2(mdo sde): bgyid te bzhag nas/mchis brang dang bcas te brtsams te/bdag gi khyim na ci bdag pa de dag thams cad kyang bdag gis so sor bgos te stsal nas/de rnams kyis bdag byin
77a3(mdo sde): nas bskrad pas na/khar ba dang snod thogs shig gzhan dag gi khyim du slong zhing rgyu bar bgyid do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de la bka' stsal pa/bram ze khyod kyis
77a4(mdo sde): nga las tshigs su bcad pa bslabs te/kun chub par byas la bu de rnams 'khor gyi nang na 'khod pa ma bsgrags par nus sam/bram zes gsol pa/kye go'u ta ma bdog gis
77a5(mdo sde): rdo thogs che so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshogs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/gang dag btsas nas dgar 'gyur ba/gang phyir nor ni kun bsags pa//de dag bdag
77a6(mdo sde): gis tshems dang sbyar//bdag ni khyim nas bskrad par gyur/nor zad pa na gang dag gis//bdag spangs de dag bden mo min//srin po'i bu'i cha lugs can//pha pha zhes
77a7(mdo sde): brjod de mi brjid//rtarga ni zha sha zad pa bzhin//na tshod yal bar gyur pa na//gzhon nu rnams kyi pha rgan zhig/gzhan gyi khyim du slong bar gyur//rten la ma phan bu rnams pas//
77b1(mdo sde): bdag gi khar ba 'di bad ma ste//khar ba yi ni yon tan mthus//ba lang rdung zhing 'ong ba dang //sbrul dang khyi za zlog par byed//mun pa'i nang na mdun du 'gro/ya nga'i gnas su
77b2(mdo sde): chod kyang rig/rdog 'chos na yang bdag la ston//de nas bram ze des/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su btsod de bka' stsal pa 'di dag thos nas/bu rnams kyi 'khor du song ste
77b3(mdo sde): brjod nas/bu rnams kyis de thos ma thag tu pha la bzod pa gsol to//snga mkho bzhin du khyim gyi bdag por bzhig go de nas ci zhig na bram ze des bsams pa/bdag gi dpal dang /
77b4(mdo sde): skal pa dang ldan pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni/bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma de'i bka' drin yin na/ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma de bshos gsol la/rin thang che/
77b5(mdo sde): ba'i na bza' yul bar bya gor ma chag snyam nas/bram ze des bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs te/bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po dag gsol nas/rin thang che ba'i na bza'
77b6(mdo sde): phul lo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de dang bu de rnams la/de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/des na bram ze de 'khor dang bcas pas bstan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du
77b7(mdo sde): 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te/bla gos
78a1(mdo sde): /phrag phra gcig tu bzla te/bcom ldan 'das gal ba de lpags su la mo sbyang ba /dadu/com ldan las la 'od spyad ces gsol to//btsun pa//
78a2(mdo sde): bdag legs par gaspangs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs shi dge slong gi dngos po thob tu rung na/bdug kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du changs pa
78a3(mdo sde): spyod pa spyad pa 'tshal lo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de dge slong char shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu byung ste/bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nus/de la lung med phyog
78a4(mdo sde): des kyang brtson pa dang /bsgrub pa dang /'bed pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom
78a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la gsol pa/btsun pa bram ze nas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa 'di bu rnams kyis khyim nas bskrad nas/'di bcom ldan 'das kyis thabs dang ldan pas/snga ma
78a6(mdo sde): gnas su sbyar so rlud pa mdzad nas/gsung rlung gi mthar drug pa sgrub pa dang /bde myu na a las pa la bzhag pa la gags/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'a
78a7(mdo sde): pa/daltar 'bal shig ma yin te/'das pa'i dus na yang bram ze 'di bu rnams kyis rang gi khyim nas bslad ba las/'dings snga mkha'i gnas su bzhage nas/bsam gtan
78b1(mdo sde): dang /mngon par shes pa lnga ji ltar gnas par byas pa de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer tsam pa zhes bya ba na/khyim bdag cig gnas pa de la/snga phyir du bdun
78b2(mdo sde): byung nas/de dag gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur nas//khyim bdag des bu de dag thams cad khyim
78b3(mdo sde): du ba ste/de ci bdog pa thams cad kyang so sor bgos nas de rnams la byin no//khyim bdag de yang rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs par gyur nas/de bu rnams kyi khyim nas bskrad de/de
78b4(mdo sde): rgas bzhin du zong khyer te yul gzhan du chas so//de'i tshe dka' thub kyi gnas shig na/drang srong rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba zhig gnas te/dka' thub kyi gnas de'i 'dab cig tu de 'os
78b5(mdo sde): nas/drang srong des khyim bdag de mthong nas/smras pa/khyim bdag rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa khyod ci'i phyir yul gzhan du rgyas te 'gro/de nas khyim bdag des gtam de drang srong de
78b6(mdo sde): la rgyas par bsnyad do//de nas drang srong gis smras pa/khyim bdag khyod ngas ci nas bu de rnams kyis mchod pa dang rim gro byed par gyur pa de ltar byed zhes smras nas/drang srong des khyimo bdag
78b7(mdo sde): de phyir bzlog ste/rang gi gnas su khrid nas/drang srong des de'i bu rnams la/de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/des na bu de rnams kyis pha de khyim du bos nas snga mkho'i gnas su
79a1(mdo sde): bzhag go//de nas khyim bdag des snga ma'i drin ldan pas pa pa'i phyir drang srong de khyim du zan byin nas/de'i thad tu rab tu byung ste/de rab tu byung nas bsam gtan
79a2(mdo sde): bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no//de'i
79a3(mdo sde): tshe khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bram ze 'di kho na yin no//de'i bur gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni bu 'di dag kho na yin te/de'i tshe yang 'di rgas shing 'khogs las gtugs
79a4(mdo sde): par gyur nas/khyim nas bskrad pa las ngas thabs dang ldan pas snga ma mkho'i gnas su bcug ste/bzhag nas/bsam gtan bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la gnas par
79a5(mdo sde): byas so//da ltar yang 'di rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs par gyur nas/khyim nas bskrad pa las ngas thabs dang ldan pas snga mkho'i gnas su bcug ste/bzhag nas/
79a6(mdo sde): g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag go/gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di rab tu byung ste/
79a7(mdo sde): der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na/de ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to//ri zhes bya ba ni/gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na
79b1(mdo sde): bzhugs te/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la/
79b2(mdo sde): bu chags nas/de zla ba dgu 'am/bcu lon pa dang /khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming brtags nas/de 'o ma dang /zho dang mar dang /zhun mar dang /mar gyi
79b3(mdo sde): snying kus bskyed bsrings te/de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/yi ge dang /khong rtsis dang /shod dgod pa dang /lag rtsis dang /dbyung ba dang /sba ba dang /dgram pa dang /gos brtag pa dang /nor bu brtag pa dang /rin po che
79b4(mdo sde): brtag pa dang /spos brtag pa dang /sman brtag pa dang /glang po che brtag pa dang /rtswa brtag pa dang /go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te/yi ge mkhas pa dang /klog mkhas pa dang /mdzangs pa dang /bya ba la gsal
79b5(mdo sde): ba dang /yid bzhungs pa dang /brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to//de nas phyi zhig na de phas mdza' sde rnams kyi nang du btang ngo //mdza' sde'o de rnams ni lta ba dang /'dod pa tha dad pa phan
79b6(mdo sde): tshun mi 'thun par smra ba sha stag ste/gang dag gang la dga' ba de dag de'i sngags pa rjod par byed do//khyim bdag gi bu do ni rang bzhin gyis/mdzangs pa zhig skye/thams cad kyi gzhung lugs
79b7(mdo sde): 'dri bar byed na/la la ci zer la la ci zer bar gyur nas/lta ba'i rnam pa de dag mi 'dod ci mi bzod la rung bar mi 'dzin to//de nas phyi zhig na dge bsnyen zhig gis sangs rgyas kyi bslar pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
80a1(mdo sde): brjod nas/de thos ma thag tu khyim bdag gi bu des dris pa/sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ba 'di dag ni sngon ma byung na/sangs rgyas shes bya ba de su zhig/de nas
80a2(mdo sde): dge bsnyen des de dang 'thun pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod de/des na khyim bdag gi bu de bcom ldan 'das lta 'dod par gyur to//de nas ngos thams cad bor te/bcom
80a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la de
80a4(mdo sde): dang mthun pa'i chos bstan to//de thos nas khyim bdag gi bu de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur to//de nas khyim bdag gi bu des bcom ldan 'das kyi gtam mjug
80a5(mdo sde): rdzogs par rig nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rang ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/bcom ldan
80a6(mdo sde): 'das kyi thad nas song ngo /de nas phyi zhig na de sbyin pa btang ba'i sems skyes la khyim na ni ci yang mi bdog par mthong nas/de'i sgo skyes pa/baidag rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du song
80a7(mdo sde): la gal te bdag gis lan cig tsam rin po che'i gling bgrod pa sgrub nus por gyur na yang /de lta na bde blag tu sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bseM rnams dang byed du so snyam nas/tshong pa la brgya
80b1(mdo sde): tsam dang lhan cig tu zong khyer te/rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du song nas/des rin po che'i gling bgrang pa bsgrubs te/phyir 'dzam bu'i gling logs su chas pa las/de dag la rlung mi bzang pa byung /
80b2(mdo sde): nas/des gru bo che de ri'i cong rong zhig tu btsangs so//de nas rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs phyir log pa dang /tshong po de dag 'jigs shing skrag ste/bdag cag ni shi zin no//bdag cag gi srog
80b3(mdo sde): ni med zin no//de bdag cag la dka' ba byed pa dang /srog phangs pa sbyin pa su yod ces 'dzer to//de nas ded dpon gyis smras pa/ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig/sangs rgyas//
80b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su deng shig dang //des bdag cag phongs pa dang /dkos thag pa dang /gnod pa dang phrad pa las skyabs mdzad par
80b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro zhes byas so//de nas de thos ma thag tu tshong pa de dag rnams sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ste/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/'di lta ste/'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /
80b6(mdo sde): da ltar byung ba tso yang mi gzigs pa dang /mi mkhyen pa dang /thugs su ma chud pa mo mchis na/kye ma btsun pa bdag cag phongs shing dkos thag la/gnod pa dang phrad pa rnams kyi
80b7(mdo sde): skyangs mdzad du gsol zhes byas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci zhes gru de rang nyid ri'i cong rong de nas phyir log ste/rgya mtsho'i 'gram du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bur byin gyis
81a1(mdo sde): brlangs so//de nas de dag rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram du byung nus/mthar gyis mnyan du yod par dong ste/mnyan pa yod par rdzus rnams bdakA nas/
81a2(mdo sde): brtson ldan 'das sprul ba der dod ste sbyin nas/bam ldan 'das kyig sprul mgo bas phyag 'tshas te/bco mi sbyin 'das kyi rnabyas la 'o dus nas 'di skad ces smras ma hU~M
81a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ni bdag cag le bko' ba mdzad mdzad pa lags/srog phangs pa stsol ba lags so zhes gsol nas/chos mnyan de'i phyir spyan sde 'khod do//de nas
81a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /bag la nyal dang /khams dang shes pa dang /rang bzhin thug su chud nas/de dang 'thun po'i chos bstan te/des na nga
81a5(mdo sde): la sogs pa tshong pa lnga brgya bo rnams kyis/stan de di la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs pa lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mgrin pa nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes btsem nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'dres
81a6(mdo sde): bu mngon sum du byas te/de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas gsol pa/btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba /bsnyen par rdzog
81a7(mdo sde): shing dge slong gi ngos po 'thob tu rung na/bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag dge slong
81b1(mdo sde): gces rgya chag gos rab tu byu ste/bskyon par rdzogs par mdzad nas/de dag pa lung yang dag b+h+yo/dedag gis kyang brtson pa dang /bsgrub pa dang /byubyu pas//nyanams
81b2(mdo sde): bzangs cod smras nas/dgra zin pa nyid mngon sum du brus te/de dag dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang dral bar gyur nas/gser dang byung bar mnyam pa
81b3(mdo sde): nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/con dan sbas pa lta bur bsnyil bar sbyar pa/rig pas skyo 'i sbubs bcom pa/rlig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /so
81b4(mdo sde): sa yang dag par gi ba thob pa/srid pa'i rnyed pa dang/chags pa dang /bkur ni stsol mi sgrub/dbang po dang nye bang dang ba sti nga'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /gus par
81b5(mdo sde): smra ba'i gnas su gyur to//de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/btsun pa tshong ba lnga brgya po 'di rnams ded dpon 'di las brten te/bcom ldan
81b6(mdo sde): sa kyis 'jigs pa chen po las bsgribs nas/gsung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba'i myi ni lasu 'dus pa 'i bkrod pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
81b7(mdo sde): pa/da ltar 'ba' shig ma yin te/'das pa'i dus na yang tshong pa lnga brgya po 'di rnams kyis de dpon 'di las brten te/ngas 'jigs pa chen po las bsgrubs nas/bsam gtan
82a1(mdo sde): bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la ji ltar bkod pa de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/grong khyer bA ra nA si na/dka' thub kyi gnas shig/
82a2(mdo sde): na/drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba zhig gnas te/de yang bA ra na si na gnas pa'i skye bo mang pos bkur bsti bya ba dang /bla mar bya ba dang ri mor bya bar/
82a3(mdo sde): mchod par bya ba zhig go/de nas phyi zhig na/bA ra na si ne tshong pa lnga brgya tsam gyis drang srong de la bsnyen bkur byas nas/rgya mtsho chen po nang du dong ste/de dag gis rin po che'i gling bgrod
82a4(mdo sde): pa bsgrubs nas/phyir 'dzam bu'i gling logs su chas pa las/de dag gi gru bo che rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs kyis thang la 'phangs nas/de dag der 'jigs shing skrag par gyur te/bdag
82a5(mdo sde): cag 'tshe ba'i dus skabs med do snyam nas/de dag lha rnams la gsol ba 'debs par byed do//de nas ded dpon gyis smras pa/bdag cag gis lha gzhan dag la gsol ba gdab
82a6(mdo sde): pa ci dgos/bdag cag drang srong de nyid la skyabs su 'gro bar bya'o//'on tung des bdag cag phongs shing dkos thag pa dang /gnod pa dang phrad pa las skyabs byed par 'gyur zhing
82a7(mdo sde): srog phangs pa sbyin par byed do//de nas de thos ma thag tu tshong po lnga brgya po de dag drang srong de kho na la skyabs su dong ngo //de nas drang srong de la dga' ba'i lhas drang srong de la sbran nas/drang
82b1(mdo sde): slong des tshong pa lnga brgya po de dag rdzu 'phrul gyis rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas phyung ste/rang gi dka' thub kyi tshul du bkod do//de nas tshong pa rnams kyis bsams pa/bdag cag gson por gyur pa
82b2(mdo sde): yi rung ba de dag bams cad ni dring skyod 'di'i mthu yin no//snyam naste/sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas/thams cad drang srong de'i thad du rab tu byung ste/de dag de
82b3(mdo sde): byung nas bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga skyed do//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa de ni nga nyid yin no//
82b4(mdo sde): de'i tshe ded dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa dang /tshong bar gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshong ba 'di rnams kho na yin te/de'i tshe yang 'di rnams kyis ded dpon 'di kho na la brten nas/ngas 'jigs
82b5(mdo sde): pa chen po las bskyabs te/bsam gtan bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod do//da ltar yang 'di rnams kyis ded dpon 'di las brten nas/ngas 'jigs pa chen po las
82b6(mdo sde): bsgrubs te/g.yong drung gi mthar thug pa/grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do//gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bod srung gi gsung rab la 'di dag
82b7(mdo sde): thams cad rab tu byung ste/der 'di rnams kyis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pas des na da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to//klu
83a1(mdo sde): bya ba ni/gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa nu khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la/longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing //
83a2(mdo sde): rgya che ba/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang mnyam pa/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/de de dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga' la
83a3(mdo sde): dga' dgur spyod do//khyim bdag de yang bu mi bzhin pa zhig ste/bu dang bu mo btsa so cog 'chi bar 'gyur ro//khyim bdag de'i bsen ni tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa yin te/des
83a4(mdo sde): khyim bdag de skyabs su 'gro ba dang /bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la gnas par byas nas/sbyin pa dag sbyin pa'i bgro bshar byed du bcug go/de nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag de'i
83a5(mdo sde): chung mal bu chags nas/de zla ba dgu 'am/bcu lon pa dang /khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blto na sdug la mdzes pa zhig bcas nas/khyim bdag des bsams pa/thabs ji
83a6(mdo sde): lcer byas na/khye'u 'di'i tshe ring bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam nas de'i blo skyes pa/'phags pa ma 'gegs pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing bsod nams dang ldan pa/che bar grags pa
83a7(mdo sde): yin pas na/'di la bdag gis bu 'di g.yog tu phul na/'di'i mthus tshe ring bar 'gyur yang srid do snyam nas pha ma gnyis kyis khye'u de tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la phul nas
83b1(mdo sde): de nyid cig bzhin du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du khrid cing gso bar byed la/dge sbyong gi cha lugs su bcug nas/dge slong dag dang lhan cig tu bsod snyoms rgyu bar byed do//de nas de
83b2(mdo sde): gang gi tshe shed byi bar gyur pa de'i tshe/khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du spyan drangs nas/rang gi lag nas bza' ba drang /bca' ba gtsang
83b3(mdo sde): ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te/ci bzhed pa bstabs nas khye'u de'i glung du gser dngul mang po phul lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang khyim bdag de la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag
83b4(mdo sde): par stan/yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas/gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so//bcom ldan 'das gshegs nas/
83b5(mdo sde): khyim bdag des khye'u de'i chos gos tshon can rnams phud do//khyim bdag pa'i gos dang rgyan rnams bskon no//de nas de'i khyim pa'i gos dang rkun bskon no cog mi snang bar gyur te/chos gos
83b6(mdo sde): tshon can de dag 'ba' shig 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de nas gong gi tshe cha yugs de skar ma nus pa de'i tshe/dge slong gi cha lugs 'dug bzhin du gso bar byed de/khyim de nyid du ne'u 'drangs
83b7(mdo sde): kyi grogs po lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu yi ge slob tu bcug go/de nas de rang gi khyim der yeng dga' ba med na/gzhan du lta ci smos te/gtsug lag khang raba'i shig tu 'gro 'dod par gyur to//
84a1(mdo sde): de nas khyim bdag des bu de gtsug lag khang du khrid nas de nyid du gsos so//de nas des gtsug lag khang de nyid du bstan bcos thams cad rtogs par gyur nas/de
84a2(mdo sde): phyir khyim du 'gro mi 'dod de/gtsug lag khang na 'dug bzhin du des rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/tshe dang ldan pa ma
84a3(mdo sde): 'gagos pa'i ngang du rab tu byung nas/bsnyen pa rdzogs te/tshe dang ldan po ma 'gags pas de la lung yang phog nas/des kyang brtson pa dang /bsgrub pa dang /'bad pas nyon mongs pa
84a4(mdo sde): thams cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//dgra bcom par gyur nas bsams pa/bdag gis gdul bar 'gyur ba 'ga' lta ci yod snyam pa dang /des bltar
84a5(mdo sde): na bdag gi pha ma la sogs pa ne'u 'dangs kyi grogs po lnga brgya 'dul bar mthong nas/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur to//rang gi khyim du pa ma gnyis kyi mdun nas
84a6(mdo sde): sa la brtol te byung ngo //de nas de mthong ma thag tu pha ma gnyis de la shin tu dga' bar gyur to//dga' bar gyur nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go/de nas des pha ma gnyis
84a7(mdo sde): kyi bsam pa dang /bag la nyal dang /khams dang /shes pa dang /rang bzhin rtogs nas/de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/des na pho ma de gnyis 'khor dang bcas pas stan de
84b1(mdo sde): dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/bden pa mthong nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang //
84b2(mdo sde): bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la bkod de/sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i bgo sha yang byed du bcug nas/khyim de khron po dang 'dra bar byas te bzhag/des ni'u 'dangs kyi grogs po lnga brgya po de dag kyang
84b3(mdo sde): skyabs su 'gro ba dang /bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la bkod do//de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/btsun pa khyim bdag 'dis las ci bgyis
84b4(mdo sde): no//las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes la/bcom ldan 'das kyang 'dis mnyes par bgyis te/mi mnyes par ma bgyis nas
84b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/nyon mongs po thams cad spangs nos/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis la/'di nyid la brten nas pha ma la sogs pa dang /
84b6(mdo sde): ne'u 'dangs kyi grogs po lnga brgya bden po mthong bar gyur te/bcom ldan 'das kyang 'dis mnyes par bgyis te/mi mnyes par ma bgyis lpags/bcom ldan 'das kyis
84b7(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to//gsol pa/btsun pa 'di rnams kyis smon lam gang du btab lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag
85a1(mdo sde): sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusgra na/bsgral pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu' cha la ny+dza khri thub pa na/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su
85a2(mdo sde): ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dra
85a3(mdo sde): srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de'i tshe grong khyer bA ra na si na khyim bdog cig gnas pa las/phyi zhig na de'i bu gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/
85a4(mdo sde): dri gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang /bslab pang gzhi rnams blangs so//de gang ni
85a5(mdo sde): nyin par bcas pa de kho na'i nyin par khyim bdag gzhan gyi bu lnga brgya yang bac+doMs te/gang gi tshe de cher skyes pa de'i tshe/brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to//de nas de dag sa
85a6(mdo sde): so'i pha ma rnams kyis mdza' sde'i nang du btang ngo //de nas phye zhig na dpyid kyi dus su mdza' sde po de rnams bskyed mos tshal du shing ljon po ya lo ka 'khrigs shing me tog rgyas pa'i
85a7(mdo sde): na du 'gro 'dod par gyur nas/zla rnams kyis khye'u de sngon du gtang bar 'dod do/khyod sngar song la bza' bo dang /bca' ba dag ste gon gyis shig dang /bdag cag kyang don
85b1(mdo sde): dag grub nas 'ong ngo zhes byas so//de nas de der song nas bza' ba dang /bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po dag sta gon byas so//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'khor dang bcas
85b2(mdo sde): pa yangs phyogs de logs nas bA ra na sir bsod snyoms la chas te gshegs so//de nas khye'u des zag ring po zhig nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'khor dang
85b3(mdo sde): bcas pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang des bsams pa/yon gnas kyi mchog 'di lta bu bsod snyoms la chas te gshegs la/bdag gis kyang tshogs chung ngus bza' ba dang /bca' ba
85b4(mdo sde): dag yod na/bdag gis je yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/'od srung 'khor dang bcas pa bshos gsol la de'i 'og tu bdag gis grogs po rnams kyi bza' ba dang /bca' ba
85b5(mdo sde): gzhan sbyar bar bya'o snyam nas/des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'khor dang bcas pa bskyed mos tshal de nyid kyi nang du spyan drangs te/bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang
85b6(mdo sde): ma bzang ngo mang pos tshim par byas te/ci bzhed pa bskyabs nas/chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/de la chos
85b7(mdo sde): kye gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par bzeng po sted/yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas/gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so//
86a1(mdo sde): de nas khye'u des mdza' sngo po rnams kyi phyir bza' ba dang bca' ba gzhan dag sta gon byed pa la bzhugs so//de nas mdza' snga bo de rnams bskyed mo
86a2(mdo sde): tshal der lhags nas/bdag cag gi bza' ba dang /bca' ba sta gon byas pa de dag thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'khor dang bcas pa la phu'o//
86a3(mdo sde): zhes thos so//de thos ma thag tu de dag shras ches khros te/de dag khros nas khye'u de gsad par byas so//de nas khye'u de 'jigs shing skrag par gyur nas/drang srong
86a4(mdo sde): smra bar song ste/des gnas de nas pha ma gnyis la bzlugs te/pha ma gnyis kyis thab mo zhi bar bya bar brtsal pa las/zhi bar byed ma nus nas/khye'u des pha mo gnyis
86a5(mdo sde): la gsol te/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung ngo //de rab tu byung nas sde snod gsum lobs te/rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs/
86a6(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar gyur nas/des pha ma gnyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang /bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la bkod nas/sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' byed du bcug go//
86a7(mdo sde): de nas mdza' sde po de rnams kyis de rab tu byung ba mthong nas/'gyod pa skyes te bdag cag gis ma legs par byas so snyam nas/de dag gis de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te
86b1(mdo sde): bzod pa gsol to//de las skyabs su 'gro ba dang /bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang blangs so//de nas phyi zhig na dge slong de nad kyis thebs nas/de rtsa ba dang /sdong bu dang /lo ma dang /me tog/
86b2(mdo sde): dang /'bras bu'i sman rnams kyis rim gro byas kyang sos par byed ma nus te/des 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/kye ma 'di ltar bdag gis/yang dag par
86b3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang /yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob na/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de
86b4(mdo sde): dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog shig/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas
86b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig/de kho na'i bstan pa rab tu byung nas/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa nyid
86b6(mdo sde): mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so//de'i pha ma gnyis dang mdza' sde po de rnams kyang de'i mdun na 'dug par gyur te/de rnams kyis kyang thos nas smon lam btab pa/bdag cag
86b7(mdo sde): kyang khyed kho na la rten te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de gnyis par byed par gyur cig/mi mnyes pa byed par mi gyur cig ces byas so//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe sde snod gsu
87a1(mdo sde): par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni//khyim byudag gi du 'di na yin no//de cha ba ma gnyis su gyur pa yang yin pa de gnyis na du// sgyu ma ga rna na
87a2(mdo sde): dedes der tsha gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/'chi kAr smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin par gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod rgya
87a3(mdo sde): rigs su skyes te/dge slong dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /shugs mnyam pa dang /mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /thabs mnyam po brnyes par
87a4(mdo sde): gyur nas/'dis nga mnyes par byas te/mi mnyes par ma byas lo//nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//
87a5(mdo sde): deng de'i pha ma gnyis dang mdza' sngo bo de rnams kyis kyang smon lom btab pa des/da ltar yang 'di kho na las brten nas/'di rnams kyis nga mnyes par byas te/mi mnyes par mi byas /
87a6(mdo sde): bam po sum cu gnyis pa///'thab par zhes bya ba ni/gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/de'i tshe yul ko sa la dang /yul ma ga d+ha'i bar mtshams na/
87a7(mdo sde): seng ge mthu rtsal bdo ba gnyis 'dug ste/de gnyis de na 'dug pas/skye bo mang po khe 'dog par byed de/'drul bcad do//de gnyis kyis lam chod pas/su yang lam der 'gro ma
87b1(mdo sde): nus par gyur to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bskyod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
87b2(mdo sde): gsum la mkhas pa/mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/'gro ba lngar grol ba las rnam par grol ba/skye mched drug la mkhas pa/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul
87b3(mdo sde): ba/rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms por 'jug pa/stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/yang dag pa'i
87b4(mdo sde): seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/nyini mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/su nI chud/
87b5(mdo sde): su ni dang /su ni 'phongs shing 'dug/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/su ni gnod pa dang ldan/su ni phongs pa dang /nyam nga ba dang /gnod pa dang ldan/su ni ngan song du gzhol/su ni
87b6(mdo sde): song du 'bab/su ni ngan song du beb/su ni ngas dran song nas phyung ste/mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las
87b7(mdo sde): lag nas drang bar bya/su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug le dbang byed du gzhug por bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las
88a1(mdo sde): bskyed par bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las smin par bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sprin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya//
88a2(mdo sde): su pa ni sangs rgyas byung pos brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu yod par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas//dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur/
88a3(mdo sde): yang srid//gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la//sangs rgyas dus laso yol ba med//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge de gnyis gdul ba'i dus la bab par dgongs nas/
88a4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyed song la/dge slong rnams la bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha'i phyogs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs kyis/su
88a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro 'dod pa de dag chos gos dang chos shig ces sgo shig ces bka' stsal nas/bcom ldan 'das dbyer gnas shing /dbyar
88a6(mdo sde): bzhugs nas/dge slong mang pos zhim ring byas te/dge slong pi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas rgyal po'i khab tu chas te mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs gshegs nas/
88a7(mdo sde): seng ge'i nags khung du byon nas/seng ge do gnyis zas tshol du song song ba las de gnyis phrad nas 'thab par chas so//bcom ldan 'das kyang de gnyis la thugs brtse ba'i
88b1(mdo sde): phyir mdun logs su gzhes so//de nas thag ring po zhig nas seng ge de gnyis kyis bac+doMs mthong //mthong nas kyang seng+ge de gnyis kyi khro bI kun nas dkris pa med par gyur te/bac+doMs la shin tu dga'
88b2(mdo sde): /de gnyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lci zhing 'dug go/de nas bcom
88b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la bka' stsal pa/bzhin bzangs khyed gnyis sngon gyi nyes par spyod pa'i las kyis dud 'gro'i nang du skyes na/khyed gnyis da ster yang de 'drar
88b4(mdo sde): shig gi rgyu byed cing 'dug go/bzhin bzangs gnyis 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag go/chos thams cad ni bdag med do/mya ngan las 'odas pa ni zhi ba'o//nga la sems
88b5(mdo sde): dga' bar gyis shig dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang bral bar 'gyur yang srid do zhes bka' stsal nas/bcom ldan 'das gshegs so//de gnyis bcom ldan 'das las/
88b6(mdo sde): chos thos nas khwa 'tshos so//dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams ni me'i dod che ste/bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba skyes bzhin du shi nas/lha'i nang du skyes so//
88b7(mdo sde): lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes ma thag pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/bdag gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes/las gang gis skyes snyam mo//de nas
89a1(mdo sde): dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang /lha'i nang du skyes pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par de nyid kyis mthong ngo //de nas de
89a2(mdo sde): gnyis kyis bsams pa/bdag cag gnyis zhag lon nas/bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni/bdag cag gnyis kyi cha ma yin gyis bdag cag gnyis zhag ma
89a3(mdo sde): lon par bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo//de nas sngon seng ger gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul pa thogs pa//lus shal dang /se modo 'arkyen pa/nor bu rin po che
89a4(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can/lus gur kum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang /sprig ka las sogs pas byugs pa/de gnyis kyi de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud
89a5(mdo sde): pa la dang /pad ma dang /ku mu da dang /pad ma dkar po dang /man dar ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/
89a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/chos mnyan po'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
89a7(mdo sde): de gnyis la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te de gnyis kyis chos thos nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/de gnyis bden pa mthong nus rang gi gnas su song ngo //de nas dge slong
89b1(mdo sde): rnams kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur pa mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/mdangs gsum mi mjed
89b2(mdo sde): kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi 'am/lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gzhan 'ga' zhig bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i slad du/mchis
89b3(mdo sde): lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag mdangs gsum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi 'am/
89b4(mdo sde): lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gzhan 'ga' zhig nga blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/dge slong khyed kyis nags khung dgon pa na/seng+ge gnyis phan tshun 'thab cing 'dug pa mthob
89b5(mdo sde): ngongo//gsol pa/btsun pa mthong lags so//bka' stsal po/ngas de gnyis la chos bstan te/de gnyis kyis nga las chos thos nas kha 'chos te/de gnyis shi 'phos te
89b6(mdo sde): dus las 'das pa las lha'i nang du skyes te/lhar gyur nas nga'i thad du 'ongs te/de gnyis la ngas chos bstan nas/ngal chos thos pa des na de dag gis bden pa mthong nas rang gi
89b7(mdo sde): gnas su song ngo /de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge'i de nyid kyi kho na byang bar mdzad de/mtho ris dang
90a1(mdo sde): thar pa thob pad+ma mdzu la/yul 'khor gnyis kyi 'jigs pa bsal ba la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/da ltar 'ba' shig/
90a2(mdo sde): ma yin te/'das pa'i dus na ldang 'di gnyis kyi kho na byung bar byas nas/bsam gtan bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod de/yul 'khor gnyis kyis 'jigs pa rang
90a3(mdo sde): ji ltar bsal ba de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/yul kau shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin dang /bi de ta'i rgyal po dbang chen ste gnyis phan tshun mi
90a4(mdo sde): 'thun par gyur nas/de gnyis kyis dus su skye bo phal po che kha 'dog par byed do//de nas phyi zhig na de gnyis kyis dpung gi tshogs yon lag bzhi go bskon nas/gsul
90a5(mdo sde): 'byed par 'dod pa'i phyir so mams ni 'khod do//de gnyis lakhad pa'i 'dab na dka' thub kyi nags shig na/drang srang mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/rdzu 'phrul che zhing ma
90a6(mdo sde): che bzhig gnas pa des/de gnyis la snying rtse ba'i phyir/steng gri nam mkha' las myos nas/de gnyis kyi bar mtshams su 'dug go//de nas drang srid de mthong nas/de gnyis kyi/
90a7(mdo sde): khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa med par gyur nas/drang srong de la shes cher dga' bar gyur to//de gnyis dga' bar gyur nas/drang srong de la smras pa/bka' stsal pa ci mchis/drang srong
90b1(mdo sde): des smras pa/khan byung bar gyis shog/rgyal po dganyis smras pa/drang srang gis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du tshul lo zhes smras nas/'jal dus byas te/drang srong gi rkang pa la
90b2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal nas/chos mnyan pa'i phyir/drang srong gi mdun du 'dug go/drang srong des kyang de gnyis la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/des na rgyal po de gnyis so so'i bu rab rgyal sar
90b3(mdo sde): bcug nas/drang srang de nyid kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/bsam gau tan bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga skyed do//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa byang chub sems
90b4(mdo sde): dpa'i spong ba la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no//de'i tshe ka shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin dang /bi de ha'i rgyal po dbang chen sder gyur pa gang yin pa de gnyis ni saing+ge 'di gnyis kho
90b5(mdo sde): na yin te/de'i tshe yang ngas de gnyis kyi kho na byang bar byas nas/rab tu byung ste/bsam gtan bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do//da ltar yang ngas 'dis gnyis kyi kho na byung ba
90b6(mdo sde): byas nas/mtho ris thar pa thob par byas so//gsol pa/btsun pa 'di gnyis kyis las ci bgyis nA/las de'i rnam par smin pas seng ger skyes lags/las ci bgyis
90b7(mdo sde): no de nas shi 'phos nas lha'i nang du skyes la/'di gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/mi gnyis par ma bgyis legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yang
91a1(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di gnyis dge bsnyen du gyur te/kha mi mkhas la der 'di gnyis khros pas skye bo mang po la dud
91a2(mdo sde): 'gro zhes bya ba'i tshig smras la/der 'di gnyis kyis tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang /bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs nus/'chi kar smon lam btab pa yang dag par rdzogs
91a3(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig/mi mnyes par byed par ma
91a4(mdo sde): gyur cig ces byas so//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe dge bsnyen du gyur pa gang yin pa de gnyis ni/seng ge 'di gnyis kho na yin te/de gnyis kyis der skye bo mang po
91a5(mdo sde): la dud 'gro zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni dud 'gror skyes so//de gnyis kyis der tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'phro ba dang /bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs na/
91a6(mdo sde): 'chi ker smon lam btab pa des ni/dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung drang shin tu mnyam pa dang /shugs mnyam pa dang /mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /
91a7(mdo sde): thabs mnyim pa brnyes nas/'di gnyis kyis nga mnyes par byas te/mi mnyes par ma byas pa 'di ni/'das pa'i dus kyi las yin no//da ltar byung ba'i las gang zhe na/de
91b1(mdo sde): gnyis seng ger gyur nus/nga la sems dpa' bar byas pa des na/lha'i nang du skyes te/'dri ni da ltar byung ba'i las yin no//snyis bzung zhes bya ba ni rlung gzhi mnyan du yod
91b2(mdo sde): pa na bzhugs te/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na nags khrod zhig na ri dgas kyi rngon pa dag gcig gis ri dwags be shor ba'i phyir/rgya drang snyi dang mdzel rlubaso dang /rnyong mang po dag btsugs
91b3(mdo sde): nas/der ri dgas mang po zhig bzung ngo //rngon pa de dag kyang nang par sngar langs te/nags khrod der dong nas de dag gis der ri dgas ci zin pa rnams 'das 'phangs te bas de nas
91b4(mdo sde): de dag las nyung shas cig lus so//de'i tshe sa phyogs der bcom ldan 'das kyang gshegs so//de nas ri dgas de rnams dang rngon pa de rnams kyis thag ring po zhig nas bcom ldan 'das
91b5(mdo sde): mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dka' bar gyur to//dga' bar gyur nas rngon pa de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
91b6(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal te/chos nyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /bag la ny+dza la dang //khams dang shes pa dang /rang bzhin thugs
91b7(mdo sde): su chud nas/de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/des na rngon pa de rnams kyis sten de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/de dag gis bden
92a1(mdo sde): pa mthong nas gsol pa/btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing dge slong gi dngos po thob tu rung na/bdag
92a2(mdo sde): cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste/
92a3(mdo sde): bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de dag la lung yang phig ste/de dag gis kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang /'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa
92a4(mdo sde): nyid mngon sum du byas so//ri dgas de rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bzhin du shi 'phos te dus las 'das nas lha'i nang du skyes so//lha'i bu 'am/lha'i
92a5(mdo sde): bu mo skyes ma thag pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/bdag gang nas shu 'phos/gang du skyes/las gang gis skyo snyam mo//de nas dud 'gro
92a6(mdo sde): lce shi 'phos pa dang /lha'i nang du skyes pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par de dag gis mthong ngo //de nas de dag gis bsdams pa/bdag cig zhig
92a7(mdo sde): lon nas bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyis/bdog cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo//de nas
92b1(mdo sde): sngon ri dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub khor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/lus dro shal dang /se mo dos brgyan pa/nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis spros pa'i cod pan can/
92b2(mdo sde): lus gur kum dang /ta ma la'i lo ma dang /sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa de dag gis/de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog u pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu ta dang /pad ma
92b3(mdo sde): dkar po dang /man da ra rnams kyis thub bkang ste/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/bcom ldan//
92b4(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/
92b5(mdo sde): de dag gi chos thos na bden pa mthong bar gyur te/de dag gi bden pa mthong nas/rang gi gnas su dong ngo //de nas dge slong rnams kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par mthong
92b6(mdo sde): nas/bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/mdang gsum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi 'am
92b7(mdo sde): lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu tshe ba gzhan zhig bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ma dang sum mi
93a1(mdo sde): mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/lha'i dbang po brgya byin namA/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi 'am/lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gzhan 'ga'
93a2(mdo sde): zhig nga blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/dge slong khyed kyis nags khung dgon pa ni/ri dwags lnga brgya rngon pa rnams kyis mdas 'phangs te bsad pa mthong ngam/gsol/
93a3(mdo sde): pa/btsun pa mthong lags so//bka' stsal pa/de dag nga la sems dga' bar gyur bzhin du shi 'phos nas dus las 'das pa las lha'i nang du skyes te/lhar gyur nas nga'i
93a4(mdo sde): thad du 'ongs te/de dag la ngas chos ston nas/nga las chos thos pa des na/de dag gis bden pa rnams mthong ste/de dag gis bden pa mthong nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo //
93a5(mdo sde): de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa rngon pa de dag gis las ci bgyis na/las de'i rnam par smin pas/gdol pa'i rigs su skyes lags//
93a6(mdo sde): ridags de dag gis las ci bgyis ni/las ngo'i rnam par smin bla ri dgas su skyes nas 'di rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/mi mnyes par ma gyimi lags
93a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di dag thams cad rab tu byung ste/dge slong 'thab grol can kha mi mkhra
93b1(mdo sde): pa sha stag tu gyur te/dge slong der de rnams kyis gdol pa zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod do//kha cig gis dud 'gro zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod do//gang dag gis dud 'gro zhes bya ba'i tshig
93b2(mdo sde): brjod pa de dag ni dud 'gror skyes so//gang dag gis gdol pa zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod pa de dag ni gdol par skyes so//der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/dbang po rnams
93b3(mdo sde): yongs su smin par byas pa des ni/da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to//grong ma sreg shes bya ba ni/bcom ldan 'das dge slong nye rgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
93b4(mdo sde): tshong pa lnga brgya dang /sprang po lnga brgya dang /thabs gcig tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/nags khrod gcig tu lam byung ste/bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i tshe
93b5(mdo sde): nags khrod de'i nang gi gnas su me chen po 'bar nas/der skye bo phal po che dag 'jigs shing skrag par gyur te/bdag cag ni tshig zin no//bdag cag ni 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i skabs
93b6(mdo sde): med do snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phul po che dag 'jigs shing skrag pa gzigs so//gzigs nas kyang 'dron po de rnams kyi mdun logs su gshegs nas/
93b7(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa//sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs gang dang //dgra bcom rnams kyi stobs gang dang //sangs rgyas dkon mchog gzi brjid kyis//mi khyod lam ni dbye bar
94a1(mdo sde): bar rjes//sas rgyas kun gyi stobs gang dang //dgra bcom rnams kyi stobs gang dang //sanas //na mchog ga bad+mad kyis//me spyod drus ni
94a2(mdo sde): dbye bar gyis//sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs gang dang //dgra bcom rnams kyi stobs gang dang //dge 'dun dkon mchog gzi brjid kyis//me khyod lam ni dbye bor gyis//
94a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs ma thag tu me zhi bar gyur nas/tshong ba de dag bcom ldan 'das le shin tu dga' bar gyur to//dga' bar gyur nas cho so mnyan pa'i phyir
94a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/des na de dag gi nang nas kha cig gis ni dro bar gyur pa po skyed
94a5(mdo sde): do//kha cig gis ni spyi bo dang bden pa dang 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang /'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog dang mthong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed do//kha cig gis ni rgyun tu zhugs
94a6(mdo sde): pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so//kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so//kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya'o//
94a7(mdo sde): kha cig gi ni rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//kha cig gis ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sa bon bskyed do//kha cig gis ni stobs kyi 'khor
94b1(mdo sde): los sgyur bar 'gyur ba dang /kha cog gis ni brgya byin du 'gyur ba dang //kha cig gis ni tshangs par 'gyur ba dang /kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub dang /kha cig gis na
94b2(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /kha cig gis ni b+h+yo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon bskyed do//'khor de dag gi nang nas phal cher ni sangs rgyas la gzhol/
94b3(mdo sde): chos la 'bab/dge 'dun la bab par byas te bkod do//de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis skyes po phul po che zhugs
94b4(mdo sde): kyis tshig par 'gyur ba las thar par mdzad nas/g.yang drang gi mthar thug par grub pa dang /bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis
94b5(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/da ltar 'ba' shig ma yin te/'das pa'i dus na yang ngas dud 'gro phal po che/me'i 'jigs pa las bskyabs nas ji ltar 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas su
