151a6(mdo sde): bsgral pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa nu/yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten
151a7(mdo sde): mkhyen pa/skyes bu gdul bya'i khi lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de'i
151b1(mdo sde): ba ra na si na bram ze zhig gnas pa las gtan tshigs snga ma bzhin du gyur te/rab tu byung nas des tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/'chi kar smon lam btab pa/'di/
151b2(mdo sde): ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung kyi bsten pa la tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyod kyang /yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob kyis/yang dag par/
151b3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gris mnyes par byed par gyur cig/mi mnyes
151b4(mdo sde): par byed par ma gyur cig/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so//
151b5(mdo sde): dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe bram zer gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bram ze 'di kho na yin te/des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/'chi kar smon lom btab
151b6(mdo sde): ste/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'odas de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur
151b7(mdo sde): cig/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces
152a1(mdo sde): byas pa des na/dge slong drug nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /shugs mnyam pa dang /mdzad pa mnyam
152a2(mdo sde): pa dang /thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/'dis nga mnyes par byas te/mi mnyes par ma byis la/nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/nyon mongs pa thams
152a3(mdo sde): cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//bram ze gnyis pa ni/gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze zhig
152a4(mdo sde): gnas pa des thab zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la buM chags nas/de zla ba
152a5(mdo sde): dradagu 'am/bcu len pa dang /bu bai tsA sra ti/rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming btags nas/de 'o ma dang /zho dang /mar dang /zhun mar dang /myur gyi snying khus bskyed
152a6(mdo sde): skyengs te/de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/de yi ge bslabs so//bram ze de rnams kyi lug k+Shin/chos brgyad dang /tshes bco lnga'i nyin par bsang bar byed do//de re 'ga'on
152a7(mdo sde): grong khyer sbyar gro'o//res 'oga' ni mu stegs su ltar 'gro ba 'am/skye ltar 'gro ba 'am/yam sreg shing rngar 'gro ba'o//de nas phyi zhig nas/bram ze'i
152b1(mdo sde): dride bsang dus la bab nas/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo //de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i nang na bzhugs shing chos ston te/bram ze'i khye'u des thag
152b2(mdo sde): ring po zhig nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das lo shin tu dga' bar gyur to//dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das ga
152b3(mdo sde): la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i rkyen dang
152b4(mdo sde): 'tsham par chos bstan nas/skyabs su 'gro ba dang /bslab pa'i glizhi rnams la gnas par byas so//de nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi gtam mjug rdzogs par rig nas
152b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa lo mngon par bstod de/rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo //
152b6(mdo sde): de nas phyi zhig nu bram ze'i khye'u des mchod sbyin bya bar brtsams nas/bram ze'i khye'u mchod sbyin gyi gnas na 'dug pas bsams pa/gal te bcom ldan 'das mchod sbyin gyi
152b7(mdo sde): gnas 'dir gshogs te/longs spyod par mdzad cing /bcom ldan 'das gral gyi gtso lo bzhugs na/mchod sbyin gyi gnas mdzes par 'gyur ro snyam nas/des bsam
153a1(mdo sde): pa/bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs te/kye ma bcom ldan 'das mchod sbyin gyi gnas 'dir longs spyod cing gra shegs par gyur cig ces bsams so//
153a2(mdo sde): de nas bram ze'i khye'u des sems bskyed ma theg tu//bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te/mchod sbyin gyi gnas su gshegs pa nas/mi sna
153a3(mdo sde): par bram ze thams cad kyi gral gyi gtso la bzhugs so//bram ze'i khye'u des ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bral gyi gtso la bzhugs par mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang byim
153a4(mdo sde): ze'i khye'u des/bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhugs par rigs nas/bca' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mchod
153a5(mdo sde): sbyin gyi gnas de longs spyod nas/mi snang bar bram ze thams cad la 'od zer btang nas/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshul du gshegs so//de nas bram ze de dag gis mchod sbyin gyi
153a6(mdo sde): gnas thams cad snang po chen pos khyab par mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang de dag nA re/bdag cag gi mchod sbyin grub bo zhes zer ro//kha cig ne re ni bdag gis mchod sbyin gyi
153a7(mdo sde): gnas su mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa byung ngo zhes zer ro//gzhan kha cig na re ni/'di ni tshangs pa ma yin gyi dbang phyug de bdag cag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas su gshegs so//
153b1(mdo sde): zhes za du//gzhan kha cig nar ni/'di ni tshangs pa yang ma yin/dbang phyug kya ma yin rgyu/khyab 'jug de bdag dag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas 'du 'byung du zhus tshor ro//bram dri
153b2(mdo sde): khye'u na re kye khyed rnams thams cad ni bslus pa yin te/mchod sbyin gyi gnas 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das gshegs so zhes zer ro//de nas bram ze'i khye'u la yid mchis nas/bram ze'i
153b3(mdo sde): khye'us smras pa/bdag gis sang nang par ni khyed kyi mngon sum du 'gyur bar bya'o zhes byas nas/bram ze'i khye'u des phyed nyon bram ze thams cad tshogs pa'i nang du/bla gos phrag
153b4(mdo sde): pa gcig tu bzar te/pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la gtsugs nas/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal ldogs su phyogs te/thul mo sbyar nas sems bskyed de/tshig tu smras pa
153b5(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ni 'di lta ste/'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba ci yang mi mkhyen po 'am/mi gzigs po 'am/thugs su me chud pa ci yang mi mnga' na/
153b6(mdo sde): kye ma bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bdag cag gi mtshang sbyin gyi gnas 'dir gshegs te longs spyad par gsol zhes byas s+ho//de nas de skad ces
153b7(mdo sde): brjod pa'i med la/bcom ldan 'das dge slong mang pos zham ring byas te/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar nas nam mkha' las mchod sbyin gyi gnas der gshegs te/
154a1(mdo sde): mi snang bar bram ze rnams kyis gdan bshams pa la bzhugs nas/bram ze'i khye'u des sangs rgyas las sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mchod sbyin
154a2(mdo sde): gyi gnas kyi dbus su bzhugs pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de dag ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
154a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byas so//de nas bram ze rnams na re khye'u 'di ni smos te/gcig pu ci yang bla zhing 'dug go zhes zer ro//de nas bram ze'i khye'us smras pa/
154a4(mdo sde): bdag ni smyos pa ma yin gyi/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gide/'dun gyis zham ring byas te/mchod sbyin gyi gnas kyi dbus na bzhugs so zhes byas so//de nas bram ze'i
154a5(mdo sde): khye'us de skad brjod ma thag tu/ci nas bram ze de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par mchod sbyin gyi gnas kyi dbus na bzhugs par
154a6(mdo sde): mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bur bzhugs so//de nas bram ze'i khye'u nges 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par bza' ba
154a7(mdo sde): dang /bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te/ci bzhed po bstabs nas/bcom ldan 'das be shos gsol zin te/srung sder ni gyu/phyag ni bcabs
154b1(mdo sde): par rig nas/stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'u de chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/
154b2(mdo sde): yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug/yang dag par gzengs bstod/yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas/gdon la bzhengs te gshegs so//de nas bram ze rnams gzhi de las khro/
154b3(mdo sde): ba'i kun nas dkris pa chen po skyes te/nged kyi phyir bza' ba dang bca' ba bshams pa de dag dge sbyong go'u ta ma la byin no zhes zer zhing /de dag khros pas bram ze'i khye'u de gsad
154b4(mdo sde): bar byas pa las bros te/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song na/'on kyang bram ze de dag de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang ste/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar du song nas smras pa/bdag cag
154b5(mdo sde): gis 'di rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gsad par mi nus te/'di ni khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis yongs su bzung ba yin pa'i steng du rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi khrims
154b6(mdo sde): bcas so snyams rig nos log go/bram ze'i khye'u do ni 'jigs shing skrag nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phan nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
154b7(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyon sngar 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /bag la nyal ba dang /khams dang /ye shes pa
155a1(mdo sde): dang /rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/des na bram ze'i khye'u des bstan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i
155a2(mdo sde): ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/des bden pa mthong nas/stan las langs te/bla gos
155a3(mdo sde): phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud do/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag gis
155a4(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das la brten nas/sems can dmyal ba drang /dud 'gro dang /yi dgas rnams las phyung ste/lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du
155a5(mdo sde): gom pa 'dor du stsal pa dang /'khor ba'i mthar gtugs pa dang /khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho rnams skams pa dang /rus pa'i la rnams bsgral ba dang /thog ma ma ma//
155a6(mdo sde): pa'i dus nas bsogs pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtse mo ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis//
155a7(mdo sde): mas kyang ma bgyis/rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/nang mi dang gArkyen mang po rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis
155b1(mdo sde): dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so//btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi do du dra
155b2(mdo sde): 'thob tu rung na/bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bye ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste/
155b3(mdo sde): bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/de la lung yang phog ste/des kyang brtson pa dang /bsgrub pa dang /'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du/
155b4(mdo sde): byas so//de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/btsun pa bram ze'i khye'u 'di bram ze rnams kyis dgum par chad pa las/de 'jigs shing
155b5(mdo sde): sgrog nas rab tu byung ste/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/da ltar
155b6(mdo sde): 'ba' shig ma yin te/'das pa'i dus na yang /bram ze'i khye'u 'di bram ze 'di dag kho nas gsad par byas pa la/'di 'jigs shing skrag nas/rab tu byung ste/ji ltar
155b7(mdo sde): tshe gcig gi bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/yang dag par rdzogs
156a1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig cen mkhyen pa/skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/
156a2(mdo sde): lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de'i tshe nI si na bram ze zhig gnos pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/
156a3(mdo sde): de de dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/de la bu yang med de/bu mo yang med/phyi zhig na de lag pa la skom tshugs bcas te/bsams pa/'di ltar
156a4(mdo sde): bdag gi khyim nor dang gsar dang ldan par 'dug kyang /bu yang med bu mo yang med pas/bdag shau ste dus las 'das pa'i 'og tu ci 'dog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar
156a5(mdo sde): 'gyur la/bdag la bu med pas 'jig rten du yang rung bar mi 'ong ngo snyam ste/sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/de nas des 'di lta bur yi dam bcas te/gal te bdag
156a6(mdo sde): gi bu skyes par gyur na mchod sbyin byas te/bram ze rnams la yon mang po dbul bar bya'o zhes zer zhing /de bu skyer re zhing 'dug ste/de ring ngam sang du bdag gi bu skye
156a7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro snyam sems bzhin du/de'i 'bring du bram ze rgas nas bu yang med bu mo yang med par gyur to//de nas phyi zhig na bram ze des bsams pa/bdag lo bu
156b1(mdo sde): yang med/sbyin pa gtong ba yang byas la/bdag kyang rgas kyis/da ni bdag gi bu skye yang rung /mi skye yang rung ste sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing /bsod nams dag bya'o snyam mo//
156b2(mdo sde): nas phyi zhig na nges mchod sbyin byas te/bram ze rnams la yon mang po phul ba las yon de dag 'gyed pa'i tshe thabs mo chen po byung ste/mchod sbyin gyi bdug pos zab mo zhi bar bya'o//
156b3(mdo sde): zhes byas nas/bram ze rnams kyis de nyid kyi steng du brgyugs te gsad do snyam pa las/de 'jigs shing skrag nas/drang srong smra ba'i gnas su song ste/yang dag par rdzogs
156b4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo //de der rab tu byung nas/tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/'chi kar smon lam btab pa/'di ltar bdag gis yang dag
156b5(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang //yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob kyis/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung
156b6(mdo sde): gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig/de kho na'i bstan
156b7(mdo sde): pa la rab tu byung nas/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so//dge slong dag de'i tshe bram zer gyur pa gang yin
157a1(mdo sde): pa de ni blam ze 'i sa de kho na ldan te/de'i tshayad+ma 'di bum zla rnams kyi sags d+ma byas pa wAswA/'jigs shing skrag na sa rag tu byung /
157a2(mdo sde): tshegacig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'tsho kar smon lam btab ste/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u tham lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i songs
157a3(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig/de 'i na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/nyon mongs pa thams cad
157a4(mdo sde): spangs te/regra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na/dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu nyams pa dang /
157a5(mdo sde): shugs mnyam pa dang /mdzad pa mnyams dang /thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/'dis nga mnyes par byas te/mi mnyes par ma byas la/da ltar yang 'di bram
157a6(mdo sde): zi rnams kyis bsdad par byas pa las/'di 'jigs shing skrag nas rab tu byung ste/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//
157a7(mdo sde): bram ze gsum pa ni//gleng bzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze zhig gis mchod sbyin byas nas/gser dngul mang po bram ze rnams la
157b1(mdo sde): yon du phul ba las/de dag yon 'gyed pa'i tshe thab mo chen po byung nus/de'i ljongs na gnas pa'i bram ze rnams ga re/khyod ni rgyal po'i dpa' dri rnams la sbyin pa yin gyi/
157b2(mdo sde): nged ni yon gnas yin te/yon dbul ba'i 'os yin pas na/yon nyi rim du dbang ngo zhes zer ro//thal na gnas pa'i bram ze rnams na re/khyod ni zhing blas kyis 'tsho ba tshol ba
157b3(mdo sde): yin gyi nged ni yon gnas yin te/yon dbul ba'i 'os yin pas na/nged ni yon nyi rim du dbang ngo zhes zer ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'grod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/
157b4(mdo sde): rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang /ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/mi 'jigs pa bzhis 'jigs pa med pa/'gro ba/
157b5(mdo sde): lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/skye mched drug la mkhas pa/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/mthar gyis gnas
157b6(mdo sde): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'dug pa/stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/yong dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni/chos nyid kyis nyin dus
157b7(mdo sde): gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/su ni rgud/su ni dang /su ni phongs shing 'dug/su ni nyams//
158a1(mdo sde): nga bar gyur/su ni gnod pa dang ldan/su ni phongs pa dang nyams nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/su ni ngan song du gzhol/su ni ngan song
158a2(mdo sde): du 'bab/su ni ngan song du ba ba/su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/mtho ris dang /thar pa dang /'bras bu la gzhag par bya/su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying las
158a3(mdo sde): lag nas drang bar bya/su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las/'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma skyed pa
158a4(mdo sde): las bskyed par bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon kyis brtol
158a5(mdo sde): bar bya//su ni sangs rgyas 'byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu yod par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go//rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas//dus rlabs yol
158a6(mdo sde): par 'gyur yang srid//gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams las//sangs rgyas dus los yol ba med//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i bram ze rnams
158a7(mdo sde): gdul ba'i dus la bab par dgongs nas/dge slong mang pos zham ring byas te/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/sa de nyid las nam mkha' las mchod sprin
158b1(mdo sde): gyi gnas der gshegs te/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs te/de mthong ma thag tu de rnams bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur to//
158b2(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur nas/chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de dag la bka' stsal pa/grogs po dag chad pa drag po rnam pa lnga
158b3(mdo sde): gzhir 'gyur ba'i thub mo'i rtsa ba 'di'i phyir/'thab tu ci yod ces bka' stsal nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis chags pa de nyid spangs pa las brtsams nas//de dang 'thun pa'i
158b4(mdo sde): chos bstan te/des na bram ze brgya phrog du ma de dag gis stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du/khe cig ni dro bar gyur pa skyed do//kha cig gis ni spyi bo dang /bden pa dang
158b5(mdo sde): 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang /'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog dang /mthong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed do//kha cig gis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so//
158b6(mdo sde): kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so//kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so//kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa
158b7(mdo sde): nyid mngon sum du byas so//kha cig ni 'khor lo so sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i so bon bskyed do//kha cig gis ni stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ba dang /kha cig
159a1(mdo sde): gis ni brgya byin du 'gyur ba dang /kha cig gis ni tshangs par 'gyur ba dang /kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub dang /kha cig gis ni rang
159a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon bskyed do//'khor de dag gi nang nas pil cher ni sangs rgyas la gzhol/
159a3(mdo sde): chos la 'bab/dge 'dun la bab par byas te bkod nas/gtsug lag khang du gshegs so//de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus
159a4(mdo sde): pa btsun pa bram ze 'di rnams kyis las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas/kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/mi mnyes par mi bgyis/kha
159a5(mdo sde): cig gis ni rab tu byung nas/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bgyis lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yang dag par
159a6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la/'di rnams las kha cig ni dge snyen du gyur to//kha cig ni rab tu byung nas der de dag gis tshe gcig tu skyabasu 'gro ba
159a7(mdo sde): dang /bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs te/dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des ni/da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to////bam po sum cu
159b1(mdo sde): drug pa//khyab 'jug ces bya ba ni/bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+har ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/dge slong gi dge 'dun mang po dge slong stong dang thangs gcig ste/thams cad//
159b2(mdo sde): kyang sngon gyi ral pa can sha stago go//thams cad kyang dgra btso pa zag pa zad pa/bye ba byas pa/byed pa byas pa/rang gi don rjes su thob pa/srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/yang dag/
159b3(mdo sde): pa'i shes pas sems rnam par grol ba sha stag dang lhan cig tu yul rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/yul ma ga d+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten rab brtan zhes bya ba na/smyig ma'i nags khrod
159b4(mdo sde): kyi rgyud thog thag gshegs nas/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rab brtan du byon nas/ma ga d+ha pa rnams kyi mchod rten rab brtan gyi phyogs der bzhugs so//de nas yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal
159b5(mdo sde): po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun mang po dge slong stong dang thabs gcig tu yul ma ga d+ha ra ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/yul ma ga d+ha
159b6(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi mchod rten rab brtan zhes bya ba na/smyig ma'i nags khrod du byon to zhes thos so//thos nas kyang rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang /rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang /shing rta
159b7(mdo sde): khri nyis stong dang /rgod ma stong brgyad brgya dang /yul ma ga d+ha ne gnas po'i bram ze dang /khyim bdag stong phrag du ma dag dang thabs gcig tu rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste/bcom
160a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das blta ba dang /bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ba las grong khyer gyi sgor byung ba nA/de'i
160a2(mdo sde): mgo bo las cod pan lhung nas/de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis bcom ldan 'das blta ba ma legs pa zhig tu mi 'gyur grang snyam mo//de nas lha rnams kyis sbran
160a3(mdo sde): pa/'di ni legs par 'gyur te/khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das blta ba dang /bcom ldan 'das la bkur bsti bya ba ni legs par 'gyur ba yin no//de lta mod kyi khyod gang
160a4(mdo sde): dag dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa de dag kha cig ni khri mon du bcug cing 'dug/kha cig ni yul dag na 'dug gis rgyal po khyod kyis brtson rnams btang ba'i rigs so//
160a5(mdo sde): ljongs dag tu yang dril bsgrags te/de dag lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das blta ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir deng shig ces byas so//de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po
160a6(mdo sde): gzugs can snying pos bcan rnams btang nas/yul na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po thams cad bsdus te/de skye bo phal po che dag dang lhan cig tu yul ma ga d+ha pa rnams kyi mchod
160a7(mdo sde): rten rab brtan zhes bya ba na/smyig mo'i nags khrod kyi rgyud thog thag tu song nas/des rang gi dpung gi tshogs rnams la phyir bltas te/des dmag tshogs chen po mthong nas/
160b1(mdo sde): rgyags pa bskyes te/byad gzugs dang /mthu bdag dang mtshungs pa med do snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen
160b2(mdo sde): nas/de bos kyang chos blta na sdug pa dang /ches byad gzugs bzang ba'i rgyal po lnga brgya mngon par sprul nas/de dag la chos ston cing bzhugs so//de nas yul ma ga rgya'i/
160b3(mdo sde): rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/de srid du gzhon pas 'gro bar bya ba'i sa de srid du bzhan pa don te song nas/rgyal thabs rnam
160b4(mdo sde): pa lnga ste/gtsug gter dang /gdugs dang /ral gyi dang /nor bu dang /rnga yab rnams dang /lham khra bo rnams bzhag nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/
160b5(mdo sde): rgyal po gzugs can+da snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na/rgyal po ches gzugs bzang zhing ches mdzes pa lnga brgya chos nyan cing 'khod pa mthong nas/de'i byad gzugs
160b6(mdo sde): kyi sa rgyags pa gang yin pa de med par gyur to//de nas de 'di snyam sems te/gal te bdag gis bdag gi ming dang rus nas ma smos na/bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis
160b7(mdo sde): ma dgongs so snyam nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/phyin nas/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/bcom ldan/
161a1(mdo sde): 'dras ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bdag gi ming dang rus lan gsum gyi bar du smos te/btsun pa bdag ni yul ma ga
161a2(mdo sde): d+ha'i rgyal po lo sbyas gzugs can snying po lags so//btsun pa bdag ni yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po legs so zhes byas so//bcom ldan
161a3(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po de ni de yin te/khyod ni yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yin no//rgyal po chen po rang gi stan gang yin
161a4(mdo sde): pa la 'dug shing /de nas yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can rnying ngos bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/phyogs gcig tu 'dug
161a5(mdo sde): go/yul ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang /khyim bdag kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das dang
161a6(mdo sde): mngon sum du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//kha cig ni
161a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//kha cig ni thog ring po zhig nas/bcom ldan 'das mthong nas
161b1(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyus 'od srungs ral pa can yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug go/de nas yul ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams
161b2(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te/ci dge sbyong chen po de 'od srung gi thad na chings par spyad pa spyod dam/'on te ltung rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dge sbyong chen po'i thang na tshangs par spyad pa spyod
161b3(mdo sde): ci gu snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams kyi sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas/tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung
161b4(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad de smras pa/lteng rgyas gnas pa khyod kyis ci mthong na/'dir ni me sbar drang srong brtul zhugs spangs//'od srung khyod kyi sbyin bsreg ci phyirare spangs//
161b5(mdo sde): don de nga la kun nas brjod par gyis//gsol pa/'di na kha cig zas dang btung ba rnams//khu bcud 'dod dang bud med bsngags par bgyid//de rnams phung po'i dri mar
161b6(mdo sde): mthong bas na//bdag ni mchod sbyin me la dga' ma mchis/bka' skyel pa/khyod ni 'dod pa rnams la mi dga' zhing //zas sgom stan rnams la yang mi dga' rwa///
161b7(mdo sde): khyod ni ji ltar lha mi'i 'jig rten na//yid dga' 'od srung dris pa'i lan thob shig/gsol pa/phung po med pa zhi mchog ci yang med//'dod dang srid la ma chags gzhan mi
162a1(mdo sde): 'gyur//gzhan gyis bkrir med go 'phang mthong bas na//bdag ni mchod sbyin me la dga' ma mchis//mchod sbyin rnams dang brtul zhugs
162a2(mdo sde): me rnams kyis//grol bar 'gyur snyam bdag gi yid kyang rmongs//'chi 'gro ma mchis gnas mchog ma mthong bas//skye mchi'i rjes 'brang bdag ni lcong bar sbyar/
162a3(mdo sde): mi mchog skyob pa'i legs gsungs 'dus ma byas//go 'phangs de ni bdag gis nga mthong ngo //thub pa rnams 'dren 'go'u tam bden pa'i rtsal//khyod ni skye bo mang phyir/
162a4(mdo sde): byung ba lagos//bka' stsal pa/rab tu rnam par bye ba'i chos rnams la/gnas kyi gshis su bab pa gang yin pa//de ni khyed kyis legs par bsams pa
162a5(mdo sde): yin//khyod kyis gtan la phebs pas legs par 'ongs//'od srung 'khor rnams skyo ba skyed cig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa snang rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis ji ltar sems
162a6(mdo sde): mnyam par bzhag pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/shar phyogs kyi steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed de/
162a7(mdo sde): 'chag pa dang /sdong ba dang /'dug pa dang /nyal bar byed do//me'i khams la snyoms par 'jug par byed do//tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can mo'i khams
162b1(mdo sde): la snyoms par zhugs pa'i lus las 'od gzer rnam par tshogs byung ste/sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /btsod ka dang /shel gyi kha dog lta bu rnams
162b2(mdo sde): 'byung ngo //tshe 'phrul zung du yang ston par byed de/lus kyi stod nas ni me 'bar la/lus kyi smad nas ni chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab po/lus kyi smad nas me 'bar la/lus kyi
162b3(mdo sde): stong nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab po//shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du/lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dang /byang phyogs su yang de dang 'dra bar byas so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa

162b5(mdo sde): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs tau/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
162b6(mdo sde): 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags so//bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so//bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ston pa lags so//bdag ni badre bar gshegs pa'i nyan
162b7(mdo sde): thos lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'od srung de ni de yin no//de ni de yin te/'od srung khyod kyi ston pa ni nga yin no//khyed ni nga'i nyan thos yin no//
163a1(mdo sde): 'od srung khyod rang gi stan ji lta ba bzhin du 'dug shig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung rul pa can rang gi stan ji lta ba bzhin du 'a/
163a2(mdo sde): de nas yul ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems/lteng rgyas 'od srung ngem pa can dge sbyong chen po go ru ta ma'i bang na tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa/
163a3(mdo sde): yin gyis/dge sbyong chen po steng rgyus 'od srung gi byang na myos par spyad pa spyod de ni ma yin no//sgyus mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po
163a4(mdo sde): byungs gzugs can stong bro la bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po gzugs ni skye long skye la/'grib kyang 'grib ste/de'i skye ba yang rig par bya dgos la/'grib pa yang rigs
163a5(mdo sde): por bya dgas so//rgyal po chen po tshor ba dang /'du shes dngadu byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa yang skye yang skyol/'grib kyod 'grib ste/de'i skye ba yang rig pa
163a6(mdo sde): byA gos s+ho/'grib pa yang rig par bya dgos so//rgyal po chen po gzugs skye ba dang /'grib pa'i chos can yin par rig nas/gzugs de yongs su shes so//rgyal
163a7(mdo sde): chen po tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang / shes pa skye ba dang /'grib pa'i chos can yin par rig nas/rnam par shes pa de sangs su gas//
163b1(mdo sde): /rgyas nan po gzugs yongs su shes na/gzugs de la bdug gi yin na snyam du dzin par mi byed/len par me byed/gnas par smi spyod/na par zhon pa sa spyod du/

163b3(mdo sde): min pa dang /gnas par mi byed/mngon par zhen por mi byed do//rgyal po chen po gzugs la mi 'dzin mi len mi gnas/mngon par glen par myi byed na/dr-i gA tu med pa

164a1(mdo sde): su zhig 'gyur/ma skyes shing ma byung la/'byung bar mi 'gyur na yang phung po 'di dag ni 'dor la/phung po gzhan ni len par mi 'gyur ro/

164a4(mdo sde): dgra skye ba na/sdug bsngal 'di nyid skye la/'gog pa na sdug bsngal 'di nyid 'gag go/skye ba na 'du byed rnams nyid skye la/'grag pa na 'dra/byed rnams nyid 'gago//

164b1(mdo sde): rnams dang /ngan 'gror 'gro ba rnams dang /sems can las ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba rnams kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//kye sems can 'di dag ni

164b7(mdo sde): de ltar shes shing /de ltar mthong bas na/nga ni 'di skad du nga ni bdag de yin no zhe 'am/nga ni sems can nam/srog gam/skye bo 'o ma/gso ba 'am/gang zag gam//

165a3(mdo sde): tshugs ni 'i /di da 'di 'byung pa/ skyes pasna 'di skye ba m+WAr d+he/'di lta / pa'i rkyen gyis byed nams 'byung /'du

165b6(mdo sde): lam chad pas 'jug par mi 'gyur la nying mtshams sbyor ba med pas 'gags par 'gyur te/sdug bsngal gyi mtha' ni de kho na yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
165b7(mdo sde): yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyang gzugs can snying po la lan gnyis su bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/gzugs rtag pa yin nam/mi rtag pa yin/
166a1(mdo sde): gsol pa/btsun pa de ni mi rtug pa lags so//bka' stsal pa/mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba yin nam/sdug bsnga
166a2(mdo sde): ma yin/gsol pa/btsun pa de ni sdug bsngal ba lags so//bku' stsal pa/mI d+h+r-ig cing sdug bsngal ba/rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la/ci thos
166a3(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos bdag tu 'dzin cing /'di ni bdag gi yin no//'di ni bdag yin no//'di ni bdag gi bdag yin no snyam du 'dzin tam/gsol ba/
166a4(mdo sde): btsun pa de ni ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa rtag pa
166a5(mdo sde): yin nam/myi rtag pa yin/gsol pa/btsun pa de ni myi rtag pa lags so//bka' stsal pa/mi rtag pa gang yin pa sdug bsngal ba yin nam/sdug bsngal
166a6(mdo sde): ma lan/gsol pa/btsun pa de ni sdug bsngal ba lpags so//dkA' stsal pa/mi rtag cing sdug bsngal lo/rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin pa de li thos par
166a7(mdo sde): ldan pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos bdag tu 'dzin cing /'di ni bdag gi yin no//'di ni bdag yin no//'di ni bdag gi bdag yin no//snyam du 'dzin tam/gsol pa/
166b1(mdo sde): btsun pa de ni ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po de bas na gzugs gang yang rung ste/'das pa dang /mA 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba nang gi 'am/phyi rol gyi
166b2(mdo sde): 'am/rags pa 'am/cha phra ba 'am/ngan pa 'am/bzang po 'am/nye ba 'am ring ba gang rung ba de dag thams cad ni bdag gi yang ma yin de ni bdag kyang ma yin te/de kho na lhur
166b3(mdo sde): yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis blta bar bya'o//rgyal po chen po ji snyam sems/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes
166b4(mdo sde): bApA gang yang rung ste/'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba nang gi 'am/phyi rol gyi 'am/rags pa 'am/cha phra ba 'am/ngan pa 'om/bzang po 'am/nye ba 'am/
166b5(mdo sde): ring ba gang yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni bdag gi yang ma yin de ni bdag kyang ma yin/de ni bdag gi bdag kyang ma yin te/de kho na ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag
166b6(mdo sde): pa'i shes rab kyis blta bar bya'o//de ltar mthong ba'i thos pa dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos ni gzugs las skyo bar 'gyur ro//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
166b7(mdo sde): rnams dang /rnam par shes pa las skyo bar 'gyur ro//skyon me chags par 'gyur ro//ma chags na rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro//rnam par grol ni bdag ni rnam par grol ma
167a1(mdo sde): snu du sa shes g+ha rigs pa ga ste/dag gi skye ba ni zad//zangs pa stod pa spyad dan to//b+hu ba ni b+h+yas s+ho//skrod pa 'di smras gnan
167a2(mdo sde): med do snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug sa/chos kyi rnam bla skye 'di shad pa na/yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyu ma po b+ha'i snangs gzugs can snying po//skye brgyad khri dang
167a3(mdo sde): ma ge b+h+yo bram ze dang /khyim bdag stong phyag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med ci dri ma dang dril po skyes so//de nas yul ma gu d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs
167a4(mdo sde): maung pos chos byu/chos sto/chos rnyigs/chos kyi gting sbyisasomanyi sas rga'i/tsam+b+ha las rgyal tAM/gzhan gyi drung ma 'jog nga /gzhan gyi
167a5(mdo sde): g+h+ri baM med la/ston pa'i bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas/stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la bla
167a6(mdo sde): logs su thal mo snang ba brgyad de/bcoMm ldan 'das la 'di skad ces ga stsol to//btsun pa bdag ni 'phrugs legs so//'phags lags so//btsun pa bdag ni
167a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang /chos da /dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyas su mchi'o//bdag dang sprin chad 'i srid 'tsho'i bar du khong nus dad pa'i dge sbyin lags gzungs dugaso
167b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol/bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyi'o//ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bcom
167b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /sung gsos dang sman zong rnams sbyar bar 'tshal lo//zhes
167b3(mdo sde): gsol te//de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la sogs pa lha brgyad khri dang /

167b5(mdo sde): 'das pA la bkod pa dang /gzhi de las bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pas 'jig rten kun tu rgyas par gyur pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/da ltar
167b6(mdo sde): 'ba' shig ma yin te/'das pa'i dus na yang rgyal po gzugs can snying po las sogs pa lha brgyad khri dang /yul ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang /khyim bdag stong phrag du ma mang po
167b7(mdo sde): 'di rnams bsam gtan bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam lo ngas ji ltar bkod pa dang /bzhi des na nga'i brags pas 'jig rten rgyas par
168a1(mdo sde): /gyur pa de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/grong khyer rdul ldan zhes bya ba na/rgyal po phyogs kyi bdag po zhes bya ba rgyal po byang/
168a2(mdo sde): de/de'i ringal 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa dang /skye bo dang /mi mang pos gang ba dang /rtsod pa dang /'thab pa zhi pa dang /'khrug pa
168a3(mdo sde): nang 'khrug dang /chom rkun dang /nad dang /mu ge med pa dang /'bras sA lu dang /bu ramo shing dang /ba lang dang /ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/gnod pa med cing tsheras bku
168a4(mdo sde): /bu gcig pa sdug pa la bya ba bzhin rgyal srid byed do//de nas rgyal po de btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/btsun mo la bu chags nas/de zla
168a5(mdo sde): ba dgu 'am/bcu lon pa dang /pu gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/ming rdul zhes bya bar btags so//
168a6(mdo sde): de nas khye'u rdul pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /num snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /rtse bo'i ma ma gnyis ste/ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/
168a7(mdo sde): de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /zho dang /mar dang /zhun mar dang /mar gyi snying ku dang /gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed ba srings te/'tsho'i nang gi pad ma
168b1(mdo sde): bzhin du skye dag par gyur to//de nas gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/khye'u de yi ge slob tu bcug ste/rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang /las kyi/

168b5(mdo sde): lo 'bang ba dang /gcad pa dang /gshag pa dang /lag pas gzung ba dang /rkang pa'i thabs dang /mgo bo skyab pa dang /rgyang mar 'phang pa dang /sgra grags par 'phang ba dang
168b6(mdo sde): gnang du 'phang ba dang /gdon mi za bar phog par bya ba dang /tshabs cher gtab pa rnams kyang bslabs nas/gnas lnga la byang chub par gyur te//rgyal po phyogs kyi bdag po'i
168b7(mdo sde): dun na 'don ni bram ze khyab 'jug ces bya ba yin to/de yang mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa/rtsis mgo'i thabs shes pa'i shes rab dang /dpyad pa dang ldan pa zhig
169a1(mdo sde): ste/de rgyal po phyogs kyi bdagu po'i rgyal po'i 'phrin lngas su b+hA ba thams cad byed la/rgyal po phyogs kyi bdug pos kyang mdun na 'don bram ze khyudar 'jug
169a2(mdo sde): de la rgyal srid gtad nas/khang bzangs kyi steng na 'dug cing /bud med 'ba' shig dang sil snyan gyis rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do//phyi zhig ni bram ze khyab 'jug gi chung

169a7(mdo sde): du gzhugs pa dang /sbyin pa dang /blang ba dang /kha ton bya ba dang /kha ton byed du bzhugs pa'i thabs bslabs nas/los rnam pa drug lo mkhas pa'i bram zer gyur te/
169b1(mdo sde): don nga ga pa'i gnas na chud la byung ba d+hA rma/da sto byas khyon sgo skyong la smras pa/buny+dzan+da don yab 'das pa'i 'og tu yab ste thabs a N+ya m+b+ha sma
169b2(mdo sde): 'jug par 'gyur la/khyod ni 'de'i mnan 'dzin du 'gyur gyis 'di la khyod kyi /sbyi nas skyong dung khyod la 'dus bu yod par 'gyur ro//me sbyong gis spru pa/

169b4(mdo sde): rgyal po phyogs kyi bdag po shin tu mya ngan byed cing sdug bsngal la smre sngags 'don par byed do//de nas gzhon nu rdul gyis gsol pa/lha khyod ci'i slad du bram ze khyab 'jog

169b6(mdo sde): tsi byed byed de/de'i mdzes da rnying khrul chung ngur 'dug go//gzhin nu rdul gyis gsol pa/lha khyod bras ts+tsho khyab 'jug gum pa'i slad du ha cang thugs ngan ma mdzad/haH
169b7(mdo sde): brgyal por ma mdzad/he cang smre sngags 'don par mi mdzad cig dang /lha mkhan po de nyid kyi bu bram ze'i khyo'u me skyong zhes bya ba pi bas kyang chos khyad par du 'phags pa zhig
170a1(mdo sde): mchis pa de ltas mdun na 'don du bsgo bar gsol/'on tang des lha'i rgyal ba'i drin las bgyi ba thams cad bgrod par 'gyur ro//de nas

170a4(mdo sde): bye ba de med par gyur nas rgyal bro rdul zhes bya bar gyur to//de nas rgyal po rdul gyis kyang bram ze'i khye'u mo skyong 'gug pa btang nas de la smras pa/mkhan po khyud kyis

173a2(mdo sde): rgyal sar ma bcug ga bar du snod cig dang /mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su bdag kyang rab tu 'byung bar bya'o zhes smras nas/tshigs su bcad de smras pa//bram ze gang du
173a3(mdo sde): 'gro ba der//bdag kyang der ni 'gro bar bya//bdag gis khyod kyi slob ma bya//bdag gi ston pa khyab 'jug khyod//khyab 'jug chen pos smras pa//so so'i skye bo gang chags
173a4(mdo sde): pa//'dod pa de ni spangs par gyis//'dod pa rnams la ma lte bar//bden pa'i chos la gnas par gyis//rgyal po rdul gyis smras pa//tshungs pa dag par skyo ba'i phyir//
173a5(mdo sde): nam mkha' dri med lta bu dang //nor bu bai dUr dag pa ltar//tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya//khyab 'jug chen pos smras pa//rgyal po chen po de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na
173a6(mdo sde): de ltar mdzod ces byas nas//bram ze khyab 'jug chen pos rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po drug la smras pa//kye bdag ni skra dang khwa spu brags te gos tshon can bgos la yang dag m+b+hi'i ngang
173a7(mdo sde): pa kho nas/khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'dod na//khyed ji ltar byed sems/de dag gis smras pa/mkhan po khyod lo bdun gyi bar nga
173b1(mdo sde): sdod cig dang //lo bdun ldon nas bdag cag gis bu dang nu blo dag rgyal sar bcug la//mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung ngo //khyab 'jug chen pos smras pa//
173b2(mdo sde): kye lo bdun ni ha cang yun rings ches so//'dod pa rnams ni chags par 'gyur ba'o//longs spyod rnams na rgyags par 'gyur ba'o//'tsho ba dang 'chi ba ni drod gzung dka'o//lo bdun
173b3(mdo sde): lon nas khyed rab tu 'byung ngam mi 'byung yang gtol med kyis//bdag ji rab tu 'byung ngo //de dog gis smras pa/mkhan po khyod re shig sdod cig dang /lo drug gam/lnga 'am/
173b4(mdo sde): bzhi'am/gsum mam/gnyis sam/gcig gam/de bzhin du zla ba bdun nam/drug gam/lnga 'am/bzhi'am/gsum mam/gnyis sam/gcig gem/zhag
173b5(mdo sde): bdun nam/drug gam/lnga 'am/bzhi 'am/gsum mam/gnyis sam/gcig lon na/bdag cag gis bu dang nu bo rnams rgyal sar bcug nas/mkhan po rab tu
173b6(mdo sde): byung ba'i rjes su bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung ngo //khyab 'jug gis smras pa/kye zhag bdun yang ha cang yun mi rings sam//'dod pa rnams ni chags par 'gyur ba'o//longs spyod/
173b7(mdo sde): rnams ni rgyags par 'gyur ba'o//'tsho ba dang 'chi ba ni drod bzung bar dka'o//zhag bdun lon nas kyang khyed rab tu 'byung ngam mi 'byung gtol med kyis bdag rje rab tu 'byung ngo //
174a1(mdo sde): de dag gis smras pa/zhag bdun yang btung ste/deng nyid du bdag cag gis bu dang nu bo dag rgyal snang bcug nas mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su bdag
174a2(mdo sde): cag kyang rab tu 'byung ngo //khyab 'jug gis smras pa//khyed kyis de'i dus la bab par shes na/de ltar gyis shig/de nas bram ze khyab 'jug chen pos rgyal rigs kyi rgyal
174a3(mdo sde): po drug gi 'khor bltas nas/bram ze che zhing mtho ba bdun bltas so//bram ze che zhing mtho ba bdun bltas nas/bshes pa'i bud med bzhi bcu bltas so//bshes pa'i bud med
174a4(mdo sde): bzhi bcu bltas nas/bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya bltas so//bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya bltas nas/shing rta'i kha lo pa rnams dang /glang po che'i kha lo pa rnams dang /rta pa
174a5(mdo sde): rnams dang /shing rta po rnams dang /mtshon cha can rnams dang /'phong po rnams dang /zhe 'bring ba rnams dang /tshal za ba rnams dang /drag shul can rnams dang /
174a6(mdo sde): dpa' bo rnams dang /rab gnon rnams dang /chen po che chen po rnams dang /rgyal po'i sras du ma dag bltas te/kye bdag ni skra dang kha spu bregs nas/gos tshon can
174a7(mdo sde): rnams bgos la yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung na/khyed ji ltar byed sems/de dag gis smras pa/bdag cag kyang mkhan po rab tu 'byung ba'i
174b1(mdo sde): rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo //khyab 'jug gis smras pa//khyed kyis de'i dus la bab par shes na/de bzhin du gyis shig ces byas nas/bram ze khyab 'jug chen pos khyim gyi
174b2(mdo sde): 'khor thams cad btang ste/sbyin bdag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas te/du ma zhig dbul por btang nas/skra dang kha spyi bregs te/gos tshon can rnams bgos nas yang
174b3(mdo sde): dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //rab tu byung nas kyang nags khrod gcig tu gnas bcas nas/yal ka dang lo ma'i spyil po phug ste/de de na
174b4(mdo sde): 'dug nas bsam gton bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed te/rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar gyur to//khyab 'jug rab tu byung nas/rgyal po rdul g.yog 'khor 'bum
174b5(mdo sde): phrag du ma dang /skra dang kha spu bregs te/gos tshon can rnams bgos nas yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas/khyim nas med par rab tu byung ngo //de bzhin du rgyal rigs kyi
174b6(mdo sde): rgyal po drug gi 'khor dang /bram ze che zhing mtho ba bdun dang /bshes pa'i bud med bzhi bcu dang /bramo ze'i khye'u lnga brgya dang /shing rta'i kha lo pa rnams dang /glang po
174b7(mdo sde): tshe'i kha la ba rnams dang /rta pa rnams dang /shing rta pi rnams dang /mtshon cha can rnams dang /zham ring ba rnams dang /chel za ba rnams dang /drag shul can rnams dang //
175a1(mdo sde): dpa' bo rnams dang /rab gnon rnams dang /chen po che chen po rnams dang /rgyal po'i sras du ma dag skra dang kha spu bregs te/gos tshod can
175a2(mdo sde): rnams bgos nas/yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim med par khyab 'jug rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ste/bram ze khyab 'jug gis thams cad la yid la byed
175a3(mdo sde): pa'i lung phog nas/de dag gis kyang brtson pa dang /bsgrub pa dang /'bad pas bsam gtan bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do//de nas bram ze che zhing /
175a4(mdo sde): mthob khyab 'jug gi ming bram ze che zhing mtho ba khyab 'jug ces bya bar gyur pa de med par gyur nas/ston pa khyab 'jug ces bya bar gyur to//dge slong dag ji snyam du
175a5(mdo sde): sdems/de'i tshe skyon po khyab 'jug ces bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no//de'i tshe rgyal po rdul ces bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rgyal po gzugs can
175a6(mdo sde): snying po 'di kho na yin no//de'i tshe rgyal po rdul gyis mgo drangs pa'i skye bo 'bum phrag du mar gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos mgo drangs
175a7(mdo sde): pa'i lha brgyad khri dang /yul ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang /khyim bdag stong phrag du ma po 'di dag kho na yin te/de'i tshe yang ngas rgyal po rdul la sogs pa yul gyi mi du ma dang /
175b1(mdo sde): bram ze dang /khyim bdag stong phrag du ma rab tu byung nas/bsam gtan bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod de bzhi des na/nga'i grags pas 'jig rten rgyas par gyur to//
175b2(mdo sde): de ltar yang ngas rgyal po gzugs can snying po lo sogs pa lha brgyad khri dang /ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang /khyim bdag stong phrag du ma dam pa'i chos kyi bcud kyis tshim par byas nas/
175b3(mdo sde): g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang /bde ba'i mya ngan las 'o'adas pa la bkod do///bam po sum cu bdun pa//zab mo zhes bya ba ni/gleng gzhi
175b4(mdo sde): mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/skye bo phal po che 'thab pa dang /mtshang 'bru ba dang /'gyed pa dang /rtsod pa la zhugs shing 'khod do//sangs
175b5(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang /ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas
175b6(mdo sde): pa/mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/'gro lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/skye mched drug la mkhas pa/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul pa/rnam par thar
175b7(mdo sde): pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/yang dag po'i sang+ga'i sgra chen po
176a1(mdo sde): sgrogs pa rnams ni/chos nyid kyi nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/
176a2(mdo sde): su ni rgud/su ni dang /su ni phongs shing 'dug/su ni nyams nga bar gyur/suM ni gnod pa ldan/su ni phongs pa dang nyams nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/su ni ngan
176a3(mdo sde): song du gzhol/su ni ngan song du 'bab/su ni ngan song du bab/su ni ngas ngan song nas phyang ste/mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/su ni nyes par
176a4(mdo sde): spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/
176a5(mdo sde): su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma skyed pa las bskyed por bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su
176a6(mdo sde): smin zin pa las/ye shes kyi mtshon kyis brtol bar bya//su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu yod par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug
176a7(mdo sde): rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas//dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid//gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la//sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med//de nas bcom
176b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/skye bo phal che gdul ba'i dus la bab ste/de dag ngas 'thab pa dang /mtshang 'dru ba dang /'gyeng pa dang /cod pa las bzlogaste/g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa//
176b2(mdo sde): grub pa dang /bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la dgod par bya'o//snyam du dgongs nas/snga dro sham thabs dang /chos gos gsol te/lhung bzed bsnams nas/mnyan du yid
176b3(mdo sde): par bsod snyoms la gshegs te/skye bo phal po che gau la ba der gshegs nas/skye bo phal po che de dag gis thag ring po zhig nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //
176b4(mdo sde): mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar bar gyur te/bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gdan bshams nas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so//logs so//bcom ldan 'das tshur
176b5(mdo sde): gshegs bzhugs su gsol//de nas gdun pa shams pa lo bzhugs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis skye ba phal po chel bka' stsal pa/grogs po dag ci byed cing 'khod/gnon
176b6(mdo sde): dang 'thab dgos nas/gzhan dang 'thab cing 'dug go//de rnams kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag su dang 'thub 'tshal lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
176b7(mdo sde): sprul pa/grogs po dag 'o na 'khod cig dang /ngas khyod la rgyas par brjod par bya'o//de nas skye bo phal po cheng dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tsham
177a1(mdo sde): te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che de dag la bka' stsal pa/khyed ni nyon mongs pa rnams/
177a2(mdo sde): dang 'thab dgos kyis//nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i phyir 'bad par gyis shig ces/bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la de lta bu dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/des na de dag gi/
177a3(mdo sde): khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa med par gyur nas/stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lteba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
177a4(mdo sde): 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/de dag gis bden pa mthong nas/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mi sbyar ba btud de/
177a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos
177a6(mdo sde): bo 'thob tu rung na/bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag dge slong tshur shog ces
177a7(mdo sde): bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste/bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/de dag la lung yang phog ste/de dag gis kyang brtson pa dang /bsgrub pa dang /'bad pas nyon
177b1(mdo sde): smos pa rnams cad/sa nus/ rlos da man snyam du b+h+ya te/dadag ga sus ga sas gsum pa da nags das shAr gyur nas/baspyod da yang

178a1(mdo sde): gnas shig na/drang srong 'khor lnga brgya yod pa zhig gnas so//de nas mchod sbyin byed pa der/drang srong des bram ze de dag 'thab pa zhi bar bya/
178a2(mdo sde): ba'i phyir/de lta bu dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/des na 'thab mo de yang zhi bar gyur la/bram ze rnams kyang skye bo skyes nas/de nyid kyi thad du rab tu byung ngo //de dag der
178a3(mdo sde): rab tu byung nas/bsam gtan bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
178a4(mdo sde): la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no//de'i tshe bram ze lnga brgyar gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni skye ba phal po che 'di dag kho na yin te/de'i tshe yang ngas skye bo phol
178a5(mdo sde): che 'thab pa zhi bar byas nas/bsam gtan bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod do//da ltar yang ngas skye bo pal po che 'thab pa zhi bar byas nas/g.yung

178a7(mdo sde): thams cad rab tu byung nas/der 'di rnams kyi tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na/da ltar rnam par grol bar
178b1(mdo sde): gyur to//klu zhes bya ba ni/gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi blon po chen po zhig gyod cig la btags te/ci bdog pa phrogs nas/
178b2(mdo sde): chen du bcug pa las/de dri nas dang me gyis mnar t+ti shin//de nas des smon lam log pa btab nas/shi 'phos te dus las 'das pa'i 'og tu gnod sbyin ma
178b3(mdo sde): rungs pa zhig tu skyes nas/des yul ko sa la de thams cad du mI nad btang ste/skye bo phal po che dag kha btag par gyur nas/ltas mkhan dag gis smras pa/blon
178b4(mdo sde): bo chen po des 'tsho kar smon lam log par btab nas/gnod sbyin ma rungs par skyes tAM/des mi nad 'di dag gtang ngo zhes byas/de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo mang po
178b5(mdo sde): de dag ci bya gtol med par gyur to//de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsams pa/'di ni sus kyang gdul bar mi nus kyis/'di'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba
178b6(mdo sde): gdab dgos so snyam ste/bcom ldan 'das gra la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs
178b7(mdo sde): gcig tu 'dug nas/rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni klu ma rungs pa/dga' bo dang /
179a1(mdo sde): dga' bo la sogs gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang btul/gnod sbyin ma rungs pa 'brog gnas la sogs pa gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang btul/btsun
179a2(mdo sde): pa blon po chen po che ge mo zhig gis smon lam log par btab ste/gnod sbyin ma rungs por skyes nas/des bdag gi yul du mi nad btang na/bcom ldan 'das kyis
179a3(mdo sde): thugs brtse ba'i slad du gnod sbyin ma rungs pa de gdul bar gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas rgyal
179a4(mdo sde): po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de/rjes su yi rengs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom
179a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis thad nas song ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phral gyis gnod sbyin de rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi 'dab du bzhag nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis de
179a6(mdo sde): gdul ba'i phyir/me chen po sprul te/de'i kho re khor yug nas bdag nyid me chen pos 'khor bar mthong ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung 'ba' shig zhi bar
179a7(mdo sde): mthong ngo //de nas de 'jigs shing skrag nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin ma rungs pa de la bka' stsal pa/
179b1(mdo sde): zhon bzangs khyod kyis ston mi dge ba'i las byas pas/rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsad pa yin na/da yang khyod 'dir skyes nas/skye bo mang po kha 'dog par byed na/'di nas/
179b2(mdo sde): shi 'phos pa'i 'og tu khyed kyi 'gro ba ni gang yin/skye gnas ni gang yin/'gro ba'i sa ni gang yin/gnod sbyin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ci stsal
179b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sdig pa'i las 'di thong shig/gnod sbyin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' ci stsal pa bzhin du 'tshal lo//
179b4(mdo sde): de skad ces gsol to/des skyabs su 'gro ba dang /bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs nas/bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/btsun pa bdag gis sdig pa'i las btang
179b5(mdo sde): lags te/btsun pa deng slan chad mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po rnams kyi srung ma dang /skyong ba ni bdag lags so//de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom
179b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin ma rungs pa de btul nas/skye bo phal po che de dag 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas su bkod pa la gzigs
179b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de ltar 'ba' shig ma yin te/'das pa'i dus na yang ngos gnod sbyin ma rungs pa 'di btul nas/skye bo phal po che ji ltar 'jigs
180a1(mdo sde): pa med pa'i gnas su bkod pa de nyon cig dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/grong khyer bA ra na se nA/rgyal po tshangs pas byin rgyal
180a2(mdo sde): po byed de/de'i tshe yul ka shir/klu gdug pa dug mi bzad pa zhig byung ste/dris grong yang stong par byed/ljongs kyang stong par byed cing /pU ra na si'i
180a3(mdo sde): phyogs su chas pa las/rgyal lo tshangs pas byin gyis thos nas de thos ma thag tu 'jigs pa chen po skyes te/des dpung gi tshogs yon lag bzhi go bskon te
180a4(mdo sde): btang nas/khyed deng la klu gdug pa de sod cig ces bsgo'o//de nas de dag gis rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/gsol pa/lha de ni dpung gi tshogs kyis dgum
180a5(mdo sde): par mi nus kyis/sngags ma sman gyis de dgum par nus lags so//yang na dge ba'i tshul gyis bkur ba'i dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis gdul bar nus
180a6(mdo sde): lag so zhes gsol to//de nas de'i tshe ba rA ni si de nyid na gdol pa'i khye'u byams pa'i rang bzhin can/snying rje tsho ba sems can la byams pa zhig gnas
180a7(mdo sde): pa des/skye bo mang po de dag ci bya gtol med par gyur pa mthong nas/mthong ma thog tu de snying rje skyes nas ngas skye bo mang po rnams la smras po/khyed ci bya gtol
180b1(mdo sde): med par bya mi dgos kyis/bdag gis klu gdug pa de gdul bar bya'o zhes byas so//de nas dri'i pha ma gnyis na re/de ni dbugs gdug pa yin te/khyod kyis ngo 'du
180b2(mdo sde): mi nus so//khye'us smras pa/byams pa'i go cha gyon pa la des chung zad kyang gnod par mi byed mi nus so zhes byas nas/khye'u des phyogs gang na klu gdug pa de 'dug pa'i
180b3(mdo sde): phyogs der song nas/klu gdug pa des thag ring po zhig nas/khye'u de mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang khros nas khye'u de la dbugs bting ngo //de nis khyi'i de byams pa la
180b4(mdo sde): snyoms par zhugs nas/byims pa'i lta bas klu gdug pa de la boltas te/des bltas ma thag tu drug mdo par gyur to//de nas khye'u des klu sbrul de lag/pa gnyis
180b5(mdo sde): kyis blangs nas/mi myi gnos pa'i sa phyogs su gzhag go/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin dang /skye bo mang po gzhan dag gis gdol pa'i khye'u che ga mo zhig gis klu
180b6(mdo sde): gdug pa btul lo zhes thos nas/thos ma thag tu rgyal po de rang nyid gdol pa'i khye'u de'i thad du song nas/des khye'u dal dam bya sku gcig 'dom du bcug ste/khya
180b7(mdo sde): khyod la dam pa sna gcig sbyin no zhes byas so//khye'us smras pa/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te gnas par mdzod cig/yul na gnas pa'i mi rnams
181a1(mdo sde): kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gzung bar mdzod cig ces byas so//de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis/khye'u de longs spyod kyi
181a2(mdo sde): dbyings chen po byin nas/dge ba bcu'i lus kyi lam yang dag par blangs te 'dug go/yul na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod
181a3(mdo sde): do//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe gdol pa'i khye'ur gyur pa/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni de nyid yin no//de'i
181a4(mdo sde): klu gdug par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/gnod sbyin ma rungs pa 'di kho na yin no//de'i tshe skye bo bral po tshor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/yul kos lan gnas pa'i skye bo
181a5(mdo sde): mang po 'di dag kho na yin te de'i tshe yang ngas klu gdug pa btul nas/skye bo phal po che 'jigaso pa med pa'i gnas su bkod do//da ltar yang ngas gnod sbyin ma rungs pa
181a6(mdo sde): 'di btul nas/skye bo phal po che 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas su bkod do//gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di dag thams
181a7(mdo sde): cad dge bsnyen du gyur te/der 'di rnams kyis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na/da ltar rnam par grol bar
181b1(mdo sde): gyur to//shi bi gnyis shes bya ba del shi bi dang po na/bcom ldan 'das gyad kyi yul sa rgyu zhing gshegs pa lus/chu klung 'thab ldan dang /gling khyer ku shwa
181b2(mdo sde): bAr gyi lam nas gud du bzur te/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla gos bzhi ltab tu gyis te thing shig dang /nga'i rgyab
181b3(mdo sde): mi bde ba re shig blta bar bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo//zhes gsol te/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa bzhin du mnyan
181b4(mdo sde): nas/bla gos bzhi ltab tu byAswA ti bting nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla gos bzhi lhub tu bgyis te ba
181b5(mdo sde): lags na/bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos snum sbyar stug po btab ste/phangs su bzhag
181b6(mdo sde): nasA/smang ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa dang /dran pa dang ldan pa dang /shes bzhin dang ldan pa'i 'du shes thugs la dgongs shing blo g.yos phyogs kyis gzims te/zhabs
181b7(mdo sde): gcig gi steng du gcig bzhag go/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/'khor 'dir so so'i skye bo'i dge slong ji snyed 'dus shing tshogs pa de dag thams cad ci
182a1(mdo sde): sas nas kyis 'dus pa yon /na dun thos sa 'dus pa yin nogag sa sa na/na sa ldan las
182a2(mdo sde): dgos pa/'di na kha cig ni sangs rgyas kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ro//bcig ni nyan thos kyis 'dum bar 'gyur snyam du dgongs nas/nga ldan pa kun dgar bo la ga'
182a3(mdo sde): skyel pa/kun dga' bo khyod byang chub kyi phyogs rnams las stobs par gyis shig/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas 'khor thams cad du sgra
182a4(mdo sde): des gang bar 'gyur ba de lto bur b+hin gyis brlabs s+ho//de nas dge slong mang po dag gis tshig de lta bu gsung ba'i sgra thos nas de dag gis bsams pa/bcom ston
182a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi gtam gyis shig par bskul pas na/deni tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi brtsi ba bzhin
182a6(mdo sde): chos spyan no cog sbyin par 'gyur snyam ste/bcom ldan 'das g.yo ba der dong ste skyugs ni sa/bcom ldan 'das ye byasgyur te 'khod do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun
182a7(mdo sde): dga' bos dge slong rnams la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la rten pa/'dod chags dang bral ba la rten pa/'gog pa la rten
182b1(mdo sde): rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ban/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mngon par shes byas/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bstan to//tshe dang ldan pa dag chos rnam par
182b2(mdo sde): 'byud pa dang /tsun 'grus dang /dga' ba du/shi smras pa dang /ti 'dzin da/ mas yang dag byung chub kyi lan ga na pa la rten pa/'did chags dang
182b3(mdo sde): bo'o rten pa/'gog pa 'i rten pa/rnam par sbyong bas yos su bsgyu ba ni/bcom ldan la sa nyid kyi mngon par shes pas/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bstan
182b4(mdo sde): sa/rlud dz+nyAn bkun ga bu byung chub kyi yan sdug 'di las bcu sman sa sbyong rnams su des bu dang 'dun pa'i stan te/snyun nyan pas nga
182b5(mdo sde): ba'i nA ba 'brel ba gang yin pa de dag gis stan da drug nyid la la 'de bzhin du/nyon mongs pa thams cad sbyas te/dge bo tsam pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//de nas bcan ldan
182b6(mdo sde): 'das kyis/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i gtam gyi 'jug rdzogs par thugs su chud nas/bzhugs te/skyil mo dkrungs bcas nas/sku drang por bsrung ste/dran pa mngon
182b7(mdo sde): bzhag nas/bzhugs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'i bal bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod brtson 'grus son tes/gsol pa/bcom ldan
183a1(mdo sde): 'das brtson 'grus ston lags/bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod brtson 'grus ston tam/gsol pa/bde bar gshegs pa brtson 'grus
183a2(mdo sde): ston lags so//bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo brtson 'grus ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba'o zhes/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
183a3(mdo sde): kyi phyogs dag nyid las brtsams nas/de lta bu dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/des na bcom ldan 'das dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'brel pa gang yin pa de dag gis stan de/
183a4(mdo sde): dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon tu byas te/de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral
183a5(mdo sde): 'gyur nas/gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/rig pas sgro de'i
183a6(mdo sde): sbubs bcom pa/rig pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /chags pa dang /bkur bsti la mi lta ba/dbang po dang
183a7(mdo sde): nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to//de nas de'i tshe dge slong zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/snyan pa'i
183b1(mdo sde): chos ni gsan pa'i phyir//ston pa snang bzhin nyid kyis bskul//khyod la byang chub yan lag rnams//yod na dge slong chos shod cig/gnas brtan kun dgu' mkhas shing
183b2(mdo sde): grags//byang por gyur pas legs shes gsol//dpa' bo khyod kyi gsung rab la//dkar ba'i chos rnams de dag mnga'//dran dang rnam 'byed brtson 'grus dang //
183b3(mdo sde): dga' dang rab sbyongs ting 'dzin dang //btang snyoms 'di dag rdul med pa//khyod kyi byang chub yan lag lags//byang chub yan lag bcud thos nas//byang chub yan lag
183b4(mdo sde): bcud kyang rtog so//bcom ldan sun tshabs che ba las//gnod pa de las bzhengs par gyur//dam chos rin chen 'di ston pa'i//chos kyi mnga' bdag dri nyid kyang //dam
183b5(mdo sde): chos gsan par bzhed gyur na//gzhan lta ji ltar de ni nyan//stobs bcu mnga' bas nye rgyal ni//dge slong rnams kyi shes rab mchog/bstan pa gang yin de nyid kyang //chos
183b6(mdo sde): nyan 'dod pas gzir bar gyur//mdo sde 'dul bam mo 'dzin//mkhas shing tshul dang tshul min shes//de dag dam chos nyan byed na//gzhan lta ji ltar de mi nyan//mkhas
183b7(mdo sde): pa shes 'dod sems bzhag nas//chos bzhin nyan par byed pa ni//sangs rgyas gsung rab sgron med la//de bzhin dga' ba thob par 'gyur//yid dga' lus kyang shin tu sbyang
184a1(mdo sde): bde ba yang ni myong bar 'gyur//bde ba gyur na sems nyid kyi//ting 'dzin la yang reg par 'gyur//sems ni mnyam par bzhag pa yis//'du
184a2(mdo sde): byed g.yul gyis rnam pa rig/srid pa'i 'gro las skye bar 'gyur//tshigs med sems kyis grol bar 'gyur//rtag tu srid 'gro skyo gyur na//lha dang mi la chags pa med//
184a3(mdo sde): dri shing med pa'i me bzhin du//dgra bcom rnams ni mya ngan 'da'//dam chos mnyan pa'i phan yon ni//mang po gzhan yang rgyal bas bstan//de phyir 'dir ni yod snyam
184a4(mdo sde): du//ston pa'i bka' ni mnyan par bya//de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ni legs par smras pa
184a5(mdo sde): gsung ba dang /legs par smras pa bzhed pa lags te/legs par smras pa'i don gyi slad du/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bskul ba mdzad nas/
184a6(mdo sde): bkur bsti dang ldan pas gsan kyang gas na/bshad kyang bshad pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar
184a7(mdo sde): 'ba' shig legs par smras pa gsung ba dang /legs par smras pa bzhed pa ma yin gyi/de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'das pa'i dus na yang legs par smang ba gsung ba dang /
184b1(mdo sde): legs par smras pa bzhed pa yin te/legs par smras pa'i don gyi phyir/ngas mchog tu dka' ba ji ltar spyad pa de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/rgyal po
184b2(mdo sde): pho brang zhing ldan zhes bya ba na/rgyal po shi bi zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /bde bo dang /lo legs pa dang /spyi bo dang /mi mang pos gang ba dang /rtsod
184b3(mdo sde): pa dang /'thab mo zhi ba dang /'khrug pa dang /nang 'khrug dang /choms rkun dang /nad dang /mu ge med pa dang /'bras sA lu dang /pu ram shing dang /pa lang dang /ma he/
184b4(mdo sde): dang ldan par 'dug ste/gnod pa med cing tsher ma bkrugs la/bu gcig pa sdug pa la bya ba bzhin du tshes bzhin du rgyal srid byed do//rgyal po de yang byams pa'i rang bzhin can/
184b5(mdo sde): snying rje dang ldan pa/sems can la byams pa/sbyin pa la sred pa zhig ste/de sbyin po dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa la zhugs te/zas 'dod pa la ni zas sbyin par
184b6(mdo sde): byed/skomi 'dod pa la sgrom sbyin par byed/gos 'dod pa la ni gos sbyin par byed/rgyan 'dod pa las ni rgyan sbyin par byed/mal sten 'dod pa la ni mal stan sbyin par byed/
184b7(mdo sde): gzhan pa 'dod pa la ni bzhon po sbyin par byed/yo byad gzhan 'dod pa la ni yo byad gzhan sbyin par byed do//nad gso ba'i nad brang bcas te/yo byad thams cad sbyor nas
185a1(mdo sde): sman pa rnams dang /nad g.yogs rnams bskos te/nad pa rnams dang /mgon med pa rnams kyi rim gro byed de//bzang ba dang bca' ba//
185a2(mdo sde): gtsang ma mang po dag kyang sta gon byas te/nam mkha' la gnas pa dang /chun gnas pa dang /thang la gnas pa'i srog chags rnams la sbyin par byed do//de'u yi
185a3(mdo sde): dam 'di lta bu yang bcas te/da byin chad bdag gis thams cad la thams cad sbyin par bya ste/'jig rten dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi la mo la dgod par bya'o zhes dang
185a4(mdo sde): bcas nas/des 'jig rten thams cad dge ba bcu'i lus kyi lam la bkod do//der dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir/sems can phal
185a5(mdo sde): cher shi ba'i 'og tu lha'i nang du skyes nas/de dag gis lha'i gnas rnams gang bar gyur to//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa 'di ci zhig sgrub/brgya byin
185a6(mdo sde): du 'gyur ba sgrub pam/'on te tshangs par 'gyur ba sgrub ci gu snyam mo//de nas des bltas na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub cing 'du//de nas lho'o//
185a7(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/ci 'di sems can brten po yin nam/'on te sems can mi brtan pa yin/bdag gis ji brtags la/gal te sems can
185b1(mdo sde): brtan po yin na ni mchod pa bya'o//de sems can brtan po ma yin na yang 'di'i sems stobs bskyed par bya'o snyam nas/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bdag nyid srin po'i gzugs su
185b2(mdo sde): mngon par sprul nas/rgyal po shi ba'i khangs bzangs kyi char khyab la 'dug ste/tshigs su btsod pa'i phyed smras pa/kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag/skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos
185b3(mdo sde): yin//zhes smras nas/lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can/cang ma zer bar 'dug go/de nas rgyal po shi bis lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs
185b4(mdo sde): can gyis tshig de lta bu brjod pa thos so//thos nas kyang des bsams pa/gcig tu na ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i sgo phye'o//gcig tu na ni yang dag par
185b5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam bstan to snyam mo//de nas rgyal po shi bis lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i tshe lugs can/khangs bzangs kyi char kha ba la 'dug par mthong ngo //
185b6(mdo sde): mthong nas kyang skyen par langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar te/lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas smras pa
185b7(mdo sde): grogs po tshigs su bcad pa de tshang bar smros shig dang /bdag gis slob ma bgyis te mnyan to//brgya byin gyis smras pa/khyod kyis bdag gi slob ma byos pas ci la pha ni//
186a1(mdo sde): bdag ni bkres shing bsgoms pas gzir te/ci byA gtol med par zla 'dug go/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/grogs po tshigs su
186a2(mdo sde): bcad pa tshangs par smros shig dang /bdag gis khyod kha zas kyis tshim par bya'o//lho'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin gyi tsho lugs can gyis smras pa/grogs po khyod kyis nga kha zas
186a3(mdo sde): kyis tshim par byed nus sam/nga'i kha zas dang skyom ji lta bu yin pa de ni khyod kyis sbyin par dka'o//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/khyod kyi zas skom ci yin/des smras pa
186a4(mdo sde): mi 'phral du bsod pa'i sha dron po ni za/khrag don po ni 'thung ngo //de nas byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/de lta bu'i sha khrag ni gsod par ma byas kyi bar du mi rnyed la//
186a5(mdo sde): bdag gis legs par smras pa'i don gyi phyir/sems can gzhan su la yang gnod pa byed mi phod do snyam nas smras pa/gal te bdage bri sha khrag khyod za zhing 'thung phod na ni/
186a6(mdo sde): grogs po bdag gis sbyin nus ches kyis/tshigs su bcad pa tshang bar smros shig dang /legs par smras pa'i don gyi phyir//bdag gis khyod la rang gi sha khrag sbyin no//
186a7(mdo sde): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshigs su bcad pa tshang bar smras pa/kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag/skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin//skyes nas 'gag par 'gyur ba ste/
186b1(mdo sde): de dag nye bar zhi ba dad+ma//de nas byang chub sems dpas tshigs su bcud pa tshangs pa de gus dang /mnos nus/yun ring mo zhig tu kha ton du sbyangs nas bsams pa/'di ni mya
186b2(mdo sde): ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer gyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i sgo ldan no//'di ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer gyi lam yin no//lam 'ongs yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
186b3(mdo sde): thams cad nges par 'byung ngo snyam nas/mtshon cha rnon po blangs te smras pa/grogs po legs par smrasau ba'i don gyi phyir yon bzhes shig/ces byas nas/brang gi phyogs
186b4(mdo sde): gcig nas shra bcad de/lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can la byin te smras pa/grogs po 'drangs som/des smras pa ma 'drang po so//de bzhin du brang gi
186b5(mdo sde): phyogs ya cig nas bcad de byin no//de bzhin dpung pa'i sha rnams nas/lus thams cad kyi sha bcad cing byin nas smras pa/grags po 'drangs sam/des smras pa ma
186b6(mdo sde): 'drungs so//de nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/da ni lus ril gyis yongs su gtang ba'i dus kho na la bab bo snyam nas/bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
186b7(mdo sde): smon lam btab ste/kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na/bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa/ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
187a1(mdo sde): rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/bag rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams
187a2(mdo sde): kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas nas/tshigs su bcad de sras po/smin pa chen por gyur pa 'di yis na//srid pa dag tu rang byung
187a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas shog/sngon gyi rgyal dbang rnams kyis ma bskul pa'i//skye bo phal chen rgal nas bsgral bar bgyi//de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon
187a4(mdo sde): lam btang nas smras pa/grogs po bdag gis lus 'di ci dga' bar gyis shig/de nas byang chub sems dpas sems bskyed ma thag tu sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos so//na mkha'
187a5(mdo sde): la 'khod pa'i lha rnams kyis me tog gi char phab nas/legs so zhes bya ba byin te/grogs po legs so legs so//khyod kyis mchog tu dka' ba'i lus byas so zhes
187a6(mdo sde): 'dzer to//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/byang chub sems dpa' 'dis mchog tu dka' ba byas te/bdag gis 'di'i lus snga kho bzhin du bsgyur ba ni
187a7(mdo sde): nus mod kyi/'on kyang bdag gis 'od nyid kyi spro ba tshod zin par bskyed dedagos so snyam nas/byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/grogs po khyod sha rnams gi cad cing rgyus
187b1(mdo sde): pa dang rtsa brang phreng rnams gseb na/sems mi dga' ba cung zad tsam ma skyes sam//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/grogs po bdag gis sha rnams gcod cing rgyus pa dang rtsa
187b2(mdo sde): bradrang breng rnams gseb na/sems mi dga' ba cung zad kyang ma skyes kyi bo dag sdug bsngal myong ba na/sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /yi dgas su skyes pa'i
187b3(mdo sde): sems can rnams 'ba' shig la snying rje'i dbang du gyur to//b+ha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can gyis smras pa/grogs po khyod kyi rigs de la su zhig yang
187b4(mdo sde): ches/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/bdag gis khyod la bden pa bskul ba de lta bus yid ches par bstan to//brgya byin gyis smras pa/de ltar khyod kyi mngon pa'i bskul
187b5(mdo sde): byar chad ni/je khyod bdag gi lus 'di bden pa bskul bas snga mkho bzhin du gyur cig/de skad ces smras ma thag tu/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig
187b6(mdo sde): ngos 'di ltar bdag gi sha rnams gcod cing rgyas pa dang /rtsa brang breng rnams gos ba na/sems chung zad kyang mi dga' ba ma skyes te/bdag gis sdug bsngal myong ba na/sems
187b7(mdo sde): can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /yi dgas su skyes pa'i sems can rnams 'ba' shig la snying rje'i dbang du gyur na/bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi lus 'di snga ma'o//
188a1(mdo sde): /bzhin du gyur cig ces byas so//de skad ces brjod ma thag tu/byang chub sems dpa'i lus snga malo bzhin du gyur to//de nas ngo mthong ma thag tu
188a2(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin yi rangs te/cha lugs de med par byas nas/rang bzhin gyi gzugs su bsgyur te/byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas/smras pa/bdag
188a3(mdo sde): gas khyod la gnod pa'i bsams pas mi dga' bar byas pa ma yin gyi/khyod nyid kyi spro ba bskyed ba'i phyir/bdag gis khyod mi dga' bor byas par zad do//khyod kyi brtson 'grus
188a4(mdo sde): 'di 'dri ba dang /spro ba 'di 'dra ba las na/gdon mi za bar khyod yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur gyis/de'i tshe bdag dran par///
188a5(mdo sde): mdzod cig/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/byang chub sems dpa' la bzod pa gsol nas/de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems//
188a6(mdo sde): de'i tshe rgyal po shi bir gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/de'i tshe yang legs par smras pas smra ba dang /legs par smra bar 'dod par

188b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' la smos pa/khyod kyis bdag gi slob ma byas pas ci la phan/nga khyod la gnod pa zhig zer gyis/gal te gnod pa khyod kyis byed phod na ni/de'i 'og tu tshigs

188b4(mdo sde): dag thams cad bdag gis bgyi'o//grogs po tshigs su bcad pa tshang bar smros shig/de skad ces smras ma thag tu/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/byang chub sems dpa'i
188b5(mdo sde): mdun du tshigs su bcad pa de tshang bar brjod do//de nas byang chub sems dpas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs
188b6(mdo sde): can ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/tshigs su bcad pa de tshangs par mnos te/yun ring mo zhig tu kha ton sbyangs nas/khab sor bzhi pa stong shing leb
188b7(mdo sde): la btsugs pa de lta bu shing leb gnyis kyi bar du bdag nyid nyal te 'ching bar byed do//de de na 'dug bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/kye ma
189a1(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na/bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa/ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'o///
189a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi skyon pa

195a7(mdo sde): la ba der dong ste phyin nos/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bshos len
