340b7(mdo sde): sa rnams kyis yang smras pa/sngon las ci bgyis na de lta bu'i rnam par smin pa myong ba stan cig ces smras pa dang /dge slong ma ud pa las khyed ba rtags par rten cig/khyed la
341a1(mdo sde): bstan to zhes smraso//sngon 'das pa'i dus yun ring po zhig na/khyim bdag shin tu phyug pa zhig la bu med pa las chun ma zhig blangs te/
341a2(mdo sde): chun ma de la shin tu byams pas/ring po ma lon par chun ma de sems can dang ldan par gyur to//zla ba tshang nas bu khye'u zhig bcas te/khyo shug gnyis de la byams shing
341a3(mdo sde): sdug par 'dzin to//de nas chung ma chen mas 'di snyam du bsams so//kho mo ni rigs che zhing btsun mod kyi/bu med pas rigs 'tsho ba po med do//gal te khye'u 'di
341a4(mdo sde): cher skyes na rigs 'tshob cing nor dang longs spyod kyi bdag por 'gyur te/bdag la mi ster cing /bdag sdug par 'gyur ro snyam phrag dog skyes te bsad par bsams
341a5(mdo sde): nas/bu khye'u'i 'tshogs mar khab kyis btsugs te rmya yang mi snang bar byas so//khye'u yang ring por ma len par tshe 'das pa dang /chun mo khams nas chen ma la
341a6(mdo sde): khyod kyis nga'i bu bsad do zhes brgal to//chen mas bsnyon nas 'di skad ces mna' bor ro//kho mos khyod kyi bu bsad par gyur na/kho mo skye ba thams cad du kho mo'i
341a7(mdo sde): khyo sbrul gdug pas bsad par shog shig/bu zhig yod na yang chus khyer ba dang /spyang kis za bar shog shig/kho mo'i lus kyang gson por dur du bcug cing bu'i
341b1(mdo sde): sha za bar shog shig/pha ma'i khyim du me shor te thams cad tshig par shog shig ces smras so//de'i tshe na de skad ces mna' bor ba'i chen ma de ni kho mo yin te/de dag thams
341b2(mdo sde): cad lus kyis myong bar gyur to//dge slong ma de dag gis yang smras pa/bsod nams ci zhig byas na/sangs rgyas mthong zhing sangs rgyas kyis bsu nas rab tu byung ste/'khor
341b3(mdo sde): ba'i mthar phyin par gyur/ud ba las smras pa/sngon par na sde 'dir ri drang srong lhags shes bya ba na/rang sangs rgyas dang /nyan thos dang /mu stegs can mngon par shes pa
341b4(mdo sde): lnga dang ldan pa mang du gnas so//de'i tshe na rang sangs rgyas dag cig bsod snyoms la grong du gshegs pa dang /khyim bdag gis chung ma zhig gis mthong nas rab tu
341b5(mdo sde): dga' ste/bsod snyoms phul nas mchod pa byas so//de nas rang sangs rgyas de na mkha' la 'phags te/lu sau la me 'bar ba dang /chu 'bab pa dang /'gro ba dang /
341b6(mdo sde): nyal ba dang /'dug pa'i rdzu 'phrul bstan nas/khyim bdag gi chung ma nges/kho mo yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus su 'di 'dra ba thob par gyur cig ces smon lam btab po//
341b7(mdo sde): de'i tshe na smon lam btab pa'i khyim bdag gi chung ma de ni kho mo yin no//de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad nas sems rnam par grol te dgra bcom pa thob bo//'di
342a1(mdo sde): ltar dgra bcom pa thob mod kyi/lcags tsha ba'i thur mu spyi bo nas zug nas/rkung mthil du byung ste/rtag tu 'di lta bu'i gnod pa myong ngo //
342a2(mdo sde): de'i tshe na rigs che zhing mtho ba'i dge slong ma lnga brgya snyed kyis dri skad ces smras pa thos nas/lus dang sems skyi g.ya' ste/'dod pa la me ma mur gyi phung po ltar rtogs//
342a3(mdo sde): nas/'dod chags kyi sems yongs su zad do/khyim gyi sdug bsngal la btson rabs kyang drug par rtogs te/dri ma kun zad nas dus gcig tu ting nge 'dzin du
342a4(mdo sde): zhugs te/dgu bcom par gyur to//dge slong ma de dag gis tshig 'thun par/dge slong ma ud pa la bdag cag ni/'dod chags kyis kun nas bcings shing
342a5(mdo sde): glags pa las khyed kyis chos bstan pas 'khor ba'i mthar phyin par gyur to zhes smras so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma ud pa las ni legs par
342a6(mdo sde): bstan to//gong chos ston pa ni gcig gis cig bstan te 'bras bu thob na/sangs rgyas kyi sras yang dag pa zhes bsngags so//de skad ces gsungs pa la 'khor
342a7(mdo sde): mang po rje su yi rang nas mngon par dga' 'o//dge slong ma ud pa la'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o///sgyu shu dol gir ne'i le'u'o////'di skad bdag gis
342b1(mdo sde): thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa 'od ma'i tshal na bzhug so//de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'dug pa las langs nas/
342b2(mdo sde): gos tshugs bcos te pus mo se la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//ko'u di rgyal sogs dge slong rten lnga po 'di ci'i
342b3(mdo sde): rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ma theg tu chos kyi bdud rtsi sngar myong ba bstan du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bku'
342b4(mdo sde): stsol pa/dge slong lnga po 'di dag sngon yang nga'i shrI sngar zos te bde bar gyur pas 'dir yang chos kyi ro thog mar myong ste/rnam par grol bar gyur to//kun dga' bos
342b5(mdo sde): yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/dge slong 'di lngas sngon ci bgyis pa bstan tu gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/sngon 'das pa'i bskal
342b6(mdo sde): pa tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'das pa'i snga rol na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po shu dol gar ne zhes bya ba byung ste/'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhin/
342b7(mdo sde): skyed la dbang byed do//de'i tshe na yul der lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du char mi 'bab po zhes ltas mkhan gyis lung bstan nas/rgyal pos de skad ces thos po dang /rab tu mya ngan
343a1(mdo sde): gyis yi mug par gyur te/'di ltar mu ge chen po byung na/mi mang po 'di dag la lo de snyed kyi kha zas dzI sbyar rnyed snyam nas/rgyal phran dang
343a2(mdo sde): blon po kun bsdus te bgros na/bang bya na 'bru ji snyed yod pa dang /da ltar mi ji snyed yod pa rtsi su sbyar na/lo bcu gnyis kyis bar du mir phul re'i zang du brtsis na yeng la
343a3(mdo sde): bcu gnyis mi thub bo zhes dril bsgrags so//de nas phyi phyir yang mu ge che bar gyur te/tshe 'phyos pa yang mad nas/rgyal blo des ji ltar byas na/mi myang po 'tsho bar 'gyur
343a4(mdo sde): snyam bsams te/btsun mo dang pho brang slas su btsos te/bskyed mos tshal du 'chag tu spong ba las bsti ba'i gnas shig tu phyin nas/btsun mo dang /mi mang po kun
343a5(mdo sde): gnyid kyi 'od pog nyal ba las langs nas/phyogs bzhir phyag 'tshal te/'di lta bu'i yi dam bcas so//yul 'dir mu gro byung bas thams cad bza' ba med par gyur te/
343a6(mdo sde): lcogs kyis bdag gi lus 'di btang ste//tshe 'phos pa'i 'og tu nya chen po zhig tu skyes nas/thams cad bdag gi shaM la za zhing kun 'dangs par shog shig
343a7(mdo sde): ces smon lam btab nas/shing zhig la 'dzegs te/shing kha nas lus g.yang du btang ngo //der tshe 'phos nas chu chen por brdzus te skyes pa'i nya chen po dpag tshad
343b1(mdo sde): brgya pa zhig tu gyur to//de'i tshe yul de na shing mkhan me lnga zhig/chu 'gram du shing thur dong pa las/nya chen po de mthong nas/nya des mi'i skad du 'di skad ces smras so//byedas
343b2(mdo sde): na nga'i sha la chod de ci 'dod pa zo shig/'drangs nas kyang ci theg pa khyim du khyer cig/khyed kyis sngar nga'i sha zos te 'drangs pas na/phyir mngon par sangs rgyas nas kyang thog ma
343b3(mdo sde): khyad chos kyi zas myong bar bya'o//yul me dag la gang bkris pa thams cad kyis kyod ci dga' bar nga'i sha la long shig ces bsgo shig/de'i tshe me lnga pos sha bcad do/
343b4(mdo sde): nas yul mi sbran to/de nas gcig gis cig sbran pas 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad 'dus te/de'i sha la bcad cing zos so//rdzib logs gcig zad tsam nu/
343b5(mdo sde): logs ngos gcig rang bsgyur te/steng ma zad na 'og na lnga de bzhin ste//de bzhin ltag 'og bsgyur zhing lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du thams cad kyis sha bcad cing zos nas/thams cad de la snying
343b6(mdo sde): d+he ba'i sems skyes pas/de'i sha zos pa de dag thams cad tshe'i dus byas pa yang mtho ris kyi lhar skyes so//kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po nyar gyur pa de ni da ltar
343b7(mdo sde): yin no//shing mkhan lnga po thog mar nga'i sha bcad de zos pa ni/dge slong ko'u di n+ya la sogs pa lnga po yin no//skye bo mang po phyis nga'i shi zos po ni lha'i sras po brgyad khri dang /
344a1(mdo sde): nga'i nye gnas rnam par grol ba rnams yin no//de'i tshe na sngar mi lnga po de la byin te/'tsho bas srog skyabs pas 'dir yang sngar chos bstan te/
344a2(mdo sde): chos kyi sku'i yan lag gis dus gsum gyi me zhi bar byas//kun dga' bo dang /'khor mang po rnams/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang nas
344a3(mdo sde): mngon par dga'o////shu dro la gar ne'i le'u ste nyi shu drug go///rgyal po a sho ka'i le'u'o////'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
344a4(mdo sde): gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kun dga' bo dang /bsod snyoms
344a5(mdo sde): pa las/lam ka na byis pa dag gcig sa la khang bu dang /bang mdzod dong /rin po cher bsngos nas rtse zhing 'khod do//de la khye'u gcig cig gis sangs rgyas rgyang ma nas
344a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa mthong nas/rab tu dga' ste/sbyin pa bya bar bsams nas/bang ba zhes bsngos pa'i sa las sgrim pa gang blangs te/sangs rgyas la dbul bar gzas pa
344a7(mdo sde): las/khye'u chung sangs rgyas ches pas ma sleb nas/grogs khye'u gcig la khyod sa la dgu shig/kho bo khyod kyi steng du 'greng ste lhung bzed du blug so zhes smras nas/grogs
344b1(mdo sde): bos kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras te/khye'u des grogs po'i phreg pa la 'dzegs te/sa snyim pa gang sangs rgyas la phul lo//sangs rgyas kyis kyang lhung bzed smad nas/sa phul
344b2(mdo sde): ba bzhes so//bzhes nas kun dga' bo la gtad de/sa 'di 'jim par gyis la gtsug lag khang la byugs shig ces bka' stsal to//kun dga' bo bu chung ngus dga'
344b3(mdo sde): ba'i sems kyis nga las phul te/gtsug lag khang la bskus pas/de'i bsod nams kyis nga mya ngan las 'das nas/lo brgya lon pa'i 'og tu rgyal po a sho ka zhes
344b4(mdo sde): bya bar 'gyuraro//khye'u gcig shos ni de'i blon por 'gyur te/'dzam bu'i gling la dbang byed cing /dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan kyang yul thams cad du bsgrags nas/
344b5(mdo sde): ring bsrel la yang rgyas par mchod par byed de/'dzam bu'i gling du mchod rten brgyad khri bzhi stong cig car byed par 'gyur ro//kun dga' ba dga' mgu rungs nas/bcom
344b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//de bzhin gshegs pas sngon bsod nams ci zhig mdzad pas/ring bsrel la yang mchod rten de snyed cig bgyid par 'gyur/
344b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/brtags par nyon la shin tu yid la zung shig dang /khyod la bstan par bya'o//sngon bskal pa grangs med pa 'das pa na/'dzam bu'i
345a1(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po gsal thul zhes bya ba/rgyal phran brgyud khri bzhi stong snyed la dbang byed pa zhig byung ngo //de'i tshe sangs rgyas
345a2(mdo sde): bupur sha zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/rgyal po des blon po dang bcas su yo byad rnam pa bzhi sbyar to/sangs rgyas dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul lo//de'i tshe rgyal
345a3(mdo sde): bo de dang yul mi rnams ni rtag tu sngangs rgyas dang phrad de/phyag 'tshal ba dang /bsnyen bkur byed kyi/rgyal phran gzhan dag ni bsod nams kyang mi byed pas mtha'
345a4(mdo sde): 'khob kyi rgyal phran dang /yul mi dag bsod nams byed du gzhug pa'i phyir/sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bris la/rgyal phran la sbyin no snyam bsams nas/ri mo
345a5(mdo sde): mkhan mang po bsdus te/sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs ri mo la bris shig tsos bsgo ba dang /ri mo mkhan dag sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar song ste/sangs rgyas kyi mtshan
345a6(mdo sde): bltas nas/ri mo bris pa las mtshan cig bris nas/gcig mi 'dra bar gyur te/ri mo mkhan gyis ri mo bris bor ma nus so//sangs rgyas nyid kyis mtshon rtsi sbyar
345a7(mdo sde): te/sku gzugs gcig bris nas/ri mo mkhan rnams de la bltas te/sku gzugs mtshan dang ldan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong bris nas/rgyal phran re re la sku gzugs
345b1(mdo sde): ra sbyar te/sku gzugs de la rgyal po dang /yul ma thams cad kyis me tog dang /spos dang /yo byad thams cad kyis mchod de phyag 'tshol cig ces bsgo'o//rgyal phran de
345b2(mdo sde): dag dang /yul mi dri dag gis dri bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs mthong nas/rab tu dka' mgu rangs te bsnyen bkur byaso//de'i tshe na rgyal po gsal thub de ni da ltar nga yin/
345b3(mdo sde): da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs brgyad khri bzhi stong bris te/rgyal phran kun la spel ba'i bsod nams kyis gang nas gang du skyes kyang mtho ris su brgya byin lha'i/
345b4(mdo sde): dbang por skyes te/byad gzugs bzang ba dang /mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu thob ste/mngon par sangs rgyas so//mya ngan las 'das nas
345b5(mdo sde): kyang ring bsrel la mchod rten brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed byas par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs pa la/kun dga' bo dang /'khor mang po mngon par
345b6(mdo sde): dga' nas rjes su yi rang so///rgyal po a sho kri'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o///gser gyi bum pa'i le'u'o////'di skad bdag gis
345b7(mdo sde): zos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//de'i tshe dge slong dag dbyer so sor
346a1(mdo sde): tshul du zhugs nas/tshul nas byung ba dang /bcom ldan 'das gang nu bar lhags so//bcom ldan 'das dge slong dag dang /yun ring du phrad
346a2(mdo sde): pas/de dag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/'khor lo rdzobs stong dang ldan pa'i phyag bteg ste/dge slong de dag la sti stang dang bcas pas/khyad na par ma gyur tam
346a3(mdo sde): bsod snyoms kyis ma bral tam zhes bka' stsal pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan chen po dang ldan pa de/dge slong rnams la sti stang mdzad par dge slong kun dga'
346a4(mdo sde): bos mthong nasna ngo mtshar du gyur te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/bcom ldan 'das ni 'jig rten gyi gtso bo yon tan dpag tu ma mchis pa/ye shes
346a5(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags na/ci'i slad du thugs smad de/dge slong rnams la sti stang mdzad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la 'di skad
346a6(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to//sngon bskul pa grangs med tshad med bsdam gyis mi khyab pa 'das pa ni/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yul ba rA na se na/khyim bdag so chis la mkhas pa
346a7(mdo sde): zhig yod de/nor ci rnyed kyang gser du bsgyur nas/gser gyi bum pa gcig byas te/sa 'og tu sbaso//de bzhin du nor rdzas ci rnyed kyang lus la mi spyod de/gser du bsgyur/
346b1(mdo sde): nas kyis ring zhig lon pa dang /gser gyi bum pa sna phyir bsags pa bdun du gyur nas/thams rdungs 'og tu smras//khyim bdag de phyis nang kyis btab nas/tshe dus byas
346b2(mdo sde): pa dang /gser gyi bum pa la chags pas sbrul gdug pa zhig tu skyes te/gser de la srung ngo //phyis yun ring zhig lon pa dang /grong khyer de yang zhig nas su yang mi gnas te/
346b3(mdo sde): sa ltong du gyur to//sbrul de yang lo grangs mang du lon pas tshe'i dus byas nas/phyir yang de nyid kyis lus su skyes te/gser gyi bum pa la 'khri zhing nyal lo//de bzhin du lo
346b4(mdo sde): khri phrag du ma lon pa dang /nang gri skye ba tha ma la lus des skyo ste 'di snyam du bsams so//bdag ni glaser 'di la chags pas 'di 'dra ba'i lus su mi sdug pa myong bar gyur
346b5(mdo sde): gyis/da ni bsod nams kyi zhing la phul nas/lam dang nye bar song s+yai/rtswa khrod du lus sras la mi dag 'ongs na bod do snyam ste/de'i tshe sbrul gdag pa des mi gcig
346b6(mdo sde): lam nas 'ong ba mthong nas/sbrul gyi mi de la bos pa dang /mi nges bos pa'i sgra thos nas phan tshun bltas na cang mi snang bas lam du zhugs te srong song ba las/sbrul gyis/
346b7(mdo sde): yang bos te/kye kho bo'i drung du snyen cig ces smraso//mi des smras pa/khyod kyis kho bo bos te ci zhig bya/khyod ni sbrul bdug pa can yin pas/kho bo bsad du
347a1(mdo sde): 'ong ngo //sbrul gyis kho bos gnod par bya na/khyod drung du ma 'ongs kyang gnod par byed nus so zhes smras pa dang /mi de skrag nas sbrul gyi
347a2(mdo sde): drung du bsten to//sbrul gyis smras pa/kho bo la 'di na gser gyi bum pa gcig yod kyis/khyod la bsod nams shig bya bar bcol na nus samA/ji ste mi byas na
347a3(mdo sde): khyod la gnod pa bya'o//mi des kho bo nus so zhes smras pa dang /sbrul gyis mi de gser gyi bum po'i drung du khrid de/gsar gyi bum pa gcig bskur te 'di skad ces smra sa so//
347a4(mdo sde): khyod gser 'di khyer la dge 'dun rnams la mchod ston zhig gsol cig/mchod ston gsol ba'i nyin par kho bos yang 'ong gis ba su shig ces bsgo'o//de nas mi de
347a5(mdo sde): gser khur du khyer te/dge 'dun gyi gnasu song nas/dge slong gi gtsang sbyor la gser phul te/'di ni sbrul gdug pa zhig gi gser lcags kyis/gser 'dis dge 'dun
347a6(mdo sde): la mchod ston gsol cig ces mchi'o//gser 'dis mchod ston sbyar te/mchod ston nam gsol ba zhig dus brtsis nas/de'i nyin par mi de gzab cig thogs te
347a7(mdo sde): sbrul gdug pa de gang na 'dug pa der song ngo //sbrul gdug pa des kyang mi de 'ong ba mthong nas/rab tu dga' bar gyur te/mi des sbrul gzeb kyi nang du bcug nas/khyer
347b1(mdo sde): te song ba las/lam du mis gcig dang phrad du/mAM dus khyod gang nas 'ongs shes lan gsum gyi bar du dris kyang /sbrul thogs pa ngas cang ma smras pas/sbrul du khros nas gag pa
347b2(mdo sde): 'byung ba las 'di snyam du bsams so//mi 'di ci zhig nyis na/pha rol pos lan gsum gyi bar du dris ni/gtam gyi lan yang mi ster snyam ste/phyir yang khros nas gdug
347b3(mdo sde): 'byung ba las phyir bkag ste/yang 'di snyam du bsam so//mi 'dri bdag gi phyir bsod nams byed na/byas pa gzo ba'i dri na yang dran par ma byas par gdug pa mi dbyung ngo snyam
347b4(mdo sde): bsams te/mi 'dri bdag la phan pa'i don byed kyis/nyes pa zhig byas na yong bzod par bya'o zhes dben par phyin pa dang /re shib sa la zhog shig ces smras nas/mi des
347b5(mdo sde): sbrul de la sems smad de/bdag gi nyes pa 'gyod cing bshag so zhes smras nas/phyir yang khur du khyer te/dge 'dun gyi gnas su phyin pa dang /dge 'dun dag kyang gdug
347b6(mdo sde): tshad kyi dus la bab pas/myi des dge 'dun la me tog brims te/sbrul de dad pa'i sems kyis me tiklo 'drim pa la blta'o//de nas dge 'dun dag zas kyi bye ba byas nas
347b7(mdo sde): kha lag bkrus te sbrul de la chos bshad de/sbrul de rab tu dga' nas/gser gyi bum pa drug kyang dge 'dun la phul te bsod nams kyi las byas nas de nas che'i bos so//
348a1(mdo sde): rje'i dus byas nas/de'i bsod nams kyis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes//kun dga' bo de'i cha na/sbrul khur du khyer ba'i mi de ni da ltar nga yin//
348a2(mdo sde): sprusbrul gdug pa de ni shA ri'i bu yin no//'ongs pa'i dus na yang /khur du sprul khyer ba las/sbrul gyis spyod te/de la yang sems smad pas/da yang dge slong rnams la
348a3(mdo sde): sems smad pa yin//kun dga' bo la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa la yi rang nas mngon pararo dga'o////gser gyi bum pa'i le'u
348a4(mdo sde): ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o////bram ze mo bde ba'i le'u'o//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan da
348a5(mdo sde): ka gnas pa/'od ma'i tshal na/dge slong grangs med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so//de'i tshe yul de na bram ze shin tu dbul zhing phongs pa/ci yang mi bdog pa zhig yod
348a6(mdo sde): de/bram ze de phongs ches nas/kun la ji ltar byas na/tshe 'di nyid la longs spyod dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes driso//de la mi zhig gis smras pa/ci khyod mi shes sam//
348a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya ba da ltar 'jig rten du gshegs te/sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don mdzad do//de'i nye gnas 'od srung chen po dang /
348b1(mdo sde): mo'u dag la ya na dang /shA ri'i bu dang /ma 'gags pa la sogs pa 'phags pa bzhi yang rtag tu dbul phongs pa la phan pa'i don byed kyis/gal te khyod dad pa'i sems kyis 'phags
348b2(mdo sde): pa de dag la zhal zas kyis mchod na/'phags pa de dag ni tshe 'di nyid la/khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de dag dang ldan par mdzad do zhes smras so//de'i tshe na bram zes mi des
348b3(mdo sde): smras pa zos nas/rab tu dga' ste/kun tu rgyu zhing slongs mo dang gla zos nas/nor cung zad cig rnyed de/phyir khyim du 'ongs nas zhal zas sbyar te/'phags pa rnams
348b4(mdo sde): spyan drangs nas bshos gsol to//'jig rten 'di nyid la phan par re'o//de'i tshe na bram ze de'i chung ma bde ba zhes bya ba des dge 'dun pa shos gsol nas/nyin zhag
348b5(mdo sde): gcig pa'i bslab tshig mnos so//de'i tshe na rgyal po gsal rgyal 'chag tu song song ba las/phyir 'ongs pa'i lam du nyes byed pa'i btson zhig lam ka na shing la bcings
348b6(mdo sde): shing 'dug pa mthong ngo //btson des rgyal po gshegs pa mthong nas ngus te/kha zas shig bslangs pa dang /rgyal pos kyang sbyin no zhes byas nas phyir pho brang du gshegs
348b7(mdo sde): pa dang /brjed pa las de'i nub mo nam phyed tsam na/btson la kha zas sbyin par byas pa dran te/kha zas bsgral bar byas nas/pho brang nang gi mi ni gcig kyang 'gro bod pa med de
349a1(mdo sde): nam phyed na kha zas bsrung du lamA na 'dre mdon dang /srin+da pos 'jigs pas/srog dang bsngos te 'gro nus pa med do//de'i tshe na rgyal po mI de'i sdug
349a2(mdo sde): bsngal ba dang /bkres pas nyen pa dran nas/de la shin tu snying brtse ste/nga'i yul 'di nas su zhig btson de la kha zas skye la nus na/gruser srang stong sbyin no zhes bsgrags
349a3(mdo sde): kyang 'gro nus pa ma byung //de'i tshe na bram ze'i chung ma bde ba des gtam du thos na 'jig rten pa su yang rung ste/nyin zhag gi cog pa'i bslab tshig brgyad mnos na/'dre gdon
349a4(mdo sde): la sogs pas mi rdzis ste/gdon thams cad kyis gnod pa byed mi nus so zhes thos kyis/bdag ni rgyal pos gar gtang bar 'gro'o snyam bsams nas chaso//de
349a5(mdo sde): nas rgyal pos bde ba la khyod kha zas 'di dag khyer la/che ge mo zhig na btson 'dug pa de la byin cig dang /gser srang stong sbyin no zhes dam bcaso//de nas bde ba
349a6(mdo sde): rgyal po'i bka' bzhin du kha zas thogs te/tshul khrims dran par byas nas/lam du zhugs te song song ba las/grong khyer gyi pha rol tu srin mo lam pa dang phrad do//
349a7(mdo sde): de'i tshe srin mo de bu lnga brgya gsar du btsas pas bkres skom gyis nyen to/bde ba 'ongs par mthong nas bza' bar gzaso//de'i tshe dge bsnyen ma tshul khrims ma nyams
349b1(mdo sde): byas sbyin mo mgo snga nas phyir skrag ste/dge bsnyen ma khyod khyer pa'i kha zas las cung zad cig bslang ngo zhes smras pa dang dge bsnyen mas snang nyung ngu ma zhig byin te/byin te nyung mod kyi
349b2(mdo sde): srin mo'i mthus mang du sbrul nus pas/srin mo mo smad shin tu 'drangs par gyur to//de nas srin mos dge bsnyen ma la/khyod kyi ming ci zhes dris pa dang /kho mo ni bde ba'o//
349b3(mdo sde): zhes smras so//'o na kho mo ma smad kyang ltogs pa las khyod kyis gsos kyis/kho mo 'dug pa 'di na gser bum pa gang yod kyis phyir log pa'i lam du khyer cig/khyod par
349b4(mdo sde): 'gro ni kho mo'i nu mo a lam pa yang lam ka na 'dug ste/khyod dang phrad kyis kho mo'i phrin du khyod bde 'am/kho mo'i yang bu lnga brgya bde bar btsa so zhes gyis shig/de nas dge
349b5(mdo sde): bsnyen ma lam du zhugs te/song song ba las ring po ma lon par a lam pa dang phrad do//a lam pa la phu mo'i phrin spring ba dang /bu lnga brgya bde bar btsas so zhes gtam byas
349b6(mdo sde): pa dang /a lam pa dga' ste/dge bsnyen ma la khyod lo mo'i phu mo'i phrin dang gtam snyan byas pa legs kyis/kho mo 'dug pa'i gnas 'di na gser bum pa gang yod kyis
349b7(mdo sde): phyir log pa'i lam du khyer cig/kho mo cag gi ming po gcig kyang lam ka na 'dug gis de dang phrad na/kho mo cag spun gnyis kyi phrin dang /bu lnga brgya btsas pa'i gtam yang
350a1(mdo sde): gyis shig ces bsgo nas song ngo //de nas yang ring por ma phyin par srin mo gnyis kyi mang po dang phrad de/de la srin mo gnyis kyi phrin drang bu lnga
350a2(mdo sde): brgya yang bde bar btsas pa'i gtam byas nas/de yang rab tu dga' ste/khyod kho bo'i sring ma gnyis kyi phrin byas pa legs kyis/kho bo 'dug pa'i gnas 'di na gsIr
350a3(mdo sde): bum pa gang yod kyis/phyir ldog pa'i lam du khyer cig ces bsgo'o//de nas dge bsnyen ma tshas te song song ba las/btson de'i drung du phyin te kha zas bstod nas/phyir
350a4(mdo sde): ldog pa'i lam du gser bum pa gsum yang rnyed//rgyal pos kyang gseng srar stong bye dgar byin pas/bram ze dbul po khyo shug gnyis yul de na shin tu phyug cing rin po che
350a5(mdo sde): mang bar gyur to//rgyal pos kyang de bsod nams las gyur par shes nas/blon por bcug ste/shin tu phyug par gyur pas/lhag par bsod nams byed pa la dad pa'i
350a6(mdo sde): sems skyes te/sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun spyan drangs nas mchod pa chen po byas so//de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pas/sems rnam par grol te/rgyun
350a7(mdo sde): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob po/'khor mang po dang /kun dga' bo la sogs pa/sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa la rje su yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o//
350b1(mdo sde): bram ze mo bde ba'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu par/bam po brgyad pa///sbyin pa chen po rgya mtshor zhugs pa'i le'u'o////'di skad bdag gis thos pa
350b2(mdo sde): dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'des rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la/dge slong chen po'i dge 'dun brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so//
350b3(mdo sde): de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun+da shes ko'u di n+ya la sogs pa la/bsnyen bkur bya ba'i g.yog gcig dgos zhes bka' stsal pa dang /de nas kun shes
350b4(mdo sde): ko'u di nA stan las ldangs te bla gos phrug pa ge cig tu byas nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te/phyag 'tshal nas/bcom ldan 'das la bdag
350b5(mdo sde): gis bsnyen bkur yid bzhin du bgyi zhing /chos gos dang lhung bzed bzung ngo //zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis ko'u di n+ya khyod nyid kyang rgas 'khyogs te//
350b6(mdo sde): khyod nyid la yang bsnyen bkur byed pa dgos kyis/ko'u di n+ya khyod nyid stan la 'dug shig ces bka' stsal to//de bzhin du 'od srung dang /shA ri'i du dang /mo'u dag la
350b7(mdo sde): yin la sogs pa/nyi gnas lnga skyed kun gyis/bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyi'o zhes gsol na yang gcig kyang mganang ngo //de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'ag
351a1(mdo sde): ngas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bsnyen bkur bya ba'i dge slong gang la dkyus sgyum bar+d+hag sman/bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kun dga' bo la
351a2(mdo sde): dgyes pa ni 'di lta ste///khang ba brtsegs pa'i shar phyogs kyi sgrar khu nas/nyi mu'i 'od zer byung bran nub byogs
351a3(mdo sde): kyi ngos la shar cing lhan pa bzhin du/bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kun dga' bo la dgongs shing dgyes par nye gnas kun gyis rtogs nas/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /
351a4(mdo sde): mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gnyis/kun dga' bo gang nu ba der song ste/drung du phyin pa dang kun dga' bo dang lhan cig tu yid mgu zhing dga' gtam rnam pa du ma byas nas phyogs gcig/
351a5(mdo sde): tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dag la ya nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smraso//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
351a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya bar dad dam bcom ldan 'das kyang khyod kyis bsnyen bkur bya bar dgyes te/de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas na/khyod la
351a7(mdo sde): phan pa'i don cher 'gyuraro//btsun pa shA ri'i bu bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed par ma dad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bslab
351b1(mdo sde): papa dka' bzod par dka'o//'di lta ste/me 'bar ba ni bsgrubs par dka'/bzod par yang dka' ba yin te/de ltar de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bslab/
351b2(mdo sde): byar dka'/bzod par bka' bas naM/bdag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyid par ma dad do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dag la yA na'i bu che ni
351b3(mdo sde): pos/kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smraso//kun dga' bo khyod la/bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing dgyes pa ni 'di lta ste/khang pa brtsegs pa'i shar phyogs
351b4(mdo sde): kyi skar khung nas/nyi ma'i 'od zer byung na/nub phyogs kyi rtsig ngos la shar cing lhan pa bzhin du/bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyang /kun dga' bo khyod kyis
351b5(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur bya bar dgyes kyis dad par gyis shig/de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas na/khyod la phan pa'i don cher 'gyu ro zhes smraso//btsun pa mo'u
351b6(mdo sde): dag la yan chen po ji ste/bdag la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa 'di gsum gnang na/bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyid par dad do//'di lta ste/bcom
351b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das mi gsol ba'i na bza' bdag 'chang du mi stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das mi gsol ba'i bshos kyi lhag ma bdag la mi 'tshal ba dang /bdag dus ma
352a1(mdo sde): mtshos par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis gnang bar rabagyi na ni/bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyi bar dad do//dri nas tshe dang ldan pa shrI/
352a2(mdo sde): ri'i bu dang /mo'u dag la yan chen pos/tshe dang ldan po kun dga' bo bsnyen bkur byed du dad par byas nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de sngo ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan
352a3(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyid par/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dad par bgyis ni/bcom ldan 'das
352a4(mdo sde): kyis bdag la 'dod pa 'di gsum gnang na/gdod bdag gis bcom ldan 'das le bsnyen bkur bgyi bar dang du zhes mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/
352a5(mdo sde): legs so mo'u dag la yA na'i buM/dge slong kun dga' bo de ni mkhas pa can te/tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams smad pa'i tshig dang /rjes su smad pa'i tshig
352a6(mdo sde): gi chos phyi 'byung bar mthong bsnu na/bdag la tshangs pa mtshungs byar spyod pa rnams 'di skad du dge slong kun dga' bo ni gos dang /zas kyi phyir ston pa la bsnyen bkra
352a7(mdo sde): byed do zhes smra bar 'gyur ba'i phyir/mo'u dgal gyi bu de ni dge slong kun dga' bo'i ngo mtshar rmed du byung ba'i chos so//dge slong kun dga' ba ni mkhas pa can te/dus
352b1(mdo sde): shes shing dus rig pa lags shing /dus shes par 'gyur ba ni/bcom ldan 'das la 'khor rnam bzhi blta bar 'gro ba'i dus la bab pa dang /dus la ma bab pa dang /gzhan yang /
352b2(mdo sde): mu stegs can kun tu rgyu rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro ba'i dus la bab pa dang /dus la ma bab pa dang /gzhan yang mu stegs can kun tu rgyu 'dri dag ni/bcom ldan
352b3(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa la lan ldon par spobs so//'di dag ni len ljon par mi spobs so//bca' ba dang bza' ba 'di ni/bcom ldan 'das la bde zhing bsod par 'gyur
352b4(mdo sde): 'di ni bde zhing bsod par mi 'gyur bar shes pa'i phyir te/mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di ni dge slong kun dga' bo'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so//de nas shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu/
352b5(mdo sde): gnyis kyis/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed par dad par byas pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang kun dga' bo ni mkhas pa can te/dus shes
352b6(mdo sde): shing dus reg go zhes bsngags pas/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//dge slong kun dga' bo 'di ci'i rgyu/ci'i rkyen gyis
352b7(mdo sde): dus deng tshod la mkhas par gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa'i pha rol na/rgyal po chen po 'dzam bu'i
353a1(mdo sde): gling gi rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong la dbang byed pa zhig byung ngo //de'i tshe grong khyer ba ru de zhes bya ba nA/bram ze n+ya gro da zhes bya ba zhig yod de/mkhas
353a2(mdo sde): ba rig pa dang ldan pa/smang gtsug lag dang /skar ma la mkhas pa zhig pas/rgyal po'i ston pa byed de/rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed kyang de la rgyal po chen po dang 'dra
353a3(mdo sde): bar bsnyen bkur byed de/bsgo ba'i tshig kyang nyan to//bram ze de phyug khyad rnam thos kyi bu dang 'gran te/de la bu med pas rtag tu mi dga' ste/sems khongs su chud cing
353a4(mdo sde): 'dug pa las ji ltar byas na bu yod par 'gyur zhes/tshangs pa dang /brgya byin dang /dbang phyug dang /nyi zla dang /skar ma dang /ri dang /chu dang /nags kyi lha kun la mchod cing
353a5(mdo sde): rjed de/lo bcu gnyis lon nas/chung ma chen ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te/shud med mkhas pa dag ni sems can dang ldan ma thag tu bu khye'u 'am/bu mo yin pa nges
353a6(mdo sde): par rtogs pas/de yang khye'u yin par shes nas bram ze la gtAm smra so//bram ze de de skad ces smras pa thos nas/rab tu dga' rangs te/chung ma'i rim gro lhag par
353a7(mdo sde): cher skyed do//de nas zla ba dgu tshad nas/khye'u zhig btsas te gser gyi mdog can sla mthon mthing du 'dug pa bzang ba mdzes pa mtshan dang ldan pa zhig go//de nas btsas ston
353b1(mdo sde): byas nas/mtshan mkhan bkug ste/mtshan bltas nas/ming sbyin pa chen po zhes btags so//khye'u de rim gyis cher skyes nas/dbyar dgun dang /ston dpyid kyi gnas kyang so sor
353b2(mdo sde): byas te/longs spyod byed du bcug go//khye'u de yang yid gzhungs shing mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan pa zhig pas rig byed dang /gtsug lag rnam pa bcwo brgyad la sogs te/rgyu rtsal
353b3(mdo sde): gang yang mi shes pa med do//phyis sbyin pa chen pos pha ma la gsol te/bdag phyi rol tu 'chag cing lhad mo ltar 'gro'o zhes byas pa dang /de'i pha mas kyang bu 'chag tu 'gro'o//
353b4(mdo sde): zhes lam srad phyag dar byed du btsug ste/rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan bsgred nas me tog gis gtor te/bdug spos kyi bdug po la sogs pa yo lang bshams nas/sbyin pa
353b5(mdo sde): chen po glang po rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa la bskyon te/dril bsgrags/rnga brdungs/rol mo dang /sil snyan bkrol te/'khor brgya stong snyed kyis bskor nas/grong khyer
353b6(mdo sde): kyi phyi rol tu song ngo //yul mi thams cad lam gyi g.yos g.yon du khang du brtsegs me'i steng nas/mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing /'di'i byin dang /kaTI brjid ni tshangs pa
353b7(mdo sde): 'dra'o zhes bsgrag so//de nas song song ba las/mul to ba dag gos hrul po gyon cing snod chags pa dag thogs te/cung zad bslang ngo zhes 'bod pa sbyin pa chen pos thos nas de
354a1(mdo sde): dag la khyod ci'i phyir 'di ltar nyon mongs shing sdug ces dris so//de la kha cig ni 'di skad du/bdag cag la pha ma dang /phu nu dang /bu s+yAd dang /
354a2(mdo sde): gnyen bshes ma mchis pas sdug go zhes zer ro//de la kha cig ni bdag cig yun rings su nad kyis btab pas mi sos te sdug go zhes zer ro//de la kha cig ni bdag
354a3(mdo sde): cag bag ma byas pas chom pos bcom ste/ci yang mi bdog pas slongs mo byed do zhes zer ro sbyin pa chen pos de skad smras pa thos nas/mchi ma bku ste song ngo //de nas
354a4(mdo sde): yang pha zad cig na/shen pa dag cig srog chags bsad nas/lpags pa bau shu ba dang /bskal gtub pa dag mthong ngo //sbyin pa chen pos/e ma ho 'di dag ci byed ces
354a5(mdo sde): dris na/bdag cag ni pha mes rgyud kyis 'di 'dra ba'i gsod pa'i las byed de/'di ma byas na mi 'tsho'o zhes zer ro//de la sbyin pa chen po ngo mtshar tu gyur nas lto mi 'dod
354a6(mdo sde): khyer song ngo //de nas pha zad tu phyin pa dang /zhing pa dag zhing rmos te/zhing rmos pa'i shul na srin bu mang du byung ba la/bya mang po dang /sbrul dag thu zhing za ba mthong ba dang //
354a7(mdo sde): 'di dag ci byed ces dris na/bdog cag na zhing rmos te sa klongs pa'i shul du sa bon btab na/phyis mang du skyes te/des 'tsho zhing rgyal po'i dpya yang 'bul lo zhes zer//
354b1(mdo sde): sbyin pa chen pos de la yang ngo mtshar tu gyur nas/pha zad song ba dang /rngon pa drug bya rgya bres pa dang /spyi btsugs nas bya rnams shor ba dang /sems can dag bya rgya dang rnyis zin nas
354b2(mdo sde): lus rdebs shing 'then kyang ma shor te/snying rje ba'i skad phyung nas shin tu 'jigs skrag pa dag mthong nas/khyed ci byed ces dris na/bdag cag kyang rgyud kyis 'di 'dra ba gsod
354b3(mdo sde): pa'i las byed pas 'tsho'o zhes zer ro//sbyin pa chen pos de skad ces smras pa thos nas/shin tu yi mug ste yang pha zad song ba dang /nya pa dag nya rgyas nya bcus nas mang
354b4(mdo sde): du zin te/thang la phung por spungs nas/da dong yang 'gul ba dag mthong nas/'di dag ci byed cis dris na/bdag cag rgyud kyi las gzhan mi byed kyi/'di ltar nya bshor
354b5(mdo sde): zhing 'tsho bar byed do//zhes zer ro//sbyin pa chen pos 'di lta bu dag mthong nas 'di snyam du bsams so//sems can 'di dag ni dbul phongs pas/bgo ba dang bza' ba'i
354b6(mdo sde): phyir 'di lta bu'i kha na ma tho ba'i las gsod pa la sogs pa byed de/'di dag ni tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan song gsum du lhung ste/mun pa nas mun par 'gro zhing thar pa'i
354b7(mdo sde): dus med do snyam bsams nas/phyir khyim du 'ongs te nyin mtshan du de sems shing mi dga' nas/pha'i drung du song ste/pha la bdag gsol pa zhig mchis kyis gnang
355a1(mdo sde): shig ces smras so//phas kyang bu khyod ci zer/khyod smra ba bzhin du bya'o zhes smras so//yab bdag sngon phyi rol tu 'chag tu mchis pa las/mau mang /
355a2(mdo sde): po gos dang /kha zas kyi phyir thams cad nyon mongs te/gcig la cig gsod pa dang /brdzun dang /dbang za ba dang /mi dge ba'i las rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid pa mthong nas/
355a3(mdo sde): de dag la sbyin pa bgyid par bsams kyis/yab kyi bang mdzod chen po las phongs brel pa dag gi phyir/yid bzhin du spyod du gnang shig/phas smras pa/ngas bang mdzod dang /
355a4(mdo sde): rin po che mong du bsags pa thams cad khyod kyi phyir byas par zad nA/ci'i phyir khyod zer ba mi nyan ces smras so//de nas sbyin pa chen pos phas gnang ba'i lung thob nas/
355a5(mdo sde): yul mi thams cad la sbyin pa chen po/sbyin gtong chen po byed kyis/thams cad 'dus shing shog shig ces bsgrags so//de'i tshe dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /dbul
355a6(mdo sde): zhing phongs pa/mgon med pa dang /nad pa la sogs te/grong khyer gyi phyi rol na lam thog thag tu gang ngo //de dag kyang dpag tshad brgya dang /nyis brgya dang /sum brgya
355a7(mdo sde): dang /bzhi brgya dang /lnga brgya dang /dpag tshad stong gi lam nas 'ongs/kha cig ni dpag tshad nyi stong dang /sum stong bzhi stong lnga stong nas/dpag tshad khri'i bar du
355b1(mdo sde): sa/dadag smon bzhin du 'dus nas/thams cad ma yang bzhon smyon pa na//glos 'dod pa la gas/dus 'dod bsna sa/na gas dang /bsgya /
355b2(mdo sde): dang /mu sa ra gal ba dang /bzhon pa dang /zag pa dang /khyogs dang /bskyed mos tshol dang /zhing dang /rkang 'gros la sogs te/yid bzhin du sbyin pa byas so///
355b3(mdo sde): /de ltar sbyin pa la zhugs te/yun ring zhig lon pa dang /bang mdzod sum cha gcig zad nas/mdzod srungs kyis bram ze la 'di skad ces smos so//sras kyis bang
355b4(mdo sde): mdzod nas sbyin pa byas nas/sum cha gcig ni zad na/sum gnyis las ma lus na/phan tshun 'drul ba'i skyes dang /tshong zod ci las bgyid/dgongs shig ces smras so//
355b5(mdo sde): kho bo ni bu 'di la byams pas ngo mi zlogs kyis/bang mdzad stongs kyang bla'o zhes bsgo'o//de nas yang ring zhig lon pa dang /bang mdzod sum gnyis ni zad/sum cha tsam lus
355b6(mdo sde): pa dang /mdzod srungs kyis yang byam ze la/dra ni bang mdzod sum gnyis tsam ni zad/sum cha tsam las ma lus na/phan tshun skyes bskur ba dang /tshong zong ci las bya/zhes
355b7(mdo sde): smraso//bram ze des bsgo ba/kho bo'i bu sdug ches te do mi zlogs pas/smra mi phod kyis/khyod bdag gis thabs ci legs su byos la/brel cing mi khom pa ltararo tha snyed
356a1(mdo sde): thogs shig/mdzod srungs kyis bram ze las lung thob nas/mdzod sgo bcad de don gnyer du song ngo //de nas slong ba dag sbyin pa chen po'i thad du lhags nas/
356a2(mdo sde): bar 'ba' ni mdzod srungs mi rnyed de/mdzod sgo mi phyed/gal te mdzod srungs 'ongs na yang yid bzhin du mi ster bas/sbyin pa chen pos 'di snyamo du bsamaso//'di ltar gyur
356a3(mdo sde): pa 'di ni mdzod srungs kyis thugs mi thub kyi/pha'i man ngag 'ongs kyis/yong yang bus pa'i bang mdzod stongs par bya bar mi rigs kyis/bdag gis da thabs ci zhig/
356a4(mdo sde): byas na/rin po che yid bzhin du rnyed de skye bo mang po la phan thogs par 'gyur ba bsams nas//mi dag la 'di skad dris so//'jig rten na las ci zhig byas
356a5(mdo sde): nu/rin po che yid bzhin du rnyed de/nor dbyig mang du rnyed cing zad mi shes par 'gyur zhes dris pa dang /kha cig ni zhing mang du rmos na nor dbyig mang por 'gyur ro
356a6(mdo sde): zhes zer ro//kha cig ni rkang 'gros spel te/spogs byas na nor mang du rnyed do zhes zer ro//kha cig ni lam ring por tshong spogs byas na/nor ming du rnyed do zhes zero//
356a7(mdo sde): kha cig ni rgya mtshor zhugs te nor du rin po che blangs nas rin po che mang du 'gyur ro zhes zer ro//sbyin pa chen pos de dag gis smras pa thos nas/zhing rmo ba dang /rkang
356b1(mdo sde): 'gros sbrel ba dang /lam ring por tshong la 'gro ba ni nga'i cha ma yin gyi/rgya mtshor 'jug pa 'ba' shig nga'i chu'o zhes smras nas/rgya mtshor 'jug go snyam bsams te/pa ma lwa
356b2(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so//bdag ni rgya mtsho nas rin po che mang po blangs te/dbul phongs pa la sbyin pa yid bzhin du bgyi'o//bdag rgya mtshor rin po che len tu mchir gnang shig
356b3(mdo sde): ces smras so//de'i pha mas de skad ces smras pa thos nas/khams te buM la 'di skad ces smras so//'jig rten nA dbul phongs pa dag ni blo med de/lus dang srog dang
356b4(mdo sde): bsngos nas 'gro bar byed do//khyod cis phongs na de lta bur sems/khyod sbyin pa byed 'dod na/khyim na yod pa'i nor thams cad sbyin pa byos shig/rgya mtshor ni 'gror mi rung ste/rgya mtsho'i
356b5(mdo sde): nang na chu rlabs dang /dba' glong 'khyil pa dang /chu srin dang /klu gdug pa dang /srin mo dang /ri chu'i mdog can la sogs te/shin tu yang ba'i bgegs mang du yod pas//
356b6(mdo sde): thar par dka' na/khyod cis phangs ni/srog dang sde bor byed/'di la ni nyan pa med kyis ma sems par 'dug shig ces bsgo'o/sbyin pa chen pos de skad ces bsgo ba thos nas
356b7(mdo sde): bsams pa bzhin du mo grub pas yi dam bces te/bsamos pa 'di ma grub kyi bar du pha ma'i mdun dus la khas bub tu nyal te/mi ldang ngo snyam bsams nas/yab yum gyis
357a1(mdo sde): mkhyen par mdzod cig/bdag ni bsams pa bzhin du ma grub kyi bar du/khas bub tu nyal la 'di las mi ltung ngo zhes smraso//de nas pha ma rma
357a2(mdo sde): dga' ste/gnyen gshes dang /bgres nas/rgya mtsho'i nang du bgegs yang ba mang du yod pa'i gtam yang byas/bdag kyang blang bas lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du lha kun la mchod
357a3(mdo sde): de/khyod lta zhig nga'i bur skyes na/ngad ma dog zan zo shag ces zhag cig zhag gnyis nas/zhag drug go bar du tshig rnams kyis gros btab kyang ma nyan te/sngar ji skad
357a4(mdo sde): smras pa las ma zlogs so//pha ma skrag nas yang 'di skad ces smraso//bdag gi bu 'di thog ma nas da tsam gyi bar du bya bar brtsams pa mthar ma grub kyi bar du mi gtong bas/
357a5(mdo sde): rgya mtshor btang na rgyal phyir ldog kyang sred kyi/ma btang na zhag bdun lon na 'phral du byed brag 'bye ste/da ni bting dgoso snyam bgros nas bu'i drung du song ste/lag pa
357a6(mdo sde): nas bzung nas/bu longs la zan zo shig/yid bzhin du 'gro bar gnango zhes smras po dang /sbyin pa chen po yang langs te/bza' ba zos btung ba 'thungaso//de nas phyi
357a7(mdo sde): rol tu byung ste/mi mang po la kho bo rgya mtshor rin po che len du na 'gro'o//khyed su 'gror dga' ba rnams dang /'grogs te 'dong gis/ded dpon yang kho bos byas la/yo byad
357b1(mdo sde): kyang kho ngos sbyar ro zhes bsgragaso//de'i tshe mi lnga brgya tsam yang 'gro bar khas blangs nas/so so nas yo byad sbyar te/nam 'gro ba'i dus kyang byas nas/dus bzhin lam du zhugs te/
357b2(mdo sde): chachoso//lam du 'jug pa'i tshe/khye'u pha ma dang /rgyal po dang /rgyal bu dang /blon po la sogs te/yul mi thams cad kyis kyang bskyal nas rdzongs btab po/pha mas kyang
357b3(mdo sde): dus te phyi phyag byas nas/zhag du ma'i lam 'das pa dang /'brog stong du phyin te/nub mos dgongs mal du mi rgod kyis bcom nas nor rjes kun phrogs so//de nas song song
357b4(mdo sde): ba las grong khyer shu par zhes bya bair phyin nas/grong khyer de ni bram ze kaM pi li zhes bya ba dang phrad de/bram ze de'i khyim du song nas/bram ze de las sbyin pa chen pos gser
357b5(mdo sde): srang sum stong bslang bar byaso//de'i tshe na bram ze dri la bu mo gser gyi mdog can/sgo mthon mthing khur 'dug pa/rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed kyi rgyal bu thams cad kyis
357b6(mdo sde): bslangs na yang ma ster ba gcig yod de/de'i tshe na sbyin pa chen po bram ze'i sgor song ste/bram ze ka bi li 'dug gam zhes dris pa'i tshe/bu mo khyim gyi nang nA sa sbyin pa chen
357b7(mdo sde): ngo'i skad thos pa tsam gyis/sgo phyin skad grag pa 'di kho mo'i khyim thab yin no zhes pha ma la smraso//de nas bram ze sgor byung nas phrad pa dang /khye'u de la 'di ni nges par
358a1(mdo sde): gzhan bsdu 'phags s+ho snyam bsams te/khye'u des gsor bslangs pa dang /bram zes kyang sbyin par gzung nas/lag pa ya gcig tu ni
358a2(mdo sde): gser thogs/lag pa ya gcig gis bu mo khrid de/bu mo 'di yong khyod kyi chung mar sbyin gyis long shig ces smras po dang /sbyin pa chen pos smras pa/bdag ni rgyu
358a3(mdo sde): mtsho chen por rin po che len du 'gro ste/rgya mtsho'i nang na bgegs shin tu mang bas/kho bo 'khor tam mi 'khor gyi gtol med de/khyod kyi thu mo chung mar len pa'i thugs
358a4(mdo sde): mi thub bo//bram zes smras pa/khyod bde bar 'khor na bu mo 'di chung mar long shig ces smras pa dang /sbyin pa chen pos kyang phyir 'khor na de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras//
358a5(mdo sde): de nas bram zes kyang gser srang sum skyong dang /gzhan yang yo byad ci dgos pa kun sbyar te/de nas chas pas rgya mtsho'i ngogs su phyin to//de nas gru bcos te gru'i rlung
358a6(mdo sde): du zhugs nas/de nas thag pa bdun gyis brtod de/gru'i nang nus 'di skad ces smras//rgya mtsho'i nang na bgegs 'di dag yod do/'di lta ste/rlung nag po dang //srin
358a7(mdo sde): pi dang /chu'i dba' rlabs 'khyil pa dang /klu gdugs dang /chu'i mdog lta bu ri d+hi/chu srin la sogs pa'i bgegs ya nga ba mang du yod kyis/khyed las 'gror ma dod
358b1(mdo sde): bzhig yod na 'di las phyir log shig/phyis 'gyod par gyu ru ta ra/gal te lus dang srog la mi lta ste/ba ma dang /prA nu dang /bu dang /chung ma dang /gnyen pa shes la ma chags pa
358b2(mdo sde): 'dreng ngo //gal te bodo bar phyin na/rin po che sna bdun gyis/bu tsha rabs bdun rgyun chang drug par 'gyur te/longs spyod zad mi shes par 'gyuraro zhes smras nas/zag pa
358b3(mdo sde): gcig bcad do//de bzhin du nyi ma bdun gyi bar du nyi na ra la nA re de skad smras nas/rnyed thag re re bad+mad de rlung dang sbyar te/g.yor shing bsgreng bas 'gyogs khyad mnga' bzhin song
358b4(mdo sde): ngongo//de nas tshong ba dag dang rin po che'i gling du phyin nas/sbyin pa chen po mang du thos pas/rin po che brtag pa lo yang shin tu mkhas te/rin po che bzang ngan dang /wI yang dang
358b5(mdo sde): ji tsam ri ba'i rin thang phan tshun chod pa rnams la bstan nas/rin po che kha dog 'di lta bu ni yang mod kyi/rin che'o//rin po che 'di dag ni lce yang rin chung gis ma len cig/ha cang
358b6(mdo sde): yang mang ches na gru lci bas 'bying ngo //ha cang nyung ches ni yang nyon mongs te song song ba'i don med pas/'di tsam zhig ni ran no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshad kyang bstan nas
358b7(mdo sde): rin po che grur brdzangs te/ci la yang ma rag nas/de phyir 'dong ngo zhes chas pa dang /sbyin pa chen po gru'i nang du long du ma btub nas/tshong pa rnams la kho bo ni klu'i rgyal po'i pho brang
359a1(mdo sde): nas/yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ma thob kyi bar du mi ldog go zhes smraso//de nas tshong ba rnams kyis dus b+h+rUM mya ngan g+h+ri yi mug nas 'di skad ces smra so//
359a2(mdo sde): bdag cag tshong pa 'di rnams ni/skyes bu ded dpon khyod kyi g.yog tu 'ongs te/da khyod kyis 'dir dor de mi 'gro na/bdag cag kyang phyir khyim du mi phyin te/thams cad 'khyims//
359a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//sbyin pa chen pos smras pa/tshong pa khyod kyang mi nyes par yul du phyin par kho bos kyang smon lam gdab pa zhes pog por lag tu blangs te/phyogs bzhir mchod
359a4(mdo sde): nas 'di skad ces smos so//bdag ni rin po che blangs te/sems can phongs pa la sbyin par ma zad kyi/de ltar sbyin pa byed pa'i bsod nams des sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i
359a5(mdo sde): phyir ro//bdag gis smras pa 'di bden te smon lam bzhin du 'grub na/tshod pa 'di dgra rin po che dang bcas pa nye zho mang por 'dzom bu'i gling du bde bar phyin par shog shig ces
359a6(mdo sde): smos lam btab nas/theg pa bcang de g.yor shing bsgreng nas phyin 'dzam bu'i gling du bde bar dong ngo //de dag song ba'i 'og tu sbyin pa chen po chur zhugs te song ba las/zhag
359a7(mdo sde): bdun gyi bar du ni pus mo tsam las ma nub po//de nas yang zhog bdun gyi bdu ni badra dung tsam lA ma nub bo de nas yang zhag bdun song las rked pa tsam las ma nub bo//zhag
359b1(mdo sde): bdun lon gyi bar du na phrag tsam du phyin to//de nas zhag bdun ni rgyal lo//de nas ri zhig gi drung du phyin pa dang /shing la 'jus te ri lA 'dzegs nas/zhag bdun gyis rtse mor
359b2(mdo sde): phyin to//ri rtser zhag bdun song song nas/yang zhag bdun gyis shod du chu 'gram du phyin to//chu 'gram du phyin pa dang /chu'i nang na pad+ma gser gyi mdog can yod pa la/sbrul gdug
359b3(mdo sde): pas pad+ma'i rtsa ba la dkris shing 'dug pa mthong ngo //de nas byang chub sems dpa' skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas/sems rtse gcig tu byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/sprul/
359b4(mdo sde): gdug pa 'di dag kyang sngon zhe sdang dang /phra dog byas pa'i rkyen kyis 'di lta bu'i lus mi sdug pa myong ngo snyam lhag par de la snying brtse ba'i sems skyes pas sbrul gdug pa de'i
359b5(mdo sde): gdug pa kun zhi nas/byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma de'i steng nas gom pa dor te song song ba las/zhag bdun gyis sbrul gdug pa de dag las rtol to//de ni sa yang song song ba
359b6(mdo sde): las/srin po dang phrad nas/srin po de dag mi'i dri tshir bas kun tu tshol lo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems rtse gra cig tu byams pa'i sems kyis brtags pas/srin po
359b7(mdo sde): de dag 'jam pa'i tshig gis skyes bu khyod gang nas 'ongs/gang du 'gro zhes dris so//de la sbyin pa chen pos kho bo ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che tshol du 'ongs so zhes smras so///
360a1(mdo sde): de nas sbyin po de dag rab tu dga' ste/'di ni bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa zhig snum bsams nas/'di ni da dung klu'i pheM brang lus shin tu ra
360a2(mdo sde): ste/nam yang mi phyin pas/nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/mthu zhig bsgyangs te bsgral lo snyam nas/nam mkha' la khyer te/dpag tshad ba zhi brgya'i pha rol tu phyin nas/
360a3(mdo sde): phyir yang sa la bzhig go/sbyin pa chen po de nas yang song song ba las/ring po ma lon par dngul gyi mkhar zhig mthong nas/klu'i gnas yin no bsnyam bsams te
360a4(mdo sde): par song ngo //mkhar de'i phyi rol 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te/'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug pa 'jig su rung bas gang ngo //sbyin pa chen pos de dag mthong nas/
360a5(mdo sde): sbrul gdug pa 'di dag ni sngon zhe sdang che ba'i lan gyis/'di lta bu'i lus 'jigs su rung ba myong bar gyur to snyam ste/de la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar byams shing
360a6(mdo sde): snying rje ba'i sems skyes te/de ltar byams pa'i sems bskyed pas/sbrul gyi gduge pa yang zhi bar gyur nas/sbrul de dag pardzis twe klu'i mkhar du song ngo //mkhar
360a7(mdo sde): de la klu gnyis kyis dkris te/klu'i mkhar sgo la bstan to//klu de gnyis kyis sbyin pa chen po mthong nas mgo ba tig ste gdug pa'i byin pa las/sbyin pa chen po
360b1(mdo sde): byams pa'i sems bskyed pas/gdug pa yang zhe nas mag smad de nyalo/sbyin pa chen pos klu'i mgo la brdzes nas/mkhar gyi nang du song ba dang /mkhar gyi nang na klu zhig rin
360b2(mdo sde): po che sna bdun gyi gzhol mad khang na 'dug pa mthong ngo //klu'i rgyal po des byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang /spangs te 'di snyam du bsams so//nga'i gnas 'di'ibs rim
360b3(mdo sde): pa bdun gyis bskor te/'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug pas gang bas/klu dang /gnod sbyin ma yin pa gzhan gang yang 'dir 'ong ba'i thugs mi thub na/'di lta bu su zhig
360b4(mdo sde): snyam ste 'dug pa las langs nas bsu ste/bsti steng dang bcas pas phyag byas nas/rin po che'i khri la bzhag ste/kha zas rnams pa sra tshogs byin no//kha thAM sa zos

360b7(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir/lam ring po nis nyon mongs pa dang bsngos te/rgyal po chen po khyod la nor bu rin po che slong du 'ongs so//yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches sems can la phan/

361a3(mdo sde): bod ba zhe stsal bdag cag la nus kyang bstun na/yi bzhin gyis ning bu rin po che yang sbyin no zhes byas pa dang /byang chub sems dpas kyang de bzhin du bya'o nas smras so//
