361a6(mdo sde): las/yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po chu bkrol te phulo//skyes bu chen po 'gro ba lta phan pa'i don du yi dam la shin tu brtan pa khyod gdon mi zla bar 'tshang rgya'o//nam mngon du
361a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas pa na/bdag kyang khyed kyi nye gnas mtshig tu gyur cig ces smras so//de nas klu'i rgyal po la nor bu rin po che 'di lo mthu stobs ci yod ces dris ni/smras pa/nor du
361b1(mdo sde): 'di ni dpag tshad nyid stong kho ra khor yug tu dgos pa thams cad char bzhin du 'bebs nuso//byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/nor bu rin po che 'di mthu stobs che mod kyi/'on kyang
361b2(mdo sde): bdag gis bsams pa'i don chen po sgrub nus pa ma yin no bsams nas/klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas bskyal te song ngo //de nas yang song song ba las rgyang ma nas/bai DUr+ya
361b3(mdo sde): sngon po'i mkhar cig mthong ngo //mkhar de 'dod par song pa dang /mkhar drung du phyin na/mkhar de yang 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor to//'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug pas yongs su
361b4(mdo sde): grang ngo //byang chub sems dpas sbrul gdug pa de dag la snying brtse zhing byams pa'i sems bskyed pas/sbrul gyi gdug bzhi nas sbrul de dag la brdzis te song //mkhar sgor phyin pa dang /klu gnyis
361b5(mdo sde): shig mkhar sgor na nyal ba yang byang chub seM snying brtse zhing byams pa'i sems kyis/klu'i gdug bzhi nas mgo la brdzis te mkhar gyi nang du song ngo //de'i mkhar de nas klu'i rgyal po gcig/rin
361b6(mdo sde): po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khong na 'dug pas/rgyang ma nas byang chub sems dpa' mthing nas/'di snyam du bdag gi gra nas 'di la 'bras rim pa bdun gyis bskor te/'obs kyi nang na
361b7(mdo sde): sbrul gdug pas gang bas/klu dang gnod sbyin ma yin pa gzhon su yang 'ong ba'i thugs mi thub na/mi 'di lta bu su yin/gang nas 'ongs snyam ste/yi mtshan du gyur nas/bsu ste bsti
362a1(mdo sde): snang dang bcas pas phyag byas nas/rin po che'i gdan la bzhin go/de nas kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyar te phul nas byang chub sems
362a2(mdo sde): dpas kha zas zos pa'i 'og tu khyod 'dir ci los 'ongs//don ci yod ces dris so//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/bdag ni rgyal po khyod la yid bzhi ni gyi nor bu rin po
362a3(mdo sde): che slong du 'ongs so//klus smras pa/rin po che ni shin tu yang rnyed par dka' ste/khyod 'dod pa yang dag na/kho bos gsol ba bzhin du zla ba gnyis shig 'dir 'dug ste/
362a4(mdo sde): bdag cag la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan nas/bdag cag gi mchod pa bzhes na/rin po che yang sbyin no zhes byas pa dang /sbyin pa chen pos kyang de bzhin du bya'o//
362a5(mdo sde): zhes smras so//de nas klu'i rgyal pos zla ba gnyis kyi bar du kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyar te phul nas/rol mo sna tshogs kyis mchod de/byang chub
362a6(mdo sde): sems dpas kyang de dag la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i chos kyi rnam grangs/zla ba gnyis kyi bar du bstan te/phyir 'gro bar bsams nas/klu'i rgyal pos kyang yid bzhin
362a7(mdo sde): gyi nor bu rin po che bkrol te phul nas/skyes bu chen po yid ma la shin tu brtan pa khyod gden mi za bar 'tshang rgya'o nam mngon par sangs rgyas pa na/bdag kyang khyod
362b1(mdo sde): k+ShAnyaM gnas bgyi'o zhes smras pa dang /de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras//nor bu rin po che 'di la mthu stobs kyi yod ces dIsmya na/nor bu 'di ni dpag rlung bzhi stong khor khor yug tu
362b2(mdo sde): ci yod pa thams cad tshwa bzhin du 'bebs so zhes smras//byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di snya du rin po che 'di mthu stobs che mod kyi/bdag gis bsam pa grub pa me yin na
362b3(mdo sde): snyam nas/klu'i 'khor gyis sgo'i phyi rol tu byang chub sems dpa' bsgral to//de nas yang song song ba las rgyang me nA gser kyim ltam tu mtshar ba zhig mthong nas/byang chub sems
362b4(mdo sde): dpa' de'i drung du song nas phyin pa dang /mkhar de yang 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te/'obs kyi nang na sprul gdug pas yongasu gang ba mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' yang
362b5(mdo sde): byams pa'i sems bskyed pas/sbrul gyi gdug pa zhi nas/de la brdzis te song ngo //mkhar rdul 'ang kug nyis shig 'khyil te mgo sgo rol tu bstan nas nyal po/byang chub sems dpas
362b6(mdo sde): mthong nas/mgo bteg ste gdug pa 'byin pa las byang chub sems dpas snying brtse zhing byams pa'i sems bskyed pas/gdug pa zhi nas/de'i mgo la birdzes te/mamagyinang duso//
362b7(mdo sde): mgyi na kye rgyal pos/rin po che'i gzhal meng khang nas/byang chub sems dpa' rgyang ma nas 'di snyam du bdag gi gnas 'di ni 'bas rim pa bdun gyis bskor te/'obs kyi
363a1(mdo sde): nang na sbrul gdug pas gang bas/klu dang gnod sbyin ma gtogs par gzhan gang yang 'ong ba'i thugs mi thub na/mi 'di su yin gang nas 'ongs snyam/
363a2(mdo sde): ngo mtshar du bzung ste/rgyang ma nas bsu nas bsti bstang dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal te/rin po che'i gdan la 'dug tu bcug go//de nas kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna
363a3(mdo sde): tshogs sbyar te phul nas kha zas zos pa'i 'og tu khyod su zhig gang nas 'ongs shes dris so//de la byang chub sems dpa' bdag ni 'dzam bu'i gling nas mchis te/'dzam bu'i
363a4(mdo sde): gling gi sems can dag bsod nams chungs pas/nor dang zas dang skom gyi phyir/gcig la gtsog rnam pa sna tshogs pas 'che zhing gsod de/mi dge ba bcu'i las rdzogs par
363a5(mdo sde): byed pas/tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan sum du ltung zhing sdug bsngal mang po myong bar 'gyur bas/bdag ni de dag la snying brtse ste mgon bya ba'i phyir/rgyal po chen po khyod la yid
363a6(mdo sde): bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che slong du 'ongs so//klu'i rgyal pos smras pa/yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni rnyed par bla ba ma yin te/skyes bu khyod bdag la ri ste 'ongs nas/bdag
363a7(mdo sde): gi gnas 'dir zla ba bzhi zhig 'dug ste/bdag cag gi mchod pa bzhes na/rin po che yang dbul lo zhes byas pa dang /byang chub sems dpas yang de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes
363b1(mdo sde): smras nas/klu'i rgyal pos zla ba bzhi'i byar du kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyar tA phul nas/rol mo mang pos kyang mdzod do//de la byang chub sems dngas chos kyi rnam blang
363b2(mdo sde): rgyu cher phye zhing bstan pas/klu'i rgyal po rab tu dga' ste/klu gzhan dang gnod sbyin gzhan mi mi ltos byar/po byad thams cad kyang yid bzhin du sbyar te//de lta bu'i tshul du za ba bzhi byas
363b3(mdo sde): nas/byang chub sems dpa' 'gro bar chas pa dang /klu'i rgyal pos gtsug phung nas/yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bkrol te/byang chub sems dpa' la phul nas skyes bu chen po
363b4(mdo sde): yi dmau las brtan pa khyed gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya'o//nam mngon par sangs rgyas pa na/bdag kyang nye gnas mchog tu gyur te/bsnyen bkur byed par shog shig ces smon lam btas
363b5(mdo sde): po//byang chub sems dpas kyang de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas/nor bu rin po che 'di la mthu stobs ji tsam cig yod ces dri so//klu'i rgyal pos smras pa/rin po che 'di ni dpag tshad
363b6(mdo sde): brgyad stong kho ra khor yug tu rin po che tshar bzhin 'bebs te/ci 'dod pa thams cad 'bab bo zhes smras pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gdod dga'i nas 'di snyam du/'dzam bu gling
363b7(mdo sde): gis khyon ni dpag tshad bdun stong las med de/nor bu rin po che 'dis ni bdag gi re ba skong ngo snyam bsams nas/snga phyir rnyed pa'i rin po che gsum char gas kyi mtha' mar phrer
364a1(mdo sde): te/mkhar gyi sgor byung ba dang /klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas bsgral nas/so sor dong ngo //byang chub sems dpas pha zang cig tu phyin nas/
364a2(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che rnams lag tu thogs nas 'di skad ces smon yam btab po//nor bu 'di yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yi ni yang dag na/bdag nam mkha' la 'phur bur
364a3(mdo sde): gyur cig ces smras so//de skad ces smras ma thag tu nam mkha' la 'phur te/rgya mtsho'i bgegs las thar nas/rgya mtsho'i ngogasu phyin par gyur te/de na cung zad pasti zhing
364a4(mdo sde): ngal sos pa'i mal du gnyid kyis log pa dang /de'i tshe rgya mtsho'i klu bran rnams 'di skadurgya bgro so//rgya mtsho 'di na nor bu rin po che 'di gsum las med/gsum char mi 'dis
364a5(mdo sde): khyer gyis/nor bu 'dri ni yon tan dang ldan pas bdag cag la yang dgos kyis phyir ba'o zhes bgros nas/byang chub sems dpa' gnyid ldog pa'i tshe yid bzhin byi nor bu
364a6(mdo sde): rin po che klu rnams kyis phyir bduso//byang chub sems dpa' sang nas bltas na/nor bu rin po che med pas 'di snyam du bsam so//'di ni gdon mi za bar rgya mtsho'i klus
364a7(mdo sde): brkus kyis/bdag gas mthu ci yod pas rgya mtsho'i chu bcus te bskams par bya'o snyam bsams te/nor bu phyir ma thob kyi bar du lag pa stong mi 'gro'o snyam yi dam bcas
364b1(mdo sde): nas/rgyun dag su pa m+b+ha a sbal gyi log pa zhig blangs nas lag pa gnyis kyis d+h+ya na tso'i chu bcu so//de'i rgyun rgya mtsho'i lhas de'i bas mya ba shes nas dul dring skad ces sma du/
364b2(mdo sde): rgya mtsho 'di ni gting zab cing yangs te/dpag tshad stong phrag sum brgya sum cu yod pa/gal te lam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad 'og kyang rgya mtsho skams par byed mi nus ni//khyod
364b3(mdo sde): pus nus pa lta ci smos te don med do//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/mi gcig gi snying nas la su byas na ci yang mi 'gru ba med/bdag gi rin po che rnyed po des 'gro ba thams
364b4(mdo sde): cad phan pa dang /bde ba bya bar bsams te/de'i bsod nams kyis mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/de la sems ma zhum na/ci'i phyir rgya mamo 'di skams par mi nus zhes smra'o//
364b5(mdo sde): re'i tshe na lha khyab 'jug la sogs pas/rgyang ma nas byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu lus yid 'thun par rgya mtsho'i chu bcus te/'gro ba mang po'i don tu dka' ba byed pa mthong
364b6(mdo sde): nas/de dag byang chub sems dpa' la bstang ngo snya ma rA snams te/gcig nas gcig tu spyan nas/thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i drung du lhags te/byang chub sems dpa'
364b7(mdo sde): snod kyis chu tshub mthong nas/sa de dag thams cad so so'i gos phud de/chung skyugs nas lan cig skyugs te phyir phyung bas/rgya mtsho'i chu dang gi tshad bzhi bcu bri'o//yang la na
365a1(mdo sde): gnyis skyugs pas dpag tshad brgyad du dri'o//lan gsum skyugs pas dpag tshad brgya nyi shu bri nas/klu de dag 'jigs skrag ste/byang chub sems dpa//
365a2(mdo sde): drung du lhags nas 'di skad du tho shig/rgya mtsho'i chu skams par mi byed cig ces smras pa dang /byang chub sems dpes btang ngo //de nas klu rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'
365a3(mdo sde): lo khyod kyi nor bu rin po che 'di ci zhig tu dgos/smras pa/bdag gis sems can la phan pa'i don tu dgoso//klus smras pa/sems can lnga phan pa'i don tu dgos na/rgyu
365a4(mdo sde): mtsho'i nang na yang sems can mang du yod na/ci'i phyir bskur zhes smraso//smras pa/rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas pa yang sems can yin mod kyi/de la phongs pa'i sdug bsngal
365a5(mdo sde): med de/'dzam bu gling gi sems can dag ni nor gyi phyir/gcig gis gcig rnam par 'tshe zhing gnod pa byed/mi dge ba bcu rdzogs par byed pas/tshe 'phos nas
365a6(mdo sde): kun sems can dmyal bar skye ste/bdag ni de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir rin po che 'di dgos sa zhes smras pa dang /klu rnams kyis nor bu rin po che byung ste slar phu'o//
365a7(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i lhas byang chub sems dpa' da ltar brtson 'grus la brtan pa mthong nas/'di ni gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya'o//snum sems te/nam mngon par sangs rgyas
365b1(mdo sde): pa na/bdag kyang nye gnas kyi mchog tu gyur cig ces skyon lam btab po//de nas byang chub sems dpas rin po che phyir thob nas/steng gri nam mkha' la 'phur te gnas su 'ongs nas/
365b2(mdo sde): sngar gyi tshong pa grogs po rnams yod dam bde bar phyin tam zhes driso//tshong pa grogs po dag bde bar phyin nas/de dag gcig la gcig dga' nas grogs po rnams kyis ngo mtshur
365b3(mdo sde): ya mtshan du bzung ngo //de nas bram ze ka pi li'i sgor song nas/byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho nas phyir log go zhes thos nas thams cad kyis skor bsu ste/rab tu dga' nas tshong
365b4(mdo sde): pa grogs po rnams dang bcas pa la dga' sten chen po byaso//de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas rin po che thogs te/khyim du 'ongs pa dang /bram ze de'i bang mdzod thams cad yongs su
365b5(mdo sde): gang bar gyur to//de nas bram ze ka pi lis rin po che sna tshogs kyis bu mo brgyan nas/rin po che'i chu snod bskur te/byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang rkang lag bkrus nas/bu mo'i
365b6(mdo sde): lag pa nas bzung ste/byang chub sems dpa' la gtang /byang chub sems dpas kyang bzhes nas/bram ze rab tu dge' ste/bu mo'i g.yog tu bu mo lnga brgya dang /glang po che lnga
365b7(mdo sde): brgya yang rin po ches brgyan te/rol mo byas nas/byang chub sems dpa' la brdzangaso//de'i tshe na sbyin pa chen po'i pha ma bu dang bral ba'i 'og tu rtag tu ngu bas/pha ma gnyis ka'i mig
366a1(mdo sde): ljongs par gyur te/bu rgya mtsho nas logs pa dang phra ma phrad nas/busu pha ma la phyag 'tshal te/lag pa nas 'jus nus bu yin par rtogs so//sbyin
366a2(mdo sde): ba chen po khyod kyis nged bor te song ba'i 'og tu mig kyang ldongaso/khyod rgya mtshor song song nas ci rnyed ces dris pa dang /sbyin pa chen pos nor bu rin po che pha'i lag tu byin te//
366a3(mdo sde): bdag gis 'di rnyed do zhes smras nas/phas lag tu blangs te bsnams nas/'di lta bu'i rdo ba ni dri'i mdzod na sngon yang mang du yod na/'di ltar nyon mongs pa dang sngo ci dgos
366a4(mdo sde): shes smras so//de nas byang chub sems dpas nor bu phyir blangs te/pha ma'i mig byis pa tsam gyis ji ltar rlung drag pos sprin bus pa bzhin du/pha ma gnyis kyi mig kyang
366a5(mdo sde): gsal bar mthong bar gyur to//de nas pha ma gnyis dga' ste/'di ni nor bu rin po che yin yang dag pa lta ste/nyon mongs pa'i don yod par gyur to zhes smras so//de nas
366a6(mdo sde): yang sbyin pa chen pos rin po che thogs te/khyod yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yin yang dag na/kho ba'i pha ma'i 'og tu rin po che sna bdun gyi gdan 'byung zhing /rin po che'i
366a7(mdo sde): bla res khebs par shog shig ces smon lam btab ma thag tu de bzhin du grub nas/rgyal po'i bang mdzong thams cad kyang gang bar gyur to//de nas rgyal pos pho nya gcig
366b1(mdo sde): glang po che dpag tshad brgyud du 'gro ba zhig bskyon te/'dzam bu'i gling gi mI thams cad la sbyin pa chen pos rgya mtsho nas/yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rnyed de/nor bu yon tan can des
366b2(mdo sde): de ste zhag bdun na/rin po che la sogs pa gos dang /zas dang /dgos pa'i yon tan thams cad char bzhin du 'bebs kyis/so so nas ci bde long shig ces bsgrag so//de ltar kun tu/
366b3(mdo sde): bsgrags nas/sbyin pa chen po khrus byas te/gos gsar pa bgos nas/ga la'i thang bu mnyam por rgyal mtshan btsugs te/yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la
366b4(mdo sde): btags nas/prog por lag tu blangs nas 'di skad ces smon lam btab po/'dzam bu'i gling gi mi dag ni dbul phongs pa sha stag ste/de dag la phan gdags dgos kyis/yid
366b5(mdo sde): bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yin te mi brdzun na/so so nas ci dang ci dgos pa de dang de dag thams cad yid bzhin du char ltar phob shig ces smras ma thag tu phyogs bzhi nas rlung nas
366b6(mdo sde): po g.yos nas/de ma thag tu mi gtsang ba'i nyal nyil thams cad phyags te/char zim bu mi drag pa zhig phab nas/rdul mi 'thul bar byas pa'i 'og tu thog mar bza' ba dang /
366b7(mdo sde): btung ba ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du bab po//de nas 'bru rnams char bzhin du bab po//de nas gos char bzhin du bab po//de nas rin po che char bzhin du bab
367a1(mdo sde): /m+bu myed ni rin nga sa ngasusmra klu sa/rnyan ldan dag gasgrog m+b+haSh+Ta g+hats+tshos bu pas sgra rlung chub snyoms du spyod sbya g+sa/
367a2(mdo sde): rnyog par byas rgyu/dzam bu'i gling mi ninas la 'di zhes pab+hA lA//'a ma bu'i gling gi sems rten dgun gros dang / glain kyi phyir gcigal gcig gas
367a3(mdo sde): rnam po tshogs kyis gces pa smra/sdig pa mi dge ba'i rlom+bu 'bral zhig byed de/tshe'i dus byas nas don song gsum du rgyud ste/mun po nas mun pa glo bas/'dzin
367a4(mdo sde): la sbying ng+ge /rnam gags dang /rlon po ba sa sa de/khyod nams pade bar sbyin/
367a5(mdo sde): spyo na nga ma tho hU~M/bdI Sh+TaraSh+Ta m+b+his khyed rnams dge pa 'i ma sang+ge/skyes dag slo dge 'a
367a6(mdo sde): kyinas // la b+h+rUM shrI las kyi na byed na s+t+wa~M/
367a7(mdo sde): kyi skyes so/ dus na/de'i 'bras gling rlu gyur pa'i leb zas bra ldan no//de mi gyur ba ni su pa ma sum sa no//
367b1(mdo sde): sbyin pa chenado ni nyid yin no//dang la gyi mkhar na 'dug pa'i klu de ni shA ri'i bu yin no//bai nAna'i mkhar na 'dug pa'i klu do ni mo'u dag la yan yin no//gas pa//
367b2(mdo sde): gyigyo mkhar na 'dug pa'i glu de ni kun dga' bo yin no//rgya mtsho'i lha de ni mi 'gags pa yin no//kun dga' bo 'di klu'i rgyal po byed pa na yang ngal bsnyen bkur byas te dus
367b3(mdo sde): la mkhas/daltar gyi bar du yang dus la mkhas kyis/'dod pa gsum yang yi bzhin du gnang ngo zhes bka' stsal pa dang /kun dga' bo dga' mgu ras nas/pus mo
367b4(mdo sde): ngas la btsugs te/bdag gis nam 'tsho'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la basbyin bkur bgyi'o zhes gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/'a
367b5(mdo sde): mang po rnams/la la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa nus/dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i bar du thob bo//la la ni rang sangs rgyas su gyur/la la ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu
367b6(mdo sde): sems bskyed do//lA la ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bos nas rje su yi ra s+ya te/mngon par dga'o//sbyin pa chen po rgya mtshor zhugs pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o////rgyal po me long
367b7(mdo sde): gdong gi lo'u'o//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ni/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khob n+ya gro nga'i tshal na bzhug so//de'i tshe ni/bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa dang /
368a1(mdo sde): byin la sogs pa bskor cing bzhugs pa las/bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan dang /dpe byad dang /gser gyi mdog lta bu'i sku la 'khor mang po thams cad
368a2(mdo sde): ngo mtshar du 'dzin te bstod cing bsngag so//de ltar bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang po las 'phags te/thams cad kyi mchog gtso bor gyur pas/dge slong dag the tsom du gyur
368a3(mdo sde): nas/bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/da ltar 'di 'ba' shig tu 'khor kun las 'phags te/mchog gtso bor gyur pa ma yin gyi//
368a4(mdo sde): sngon 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di dag kun las 'phags te/gtso bor gyur to//de nas dge slong dag gis sngon ji ltar gtso bor gyur pa bstan par gsol pa dang de la bcom
368a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i pha rol na/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal
368a6(mdo sde): po chen po rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong la dbang byed pa zhig byung ste/de la bu ni lnga brgya yod do//dus phye zhig na btsun mo la bu gaucig btsas te/lus gser gyi kha dog can sla
368a7(mdo sde): mthon ting lta bu lag mthal na 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i mtshan yod pa/rkang pa g.yon gyi mthil na rta'i ri mo yod pa/rkang pa g.yas kyi mthil na glang po che'i ri mo
368b1(mdo sde): yod pa/bsod nams dang mtshan du ldan pa zhig bcas te/ming yang me long gdong zhes bya bar btags so//rgyal po chen po de nad kyis btab ste/tshe'i dus byang du nye ba na/blon po rnams
368b2(mdo sde): kyis sras 'di rnams kyi nang na rgyal tshab tu gang bzhugs/rgyal po'i dbang gang la bskur zhes zhus pa dang /rgyal po des yon tan dang mtshan rnamo pa 'di bcu dang ldan na/rgyal
368b3(mdo sde): por chug la dbang bskur cig ces bsgo'o//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/lus kyi mdog gser lha bu la/skra mthon ting du 'dug pa dang /lag pa gnyis kyi mthil na 'khor lo'i
368b4(mdo sde): mtshan yod pa dang /rkang pa g.yas kyi mthil na glang po che'i ri mo yod pa dang /rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthil na rta'i ri mo yod pa dang /rgyal po'i gos bskon na/lus dang 'tsham zhing
368b5(mdo sde): me che ma chung ba dang /rgyal po'i stan la 'dug na gzi brjid dang mthur ldan pa dang /rgyal phran rnams kyis bkur sti rim gro cher byed de/btsun mo dang pho brang slas rnams kyang de la
368b6(mdo sde): dga' zhing phyag byed pa dang /lha rnams kyi rten du khrid na/lha rnams kyis phyir phyag bya ba dang /yon tan dang bsod nams kyi mthus rin po che sna bdun gyi cher 'bebs shing
368b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi yid tshim par byed pa dang /btsun mo chen mos las bcas po dang bcu ste/yon tan 'di dag dang ldan na/rgyal por dbang bskur cig ces bsgo nas/mi rtag pa
369a1(mdo sde): mngon sum du gyur te/tshe 'phos so//de nas rgyal bu dang blon po rnams 'dus te/rgyal bu nang gi chen po nus mthar gyis yon tan bcu ga la/
369a2(mdo sde): yod pa brtags na/rgyal bu gzhan thams cad ni lus kyang gsar lta bu'i mdog can ma yin/sgra mthon ting du 'dug pa ma yin/lag pa'i mthil ni 'khor lo'i mtsha
369a3(mdo sde): yod pa ma yin/rkang pa'i mthil na glang po che dang /rta'i ri mo yod pa ma yin/rgyal po'i gos dang 'tshem pa ma yin/rgyal po'i gdan la bzhag pa na/sngangs pa ltar
369a4(mdo sde): 'greng bar gyur//rgyal phran dang /blon po rnams bsti stang dang phyag mi byed de/btsun mo dang /pho brang sras rnams dga' ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /lha'i rten du khrid na lha rnams
369a5(mdo sde): phyag bya ba ma yin//rin po che'i char 'bebs nus pa ma yin/btsun mo chen mo'i sras kyang ma yin te/rgyal bu lnga brgya las mtshan gcig tsam dang ldan pa 'ga' yang 'byung
369a6(mdo sde): ste/sras nang gi tha chungs 'bu' shig/lus gser gyi mdog can la/sgra mthon ting gi mdog lta bu/lag pa gnyis kyi mthil na 'khor lo'i mtshan dang yang ldan/rkang po'i
369a7(mdo sde): mthil na glang po che dang rta'i ri mo yang yod/go dang lus su 'tsham/rgyal po'i gdan la bzhag na/gzi brjid dang byin che/rgyal phran thams cad kyis bsti steng dang bcas
369b1(mdo sde): pas phyag byed cing /btsun mo dang sgras rnams kyang dga' bas phyag byed/lha'i rten du 'ongs na lha rnams phyug byed/rin po che phob shig ces smras na thag tu char bzhin
369b2(mdo sde): du 'bab/btsun mo nang gi chen mo las btsas te/mtshan rdzogs por ldan pas/rgyal phran dang blon po rnams kyis rgyal por dbang bskur te/chos bcwa lnga'i nang bar nyi ma
369b3(mdo sde): thag mar shar ba na/gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa/che khyad dpag tshad gcig pa/shar phyogs nas 'ongs te/de la pus mo btsugs nas/gral te bdag
369b4(mdo sde): yon tan dang ldan te/rgyal por 'gyur na 'khor lo 'di bdag gi drung du nye bor shog shig ces smras pa dang /nam mkha'i phyogs nas nye bar 'ongs so//glang po rin po che ni
369b5(mdo sde): spos kyi dud can nas 'ongs te/mjug ma la nor bus brgyan la/rgyal po de la zhon nas na mkha' la 'phur te/nyi ma phyed kyis gling bzhi nas 'khor to//gal te rkang pas 'gron
369b6(mdo sde): rkang pa'i rjes su gar reg par gser gyi bye mar 'gyur ro//rta rin po che ni kha rog mthing ka la rnga rngag dmar ba/rin po che sna bdun 'bab pa rgyal po de zhon na/zan cig bza'
369b7(mdo sde): ran tsam gyis gling bzhi nas 'khor te/mingal mi dub bo//nor bu rin po che ni 'od zer nyin mtshan du gsal te/rgyang grags pargya nyi shu tshun chad 'od kyis snang bar byed la/
370a1(mdo sde): rin po che sna bdun char bzhin du 'bab cing thams cad la sbyin par byed do//bud med rin pa che ni bzung ba mdzes pa/rgyal po'i yin tshim par byed do//khyim
370a2(mdo sde): bdag rin po che ni rgyal po'i rin po che sna bdun ci dgos pa yid bzhin du sbyar te/zad me shes par byed do//blon po rin po che ni rgyal po la dpung rnam bzhi dgos na/bltos pa
370a3(mdo sde): tsam gyis dpung gi tshogs rnams 'dus te/rtsa ba dang mthur ldan no//de ltar rin po che sna bdun dang ldan nas/de 'dri snyam du sems so//thabs 'di lta bu thob pa yang ston
370a4(mdo sde): gyi bsod nams lus skyes kyis/rgyal po'i gdung rgyud mi 'chad par bya'o snyam bsams nis/spos chus khrus byas te/gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgos nas/lag na pog po
370a5(mdo sde): thogs te/shar phyogs logs su pus mo sa la btsugs nas 'di skad ces smraso//shar phyogs na skyes bu 'phogs pa bzhugs pa rnams/bdag gsol ba bzhin du
370a6(mdo sde): gshegs su gsol zhes smras po dang /shar phyogs nas rang sangs rgyas nyi khri snyed rgyal po'i pho brang du gshegs so//b+h+yo dang /nub dang /byang phyogs su yang de bzhin du
370a7(mdo sde): gsol pa dang //de dag kyang so so nas rang sangs rgyas nyi khri snyed rgyal po'i pho brang du gshegs so//de nas rgyal po dang /blon po rnams kyis yo byad rnam bzhi sbyar te mchod sde
370b1(mdo sde): //nas rgyal bran brgyad rgyu na rlung snod pyod stsal du 'gro bar gsol/phyi dag 'tshul ban/rgyu blun rnasas sa byubyugs pa rnams pa/shas kyis bdag klu kyang /
370b2(mdo sde): mchod par 'otshal te/bsod nams bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /rgyal po dang /blon po rnams kyis lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du/rang sangs rgyas brgyad khri la yid bzhin
370b3(mdo sde): du mchod nas/tshe'i dus byas pa dang /mtho ris kyi lhar skyeso//dge slong dag de'i tshe/rgyal po me long gdod de ni de ltar nga yin no//rgyal po de'i pha ni nga'i yab zas gtsang ma
370b4(mdo sde): yin no//btsun mo chen mo de ni nga'i yum lha mdzes yin no//rgyal bu lnga brgya nI shAkya'i rigs lnga brgya yin no//de'i tshe na yang thams cad kyi mchog gtso bor gyur te nga sangs
370b5(mdo sde): rgyas nas kyang mtshan dang ldan pa'i mchog gtso bor gyur to//'khor mang po rnams sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yid rangs nas mngon par dge'o//rgyal po che/
370b6(mdo sde): long gdong gi le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o////bam po brgyad pa////legs tshal dang nyes tshol gyi le'u'o//'dra skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/btso
370b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//de'i tshe lhas sbyin rab tu byung mod kyi/rnyed pa la chags pas
371a1(mdo sde): mtshams med pa'i las/ri snyil nas sangs rgyas mnan pa dang /zhabs la shIng gi tshul pa 'dzugs pa dang /glang po che rmigs pa gtang ba dang /
371a2(mdo sde): 'dum pa'i dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa dang /zug pa blud pa'i dge slong ma bsad pa dang /mi dge ba'i las 'di dag byas nas/skye ba phyi ma'i rnam par smin pas 'jigs
371a3(mdo sde): te/mu stegs can+da gyi ston pa drug gi thad du song nas driso//ston pa drug gis kyang ngan par lta bu'i chos sdig pa byas kyang sdig par mi 'gyur la/dge ba byas kyang
371a4(mdo sde): bsod nams su mi 'gyur ba'i chos bstan nas/de la yid ches de dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad do//de'i tshe na kun dga' bos phu nu pA la snying brtse ba'i phyir/rtag tu mi dga'
371a5(mdo sde): ste ngus nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//lhas sbyin gti mug can ni mi dge ba'i lus kha na ma tho ba baMgyis te/dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad nas shAkya'i
371a6(mdo sde): rigs kyang sun par bgyi so//bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/lhas sbyin 'di ni tshe 'di 'ba' shig la rnyed pa dang grags pa'i phyir/dge ba'i rgyu
371a7(mdo sde): ba bcad par mi zad kyi/'das pa'i dus na yang rnyed pa dang /brags pa'i phyir/lus dang srog kyang stor ba'i las byaso//dge slong dag the tsom du gyur nas/kun dga' bos
371b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//lha sbyin gyis 'das pa'i dus na rnyed pa dang grags pa'i slad du/lus dang srog stor pa'i las bgyis pa ji lta bu lags shes gsol pa dang
371b2(mdo sde): bac+doMs kyi kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo sngon 'das pa'i dus na/bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i pha rol na/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yul ba ra nA se na/
371b3(mdo sde): bram ze ma ha ya yi zhes bya ba zhig yod de/rigs mnyam pa las/chung ma blangs nas ring po ma lon par chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te/zla ba dgu tshang nas bu khye'u zhig
371b4(mdo sde): btsa so de nas btsas ston chen po byas nas/bu'i ming yang legs tshol zhes bya bar btags te/ma ma la gtad nas gsoso//de nas yang sems can dang ldan pa 'gyur te/sngon
371b5(mdo sde): ma de mnyan zhing nges pa las/sems can dang ldan pa'i 'og tu gtum zhing khro bar gyur to//de nas zla ba tshang nas khye'u zhig btsas te/de ltar ma yang sngon las gyur pas/bu'i ming
371b6(mdo sde): yang nyes tshol zhes bya bar btags te/ma ma gtang nas gso so//khye'u spun gnyis phyis cher skyes nas/spyan gnyis rgya mtshor rin po che len par dad de/so so nas 'khor dang
371b7(mdo sde): grogs lnga brgya lnga brgya rnyed nas/snga phyir lam du zhugs so//lam ring bas na zhal bdun gyi gnas su ma phyin par rgyags chad de/srog dang bral du nye nas/legs tshol dang grogs
372a1(mdo sde): tshong pa rnams nyam thag ste/thams cad lha rjed cing /lha rnams la mchod pa byed do//de nas 'brog stong de na rgyang ma nas skyed shing bzang po gcig mthong nas/
372a2(mdo sde): thams cad skyed shing drung du lhags pa dang /shing gi drung na chu mig bzang po gcig kyang yod de/tshong pa rnams chu mig de la 'thungs nas/bdag cag gis lha mchod pa'i rtags
372a3(mdo sde): 'di'o//zhes smras pa dang /lha mngon du smra ste skyed shing gi yal ga chog shig dang /'dod pa thams cad 'byung zhes bsgo'o//de nas yalA ga g+ha cig bcag pa dang /btung ba zhim
372a4(mdo sde): po byung ngo //de nas yal ga gcig btsag pa dang /kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa thams cad byung nas de dag kun gyis tshim par zo so//nA ne+e d+hU thA ga gcig bcag pa dang /gros
372a5(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs byung ngo //de nA ya lag gcig bcag pa dang /nor bu rin po che sna tshogs byung ste/khal thams cad longs so//de nas nyes tshel la sogs pa yang der
372a6(mdo sde): lhags te/snga mas yal ga bcag pa las//rin po che sna tshogs khal longs pa rnyed pa mthong nas/'di snyam du bsams so snga ma 'di dag gis pa la ga las kyang rin po
372a7(mdo sde): che chog par rnyed na/shing 'di'i rtsa ba phyung na ni/rin po che sna tshogs mang du rnyed de snyam bsams nas/shing gi rtsa ba rko ba re gzaso//de nas legs tshol mi dga' ste
372b1(mdo sde): smras pa/bdag cag ni phongs te/srog dang bral ba las shing 'dis bdag cag srog gsos kyis/khyod shing 'di ma gcod cig ces smras na/nyes tshol ma nyan te/shing gi rtsa ba
372b2(mdo sde): 'byin to//de nas legs stsol yang mthong mi 'dod pas//khal dang chas te song ba'i 'og tu/shing gi rtsa ba nas/srin po lnga brgya bying ste/nyes tshol dang tshong pa kun zos so//kun
372b3(mdo sde): dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na/legs tshol de ni da ltar nga yin no//de'i pha ni da ltar nga'i yab zas gtsang ma yin no//de'i ma ni da ltar nga' yul lha mdzes yin no//nyes tshol ni da ltar gyi
372b4(mdo sde): lhas sbyin 'di yin te/kun dga' bo lhas sbyin gyis/da ltar 'ba' shig nga la gnod par ma zad de/rnyed pa dang /grags pa'i phyir//skye ba thams cad du nga la gnod pa byas na/
372b5(mdo sde): ngas phan pa'i chos bstan to//phan byas kyang lhos sbyin ni nga la dgrar 'dzin to//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs nas/mkhor mang po rnams rje su yi rang ste/mngon par
372b6(mdo sde): dpa'o//legs tshol dang nyes tshol gyi le'u ste sum cu gnyis pa'o////bam po dgu pa////rgyal po dge don gyi le'u'o//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na
372b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab/bya rgod phung po'i ri la/dge slong chen po'i dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so//de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos//lhas sbyin
373a1(mdo sde): gyis thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa la gnod pa bya bar byasams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni/lhas sbyin dang /sgyu glanan+da 'dzin
373a2(mdo sde): gnyis la/mi 'dra ba med par dgongs te/rtag tu de la thugs brtse bar mthong ste/bac+doMs la zhus po dang /bcoMs kyi/kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//lhas sbyin 'dis dus
373a3(mdo sde): 'di nyid na/nga la gnod sems bskyed par ma zad do//skye ba gzhan du yang nga la gnod sems bskyed do//dge slong dag the tsom du gyur nas/kun dga' bos/bcom ldan 'das
373a4(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to//lhas sbyin 'dis skye gzhan dag na/bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa ji ltar bgyis shes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis/kun dga' bo la
373a5(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sngon 'ongs pa'i ngos bskal pa grangs med/tshad med dpag tu med/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i pha rol na/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po rin chen go//
373a6(mdo sde): cha zhes bya ba/rgyal phran lnga brgya la dbang byed pa zhig byung ngo //de la btsun mo dang /pho brang slas lnga brgya snyed yod kyang bu med de/gnyi zla'i lha la sogs te/lha thams cad la
373a7(mdo sde): gsol po byas nas/lo mang du lon yang bu med nas/mi dga' bar gyur te/'di sum du bsam so//bdag la bu ni gcig kyang med kyis/de'u re tshe zad pas/rgyal phran lnga brgya
373b1(mdo sde): yang gcig la gcig mnyan te/thams cad 'khrugs nas/yul ma bde bar 'gyur ro snyam sems khongs su chud de/lag pa 'brum pa la brten nus 'dug pa las/de'i tshe n+da
373b2(mdo sde): lha zhig rgyal po'i bsam pa shes nas/rmi lam du rgyal po la 'di skad ces bsgo'o//pho brang gi phyi rol tshal gyi nang na/drang srong gnyis shig yod//gcig gi lus gser gyi
373b3(mdo sde): mdog can du 'dug gis/de'i gan du song la gsol ba thob shig dang /bur skye bar 'gyuro zhes bsgo ma thag tu gnyid log pa las sad nas/drang srong gnyis gang na 'dug pa
373b4(mdo sde): tshol du song ste/drang srong de dang phrad nas/bdag la rgyal po'i rigs 'tshob pa med kyis/khyod bdag gi rigs su skyes//rigs so bas shig ces gsol ba btab nas/drang
373b5(mdo sde): slong des de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras so//drang srog gcig gis kyang bdag kyang khyod kyi rigs skye bar bya'o zhes smras po dang /rgyal po rab tu dga' nas khyod kyang bdag gi rigs
373b6(mdo sde): skye bar shog shig ces smras//de nas rgyal po phyir log nas dus phyi zhig na/drang srong gser gyi mdog can de tshe'i dus byas nas/btsun mo chen mo'i mdol du skyes te/bud med
373b7(mdo sde): mkhas pa ni/bu yod pa ng+ge khri bo shes/bu mo shes so//bdag la nges por bu pho yod do zhes rgyal po la smras nas/rgyal pos kyang btsun mo'i rim gro bskyed de/zla ba dgu tshang nas
374a1(mdo sde): bu khye'u ga ser gyi mdog can sgra mngon thing kar 'dug pa/mtshan dang ldan pa cig bcaso//rgyal po rab tu dga' nas bcas ston byas te/mtshan
374a2(mdo sde): mkhan gyis mtshan bltas nas/bu'i ming yang dge don btags so//de nas yang btsun mo cig kyang sems can dang ldan par gyur to//drang srong gcig shos kyang tshe'i dus
374a3(mdo sde): byas nas btsun mo de'i mngal du skyes so//de nas btsas ston byas te/mtshan mkhan gyis mtshan bltas nas/khye'u'i ming sdig don du btags so//rgyal po bu la byams
374a4(mdo sde): shing sdug pas/bu 'dug pa'i gnas dbyar dgun dang /ston dpyid so sor byas te/bags kyis tsher skyes nas/riH/pa bcwa brgyad la sogs te/gtsug lag thams
374a5(mdo sde): cad la mkhas par gyur te/phyis dge don gyis rgyal po la gsol te/bdag phyi rol tu 'chag cing ldod mo ltar 'gro'o zhes byas pa dang /de'i pha mu kyang bu 'chag tu 'gro
374a6(mdo sde): zhes/lam srung phyag dang byeng du bcug ste/rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgrangs nas me tog gis gtor ti/gdug spos kyis bdug pa la sogs pa yo lang bshams nas/
374a7(mdo sde): dge don glang po che rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa la bskyon te/dril bsgrags/rnga brdungs/rol mo dang sel spyan dkrol te/rgya brgya stong snyed kyis bskor nas gro
374b1(mdo sde): khyer gyi phyi rol du dong ngo //yul mi thams cad lam gyi g.yas g.yon na/khang bu brtsegs pa'i steng nas/mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing /'di'i byin dang gzi brjid ni tshangs pa dang
374b2(mdo sde): 'dra'o zhes bsgra so//de nas song song ba las/mu lto ba dag gcig gos hrul po gyon zhing snod chag pa thogs te/cung zad bslang zhes 'bod pa dge don gyis thos nas/de dag la khyed
374b3(mdo sde): ci'i phyir 'di ltar nyon mongs shing sdug ces driso//de la kha cig ni 'di skad du/bdag cag la pha ma dang /pu nu dang /bu smad dang /gnyen bshes ma mchis pas sdug go zhes zeraro//

374b5(mdo sde): mo byed ces ze ro//dge don gyis de skad ces smras pa thos nas mchi ma bku ste song ngo //de nas yang pha zad cig na shen pa dag cig srog chags gsad nas lpags pa shu ba dang /bsnyal
374b6(mdo sde): gtub pa dag mthong ngo //dge don gyis e ma'i 'di dag ci byed ces dris na/bdag ni pha mes rgyud kyi 'di 'dra ba'i gsod pa'i las byed de/'di ma byas na mi 'tsho'o zhes zer ro//de la
374b7(mdo sde): dge don ngo mtshar du gyur nas lha mi 'dod par song ngo //de nas yang pha zad phyin pa dang /zhing po dag zhing rmos te/zhing rmos pa'i shul na srin bu mang du byung ba la/bya mang po dang /sprul
375a1(mdo sde): dag thu zhing za ba mthong nas/'di dag ci byed ces dris na/bdag cag ni zhing rmos te/sa rmongs pa'i shul du sa bon btab na phyis mang du skyes te/des
375a2(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing rgyal po'i dbyar yang 'bulo zhes zer ro//dge don de la yang ngo mtshar du gyur nas/pha zad song ba dang /rngon pa bya rgya bres pa dang /snyi btsugs nas bya rnams shor
375a3(mdo sde): ba dang /sems can dag bya rgya dang /snyis zin nas/lus rdebs shing 'then kyang ma shor te/snying rje ba'i skad phyung nas shin tu 'jigs skrag pa dag mthong nas/khyed ci byed
375a4(mdo sde): ces dris na/bdag cag kyang rgyud kyis 'di 'dra ba'i gsod pa'i las byed pas 'tsho'o zhes zer ro//dge don gyis de skad ces smras pa thos nas shin tu yi mug ste/yang pha
375a5(mdo sde): zad song ba dang /nya ba dag nya rgyas nya bcus nas/mang du zin te thang bu la phung por spungs nas da dung yang 'gul ba dag mthong nas/'di dag ci byed ces dris na/bdag cag kyang
375a6(mdo sde): rgyud kyis las gzhan mi byed kyi/'di ltar nya shor zhing 'tsho bar byed do zhes ze ro//dge don gyis 'di lta bu dag mthong nas/'di snyam du bsam so//sems can 'di dag ni dbul
375a7(mdo sde): phongs nas/bgo ba dang zo' ba'i phyir/'di lta bu'i kha na ma tho bo'i las gsod pa la sogs pa byed de/'di dag ni tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan song sum du ltung ste/mun pa nas
375b1(mdo sde): mun par 'gro zhing bar pa'i dus med do//snyam du bsams nas phyir khyim du 'ongs te/nyin mtshan du de sems shing mi dga' nas/pha'i drung du song ste/phra la yab bdag gsol pa
375b2(mdo sde): zhig mchis kyis gnong shig ces smraso//phas kyang bu khyod ci zer/khyod smras pa bzhin du bya'o zhes smra so//yab bdag sngon phyi rol tu 'chag tu mchis pa las/mi mang po gos
375b3(mdo sde): dang zas kyi phyir thams cad nyon mongs te/gcig la gcig gsod po dang /brdzun dang /dbang zo ba dang /mi dge ba'i las rnam po sna tshogs bgyid pa mthong nas de dag la sbyin pa birgya
375b4(mdo sde): bar bsams so//yab kyi bang mdzod chen po las brel cing phongs pa dag gi phyir yid bzhin du spyod du gnang shig/phas smras pa/ngas ni rin po che dang /bang mdzod mang du gags pa
375b5(mdo sde): thams cad khyod kyi phyir byas par zad na/ci'i phyir khyod zer ba bzhin mnyan cesu smra so//de nas dge don gyis pas gnang ba'i lung thob nas/yul mi thams cad la dge don ni
375b6(mdo sde): sbyin pa chen po byed kyis thams cad 'dus shing shog shig ces bsgragaso//de'i tshe na dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /dbul zhing phongs pa mgon med pa dang /nad pa la sogs te/
375b7(mdo sde): grong khyer gyi phyi rol na lam thog thag tu gang ngo //de dag kyang dpag tshad brgya dang /nyis brgya dang /sum brgya dang /bzhi brgya dang /lnga brgya dang /dpag tshad stong gi lam nas 'ongs
376a1(mdo sde): kha cig ni dpag tshad nyis stong /sum stong /bzhi stong /lnga stong dang /dpag tshad khri'i bar nas lhags te smin pa can pa 'dus nas thams cad la yid bzhin
376a2(mdo sde): du sbyin pa ni/gos 'dod pa la gos/zas 'dod pa la zas rin po che gser dang /dngul dang /bai DUr+ya dang /mu sa ra gal ba dang /bzhon pa dang /theg pa dang /khyogs dang /bskyed mos
376a3(mdo sde): tshal dang /zhing dang rkang 'gros la sogs te yid bzhin du sbyin par byaso//de ltar sbyin pa la zhugs te yun ring zhig lon pa dang /bang mdzod sum cha gcig zod nas/mdzod srungs kyi
376a4(mdo sde): rgyal po la 'di skad ces sa so//sas kyis bang mdzod las smin pa bgyis nas so/ma cha ni bas su ma gnyis las ma lus na/phan tshun du 'drul ba'i skyes dang /tshong zong ci las bgyi dgos
376a5(mdo sde): shig ces smras so//nga ni sras 'di la byams pas mi zlogs kyis bar mdzod stongs kyang bla'o zhes smraso//de nas yang ring zhig lon pa dang /bang mdzod sum gnyis ni zad/sum cha tsam lus
376a6(mdo sde): pa dang /mdzod srungs kyis yang rgyal po la da ni bang mdzod sum gnyis tsam ni bas/sum cha tsam las ma lus na/phan tshun skyes bskur ba dang /tshong zong ci las bgyi zhes smraso//rgyal
376a7(mdo sde): pos de la bsgo ba/nga'i sras sdug ches te/ngo mi zlogs pas smra mi phod kyis/khyod kyis thabs ci legs su byos la/brel cing mi khom po slar tha snyad thogs shig/mdzod srungs kyis rkyal
376b1(mdo sde): po las lung thob nas mdzod sgo bcad de don gnyer du song ngo //de nas slong glu dang /dge don gyi thad du lhags nas/bar 'ga' ni mdzod srungs mi rnyed de mdzod sgro mi phyed/gal te mdzod srungs
376b2(mdo sde): 'ongs na yang yid bzhin du mi ster bas/dge don gyis snyam du bsamaso//'di ltar gyur pa 'di ni mdzod srungs kyis thugs mi thub kyi/yab kyi man ngag 'ongs kyis yong yang bus ni pha'i
376b3(mdo sde): mdzod stongs par bya ba mi rigs kyi bdag gis da thabs ci zhig byas na rin po che yid bzhin du rnyed de/skye bo mang po phan 'dogs par 'gyur snyam bsams nas/mi dag la 'di skad ces
376b4(mdo sde): driso//'jig rten ni las ci zhig byas na nor dbyig mang du rnyed cing zod mi shes par 'gyur zhes dris pa dang /kha cig ni zhing cher rmos na nor dbyig mang por 'gyur zhes zer ro//kha cig ni
376b5(mdo sde): rkang 'gros spel te spogs byas na nor mang du rnyed do zhes zer ro//kha cig ni lam ring por chong spogs byas na nor mang du rnyed ces zer ro//kha cig ni rgya mtshor zhugs te/nor bu rin po che blangs
376b6(mdo sde): na rin po che mang du 'gyur ro zhes zer ro//dge don gyis de dag gis smras pa thos nas//zhing rmo ba dang /rkang 'gros sgrol ba dang /lam ring por tshong la 'gro ba ni nga'i cha ma yin gyis//
376b7(mdo sde): rgya mtshor 'jug pa 'ba' shig nga'i cha yin no zhes smras nas/rgya mtshor 'jug go snyam du bsams te pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so//bdag ni rgya mtsho nas rin po che mang du blangs te
377a1(mdo sde): dbul phongs pa la sbyin pa yid bzhin du dgye'o//bdag rgya mtshor rin po che len du mchir gnang shig ces smras so//de'i byams de skad ces smras bathos nas
377a2(mdo sde): khams te bu la 'di skad ces smras so//'jig rten na dbul phongs pa dag ni blo med de/lus srog dang bsngos nas 'gro bar byed do//khyod cis phongs na de lta bur sems te/
377a3(mdo sde): khyod sbyin pa byed 'dod na khyim na yod pa'i nor thams cad sbyin par byos shig/rgya mtshor ni 'gror mi rung ste/rgya mtsho'i nang na chu rlabs dang /dba' klong 'khyil pa dang /chu srin
377a4(mdo sde): dang /klu gdug pa dang /srin mo dang /ri chu'i mdog can la sogs po shin tu yod pa'i bgegs mang du yod pas thar par bka' na/khyod cis phongs te/srog dang sde bar byed/
377a5(mdo sde): 'di la ni nyen pa med kyis ma sems par 'dug shig ces bsgo'o//dge don gyis de skad ces bsgo ba thos nas/bsams pa bzhin du ma grub pas/yi dram bcas to//bsam
377a6(mdo sde): pa 'di ma grub kyi bar du pha mdun du sa la kha sbub tu nyal te mi ldang ngo //snyam bsams nas/yab yum gyis mkhyen par mdzod cig/bdag ni bsams pa bzhin ma grub kyi bar du/
377a7(mdo sde): khas sgrub tu nyal ba 'di las mi lding ngo zhes smras so//de nas pha ma mi dga' ste gnyen bshes dang 'gros nas/rgya mtsho'i nang na bgegs yang
377b1(mdo sde): nga mang du yod pa'i gtum yang byas/bdag kyang dmang bas/lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du lha kun la mchod de/khyod lta zhig nga'i lha'i bur skyes mded ma dor bar zan zo shig ce zhag cig zha gnyis
377b2(mdo sde): nAn zhag drug gi bar du tshig rnam po sna tshogs kyis gros btab kyang mi nyan te/sngar ji skad skyes pa las ma zlog so//pha ma sngags nas yang 'di skad ces bgros so//bdag gi bu
377b3(mdo sde): 'di thog ma nas da tsam gyi bar du byi ba bsams pa mthar ma grub kyi bar du mi gtong bas/rgya mtshor gtang na gal te na bIr ldog kyang srid kyi/ma btang na zhag bdun lon nas
377b4(mdo sde): 'phral du bye ba 'bye ste/da ni btang dgos so snyam bgros nas/bu'i drung du song ste lag pa nas bzung nas/bu longs la zan zo shig/yid bzhin du 'gro bar gnang ngo zhes smras
377b5(mdo sde): pa dang /dge don yang langs te bza' ba zos//btung ba 'thungaso//de nas phyi rol tu byung ste mi mang po la/kho bo brgya mtshor rin po che len du 'gro'o//khyed su 'gro dga' rnams
377b6(mdo sde): kyang 'grogs te 'dong gis/ded dpon yang kho bos byas la/yo byad kyang kho bos sbyar ro zhes bsgrags so//de'i tshe na yul de na tshong pa lnga brgya snyed kyis bdag cag kyang rgya
377b7(mdo sde): mtshor rin po che len mchi'o zhes thams cad 'dus nas cha so//de'i tshe yul de na tshong pa ded dpon rgan po zhig/sngan chad kyang rgya mtshor lan du ma phyin pa zhig yod de/rgyal
378a1(mdo sde): bu nyid de glan du song nas 'di skad ces smras so//kha bo rgya mtshor 'gro pa'i sa mkhan du 'gro dgos kyis khyod kyang tshos shig ces bsgo ba dang /ded
378a2(mdo sde): dpon gyis bdag ni rgas zhom pa'i steng du/da mig gnyis kyis kyang mi mthong bas/'gro mi nuso zhes smras so//de nas rgyal bu pal thad du song ste/rgyal po la 'di skad
378a3(mdo sde): ces gsol to//ded dpon nan po zhig mchis pa sngon chad kyang rgya mtshor lan du ma zhig byin te/rgya mtsho'i rgyus mchis kyis//bdag rgya mtshor mchis pa'i sa mkhan du bka'
378a4(mdo sde): stsol cig ces gsol pa dang /rgyal po nyid ded dpon long ba'i gan du song nas/dang dpon long ba la 'di skad ces bsgo'o//rgyal bu rgya mtshor 'gro 'dod de/nged kyis 'gror mi
378a5(mdo sde): rung ba'i gros re lta zhig btab na mnyan gyis/rgyal bu rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i sa mkhan du khyod song shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /ded dben gyis 'di skad ces gsol to///
378a6(mdo sde): bdag rgas zhom steng du mig gnyis kyang longs mod kyi/nga rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/bka' mi gcog go zhes gsol to//de nas rgya lnga pho brang du 'ongs nas nga'i bu dang rgya
378a7(mdo sde): mtshor 'gro su phod ces bsgo ba dang /rgyal bu sdig don yang bdag phu bo'i g.yog tu mchi'o zhes gsol to//rgyal pos bsams pas/gzhan song ba bas nu bo song na phan
378b1(mdo sde): yang skyid snyam nas/nu bo yang 'gror gnang ngo //de nas rgyal bus glaser srang sum stong zhig phyung ste/srang stong ni klu'i zong du byas/srang nyis stong ni 'phral du dgos pa'i yo byad du
378b2(mdo sde): sbyar te/ches nas rgyal po dang btsun mo la sogs pa thams cad kyis bsgral to//de nas rgya rmo rgya'i ngog su phyin nas glur zhugs te/zag pa bdun gyis brjod nas/rlung phyogs dang
378b3(mdo sde): sbyor te/'gro ba'i tshong pa rnams 'di skad ces smra so//rgya mtsho'i nang gi bge gos rnam pa sna tshogs yod de snga phyir 'dong ba ni rab tu yang mang na/phyir 'khor ba ni nyung rab bo//de las the tso
378b4(mdo sde): zo ba yod na phyir dengs shig/gal te lus dang srog lo mi lha/pha ma dang /bu dang /chung ma dang /gnyen bshos dag la yang ma chags te/rin po che'i gling du phyi ni nas phyir gang bde bar

379a1(mdo sde): rnams der bor ro//de nas song song ba las/ded dpon gyis da ni ri dkar po zhig yod pa'i rigs 'dra mthong ngam zhes dris so//rgyal dus kyang de 'dra ba zhig
379a2(mdo sde): snang nga zhes smras pa dang /de ni dngul gyi ri yin no zhes zer ro//de nas yang song song ba las/da ni re sngon po zhig snang ba'i rigs nA/mthong ngam zhes dris na/de 'dra ba zhig

379b1(mdo sde): tu ma shor bar dam du zung shog/bu mo gzhan drug gi nong bu rin po che yang mang shig/dbyung po rab tu snyoms lnga/de dag dang pa swA sh+ma / dag na nyam thag ste 'ding cho 'phos na//rkyen dran
379b2(mdo sde): par gyis la/'di nyid du ru bu smos te/song shig ces bsgo ma thag tu tshe'i dus byas so//de nas de de dpon gyi rus bu gser gyi bye mi ri nang du sbas nas/bsgo ba bzhin du mang nas
379b3(mdo sde): ring po ma lon par rin po che sna bdun gyi mkhar zhig gi drung du phyin to//sgo yang dom du bcad pa las/drung na rdo rje'i gtun 'dug pa blangs te/sgo brdungs pa dang /sgo yang rang bye

379b6(mdo sde): blangs nas/rin po che mongs pas/gru yong bar 'gra' ni nub par 'go' ni byung nas/rgyal bu dge don 'ba' shig ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu yod pas/chur ma nub po/rgyal bu sdig

380a1(mdo sde): smras so//bdag cag spyan gnyis pa ma dang bral ste/rgyu mchod rin po chu len du deng ba las mya ste rat+te/rin po che dang bral nas lag pa stod par khyim du

380a6(mdo sde): phu bo la 'di skad ces smras so//bdag cag spun gnyis rin po che thogs te/gnyis ka cig/tsar nyal ba mi rigs kyi/ras kyis nyal la mel ci bya'o zhes smras pa dang /phu bos
380a7(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras te/spun gnyis ris kyis me la tse byed do//de nas nub gcig pu po sngar mel tse byed pa las/mel tse thun kor nas kyang /rung zhig langs su
380b1(mdo sde): mabalta bo//phu bi yang yun rings su mU la tsi byas nas/nu bo gdod ldadus te/pU bo san+ta rI smra 'dug byas/gnyid bro nas log pa'i rnyog rgyu rgyal gyi nang nas/rnam ring po gan+d+ha pa shAn/

381a1(mdo sde): bya ba gcig sbyin cig ces byas pa dang /rde'us rol ma'i cha byad gis zhig sbyin no//de nas rgyal po m+bu s+ho rnyed cig/grA dang tshig snyan pa sbya te blangs pad+ma

381a3(mdo sde): deng 'ongs nas/rol mo snyan pa thos pa dang /de la dga' skye khyod nga'i bskyed mos tshal du rol mo byed cing bskyed mos tshal yang bsrung na mi nus som zhes dris na/bdag

381b1(mdo sde): char du gyur te mya ngan gyis brnang so//rgyal po yab dang /btsun mo yang mya ngan gyis yid gdungs nas/sdig don khyod kyang phu bo dang lhan cig log na ci nyes shes bsgo'o//rgyal bu

382a6(mdo sde): yob rgyal po bdog gi bsam pa 'di las mi bsgyur du gsol zhes sprid pa dang /rgyal pos de skad ces gsol ba thos nas/bu mo'i ngo ma zlogs te/'di ni ngo mtshar ya
382a7(mdo sde): mtshan du che'o//bu mo 'di rgyal po rin chen po che'i gna' mar blangs te/rgyal bu rgya mtsho nas ma 'khor bar sprang por 'di lta bu zhig gi chung mar bsten pa/'di ni sa rigs
382b1(mdo sde): sun skye nga'i mgo yang bteg tu med par byed pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che zhes yang 'bod du btang ba las/du tshig snga ma las mya gyur te/'od du ma btub po//de nas rgyal po bu mo la byam
382b2(mdo sde): pas ngo ma zlogs nas/gnyis kra ba su ste/pho brang gi nang du khrid shin tu bsdus so//de nas zhag du ma zhig lon pa dang /bu mo nyan par ni rtag tu song /nub mo phyir 'ong bas/rgyal bu

382b4(mdo sde): pa las na/khyod gzhan du sems pa yod du driso zhes smras pa dang /bu mos dam bcas pa/bdag ni khyod 'ba' shig sems te/bsam pa gzhan pa spu tsa mo yang med de//bdag gis
382b5(mdo sde): smras pa'i tshig bden ni/bden par smras pa 'dis/khyod kyi mig ya cig mthong bar gyur cig ces smras ma thag tu/mIg+sa ya gcig mthong bar gyur to//de nas gtam de dag glengs nas/
382b6(mdo sde): rgyal bu la khyod kyis phra ma yul gang ni 'dug ces dris pa dang /rgyal bus chung ma la smras pa/khyod kyis rgyal po rin chen go cha zhes bya ba zhig zos sam/chung mas smras pa/bdag
382b7(mdo sde): gos thos so//'o na de ni bdag gis yin no//rgyal bu dge don zhes bya ba thos sam/chung mas spros pa thoso//'o ni rgyal bu dge don de ni bdag yin no zhes smras pa dang /chung ma
383a1(mdo sde): rdzangs nas/'o nA khyod ci'i phyir 'di ltar nyon mongs par gyur ces dris pa las/rgyal dus ji ltar gyur pa nob tu gtam byas pa dang /bu myos rgyal ba
383a2(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smraso//rgyu la bu rtsig don gyis khyod kyi smig byung ba 'di ni 'jig rten+d+ra gang na yang mi srid na/khyod de dang drung ni ji ltar bya snya ma rgyal bus smras pa/sdig don gyis pa
383a3(mdo sde): mige byung ba nyes med kyi/bdog ni de la cung zad kyang mi dga' ba 'am/khon du 'dzin pa med do//rlung rmas smras pa/'di ni shin tu yong 'di ches par dka' ste/gnod pa 'di lta
383a4(mdo sde): byas kyang mi dgar ba med ces smras pa ni tshig tu mi rung ngo //rgyal bus smras pa/bdag ni rgyal bu sdig dran la mi dga' ba sdu nyag ma tsam yang med do//bdag gi cho ga 'di 'din
383a5(mdo sde): no/bden pa'i tshig gas bdag gi mig 'di ya cig kyang mthong bar gyur cig ces smras pa dang /mig ya cig kyang gsal bar mthong bar gyur to//de ltar rgyal bu'i mig gnyis
383a6(mdo sde): kyang mthong nas/mtshan dang byin yang gzhan pas lhag par che bas/bu mo dga' nas yab rgyal po gang na 'dug par song ste/'di skad ces smras so//yab kyis rgyal po
383a7(mdo sde): rin chen go cha'i sras rgyal bu dge don mkhyen tam/rgyal pos smras pa/ngas shes so//'o na rgyal po gzigs bzhed dam/rgyal bu de daltar ga ro zhes dris pa dang /bu mos smras
383b1(mdo sde): daltar bdag gi khyim thab bgyid pa nyid lagaso zhes gsol to//rgyal pos bu mo 'di smos sam/'on te mi dran nam ci nyes na/rgyal bu de ni rgya mtsho nas phyir ma 'khor na/sprang po la rnal bu dag
383b2(mdo sde): don yin zhes smra/bu mos yang gsol pa/thugs mi ches na brtog tu gsol zhes smras pa dang /rgyal pos ltar phyin nA/rgyal bu dngos yin te/lto byas la phab nas/bdag gis ngo ma shes/
383b3(mdo sde): panongs kyis/'gyod do zhes smras so//de nas rgyal po des gsang ste/rgyal bu dge don lam srang zhig tu bsgral naso//dge don rgya mtsho nas gdod 'khor ba skad bsgrags te/blon po rnams
383b4(mdo sde): dang /rgyal bu dge don bsu nas pho brang du 'ongs pa dang /gdod bu mo yang chung mar byin pa skad du bsgrags so//de'i tshe na byangang pa yang yi ge dang phyir yul du phyin te/yi ge bklogs nas rgyal
383b5(mdo sde): bu dag don yang 'dug par shes pas/sdig don yang btson du bzung /rgyal po li shi bar gyi steng du yang pho nya btang nas nga'i bu dge don khyod kyi yul du 'ongs te/nyon mongs shing 'dug
383b6(mdo sde): ces thos kyis/sngar ma sbran pa yang nyes so//de yang glang po che dang /rta'i tshogs mang pos skyel cig/ma bsgral na nga nyid kyang 'ong ngo zhes spring ngo //dri'i tshe rgyal bu dge don gyis phyugs
383b7(mdo sde): rdzi'i drin dran pa'i phyir/rgyal po li shi bar la gsol nas/glang po che dang /rta dang /gos dang /khang khyim dang /zhing 'brog dang /gser dngul dang /rin po che dang /bran mo dang /l-i si
384a1(mdo sde): /byed pa'i mi la sogs te bya dga' mang du byin nas/rtse gcig tu bde zhing skyid par byaso//de nas rgyal po rin chen go cha'i pho nya yang der phyin nas/rgyal po li shi
384a2(mdo sde): bar gyis glang po che lnga brgya tsam rin po ches brgyan te/g.yog lnga brgya dang /bu mo'i g.yog gzhon nu lnga brgya dang /shing rta lnga brgya spyad kyang brtsangs/rgyal po nyid kyang blon po dang bcas
384a3(mdo sde): te/'khor brgya stong du mas rol mo sna tshogs byas te bu mo bskyal to//pho nya slar phyin nas rgyal po rin chen go cha yang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te/rgyal bu bsung lo//
384a4(mdo sde): /rgyal bu dang phrad pa'i tshe/gzhon pa las babs nas pho ma la phyag 'tshal te/lag pa nas 'jus te bsnyun gsol nas/rol mo byas te pho brang du song ngo //de nas rgyal bu dge
384a5(mdo sde): don gyis/sdig don ga re zhes smras pa dang /da ltar btson du bzung ngo zhes smras so//de nas rgyal bu sdig dron thong shig ces gsol pa dang /nyes pa chen po byas kyis btang du mi rung
384a6(mdo sde): ngo zhes bsgo'o//de ltar rgyal bu sdig don ma btang na/bdag kyang pho brang du mi mchi'o zhes gsol nas/sdig don yang btang ngo //de nus sdig don yang phu bo la phyag 'tshal zhing bsur
384a7(mdo sde): 'das nas/spun gnyis gcig la gcig 'jus te/nu bo la sngar bas kyang lhag par byams par gyur pas/thams cad ngo mtshar tu 'dzin to//de nas pho brang gi nang du 'ongs nas/rin po
384b1(mdo sde): tshicho ga re nyes/bags kyis ngal gyis dris pa dang /'ongs pa'i lam dus brkos nas smra so zhes zer ro//de nas len du btang nus rnyed pa las/dag dron dang 'grogs te gnas su phyin mu zag
384b2(mdo sde): tudag don gyis mthong nas rnyedado//de ni rin po che rnams rnyed de pho brang du 'das nas/rgyal phran lnga brgya kun la yang re re byin te/gcig pu zhig phyir bzhag la lag tu thogs te/'di skad//
384b3(mdo sde): ces smon lam btab po//rin po che 'dra yid bzhin gyi nor bu yin yang drag na/bdag gi pha ma 'dug pa'i khri rin po che sna bdun gyi khrir gyur cig/rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs kyi
384b4(mdo sde): yod par gyur cig cis smras ma thags de bzhin du gyur to//de nas yang 'di skad du/rgyal po'i bde mdzod dang /blon po'i ping mdzod las bdag gis sngon sbyin pa bgyis te/god pa
384b5(mdo sde): rnams thams cad phyir gang bar log shig ces sbas nas/de phyogs su bstan pa tsam gyis bang mdzod thams cad rin po ches yongs su gang byar gyur to//de nas dril bsgrags
384b6(mdo sde): te/da byin chad zhag bdun na rgyal po dge don rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bebs kyis thams cad 'dus shig ces pad+mo nas/rgyal bu dge don sgos chus lus bkres te/gos/
384b7(mdo sde): gsaro pas gtsang ma khyim pas/rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo li yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che btags te/lag na pog phor thogs shing phyogs bzhir phyag byas nas 'di skad ces
385a1(mdo sde): smras//nar bu 'di yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yin yang dag na/thams cad ci 'dod pa thams cad char bzhin du phob shig ces smras ma thag tu
385a2(mdo sde): phyogs bzhi nas sprin langs nas/rlung gis mi gtsang ba phyag dar byas te/thog mar char zim bu babs nas rdul mi snang bar byas//de nas kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam
385a3(mdo sde): po sna tshogs bab bo//de nas gos rnams bab po//de nas rin po che sna bdun bab nas yul thams cad du gang ngo de'i tshe ni thams cad kyis rin po che dang gseg ma 'dra ba'i
385a4(mdo sde): sems su gyur nas/de la rgyal bus 'di zhes bsgo'o//khyed kyi dkris pa thams cad yid bzhin gyis theb pas/da ni bral ba 'am/phongs pa med par gyur gyis/so so nas
385a5(mdo sde): lus dang ngag yid bsdams te/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la brtson par gyis shig ces bsgo nas/thams cad kyis bsgo ba bzhin du//dge ba bcu la nan tan byas te//
385a6(mdo sde): sdig pa ma byas pas/tshe 'phos nas mtho ris kyi lhar skyeso//kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus nu/rgyal po rin chen go cha ni/da ltar nga'i yab zas gtsang ma yin no//rgyal po'i
385a7(mdo sde): btsun mo ni da ltar nga'i yum lha mdzes yin no//rgyal po li shi ba ra de ni da ltar 'od srung yin no//de'i tshe na rgyal bu'i chung mar gyur pa de ni da ltar skye dgu'i bdag mo yin no//
385b1(mdo sde): rgyal bu srog ngan du no dA stA ra na sbyin no//'dzam bu'i gling gi mi la ba'i sprin gyis khyab pa ni/dbyug mar spangs rgyas pa na/lha'i smras po brgyad khri 'das pa dang /nga'i nye gnas la/
385b2(mdo sde): bstan pa rnams yin no//kun dga' bo de'i cha na/da ltar nga la gnod pa chen po byas kyang /de la snying brje ba'i sems skyes na/nga mngon par sangs rgyas nas nyon mongs pa'i sgribs na
385b3(mdo sde): zad thugs rje chen pos rgyas par khyab pas na//gnod pa cung zad cig byas pa las/thugs rje ba lta ci smos//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs nas/'khor mang po la
385b4(mdo sde): la ni rkyen tu zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir ldog pa dang /phyir mi ldog po dang /dgra bcom pa thob bo//kha cig ni rang sangs rgyas su gyur//kha cig ni bla ni med pa'i byang chub tu sems
385b5(mdo sde): bskyed//de skad ces gsungs pa la thams cad yid rangs nas mngon par dag 'o//rgyal bu dge don gyis le'u ste sum cu gsum pa'o//khyim bdag sdums byung kyi
385b6(mdo sde): le'u'o//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyu la bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgron med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/dge slong ge
385b7(mdo sde): dge 'dun chen po brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so//de'i tshe yul de na spong po lnga ba rgya zhig rtag tu sangs rgyas dang /dge 'dun la rten te 'tsha
386a1(mdo sde): phyis spyang po de dag 'di snyam du sems so//dra bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo snyam nas/sangs rgyas gang na ba der lhags
386a2(mdo sde): te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bdag cag ni sangs rgyas dang /dge 'dun gyi thugs rjes 'tsho bar gyur te/de bdag cag rab tu 'byung ngo zhes gsol ba
386a3(mdo sde): dang /de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces dka' stsal to//ngas bstan po'i chos ni rnam par dag pa ste/btsan nyen dang /phyug dngul med do//dper na/chu dang bas ni bcan
386a4(mdo sde): nyen dang /phyug dbul dang /bzang ngan kun 'khru ste/chus bkrus na mi 'dag pa med do/dper na me dang 'dra ste/ri dang brag dang /gnam sa'i bar na dngos po dang /chung ngu gA
386a5(mdo sde): yang mi 'tshig pa med do//gzhan yang de'i chos ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ste/skyes pa dang /bud med dang /khye'u dang /bu mo dang /phyug po dang /dbul po dang /gang su yang rung mi chud
386a6(mdo sde): bapa med de/yid bzhin du spyod du gnang ngo zhes sprang po rnams kyis thos nas rab tu dga' mgu rangs te/lhag par sangs rgyas la rab tu 'byung ngo zhes gsol pa dang /bcom
386a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bde bar 'ongs so zhes bka' stsal pa tsam gyis/skra dang kha spu rang byi ste/ngur smrig gyon pa'i dge slong du gyur nas/bsnyen par rdzogs so//bcom ldan 'das
386b1(mdo sde): kyis chos bstan pas lus dang sems rnams par grol te/zag pa zad nas dgra bcom par gyur to//de'i tshen yul don gnas pa'i khyim bdag dang /chang dpon rigs che zhing mtho ba/
386b2(mdo sde): rnams/mul to ba dag sangs rgyas kyis rab tu phyung ngo zhes thos nas/brnyas shang dpyad par gyur te/'di skad du/gal te bdag cig bcom ldan 'das dang /'phags pa'i ge
386b3(mdo sde): 'dun spyan 'dron cing bsod nams byed na/rigs ngan mul lto ba las rab tu byung ba de dag ji lta bu bdag cag gi stan la bzhag cing /snod pa 'bag par bya zhes smras so//
386b4(mdo sde): de'i tshe rgyal bu rgyal byed kyis/sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun rnams bshos la spyan drangs nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun
386b5(mdo sde): rnams spyan 'dren gyi/mul te pa gsar du zhugs pa rnams nas lag so//phyed nyin gdugs tshod kyi thad kar/sangs rgyas dang /dge 'dun spyan drangs par gshegs nas/
386b6(mdo sde): mul to po'i dge slong ma bos pa rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//khyed ni yon bdag gos ma bos kyis/byang gi sgra mo snyan du dang la/oM bon ma btab ma rmos par rang skyes
386b7(mdo sde): ba'i 'bras long la/yon bdag gi khyim du zar shog shig ces bka' stsal te//dge slong de dag bka' stsal pa bzhin du/dgra bcom pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis byang gi sgra mi snyan du/
387a1(mdo sde): so so nas 'bras kyis lhung bzed bkang ste/spyod lam mdzes par steng gi nam mkha' las ngang pa'i rgyal ba ltar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi khyim du lhags nas
387a2(mdo sde): rims bzhin du 'khod de 'bras la za'o//de'i tshan rgyal bu rgyal byed kyis dge slong de dag spyod lam mdzes par rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis nu mkha'o las 'ongs por mthong nas
387a3(mdo sde): lhag par dga' ra swa te ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di lta bu'i 'phags pa gzi brjid dang yon tan du ldan pa spyod lam mdzes par lhags par
387a4(mdo sde): phyogs gang nas mchis shes gsol po dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'di dag shes par 'dod na legs par nyon cig
387a5(mdo sde): dong /khyod la bstan par bya'o//dge slong 'di dag ni rgyal bus ma bos pa'i dge slong dag yin te/rgyal bus ma bos pas so so nas byang gi sgra mi snyan nas 'bras blangs nas
387a6(mdo sde): za ba yin no//de nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyis de skad ces gsungs pa thos nas/shin tu ngo tsha zhing 'gyod do//bdag ni gti mug gis ldongs pas/'phags pa'i ngo ma
387a7(mdo sde): 'tshal to zhes smras nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/snying po 'di dag ni yul 'dri na shin
387b1(mdo sde): tu yang rigs chung zhing dran pa lags na/lcir 'jog rten li'i byeng ba yang thob la/yun ring po'i don yang rnyed par gyur te/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du gshegs pa ni don
387b2(mdo sde): 'di dag 'ba' shig gi slad du gsheg so//gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das sprang po 'di sngon dag pa'i rtsa ba ci bsrungs shing /bsod nams kyi las gang la nan tan bgyis pas//
387b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dang phrad de/rnam par grol bar gyur/sdig pa ci bgyis na thog ma bcas nas sprang por skyes te/dbul phyongs par gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal du
387b4(mdo sde): rgyal byed la bka' stsal pa/sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med/grangs med pa/bsam gyis mi khyab po 'das pa'i pha rol na/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir grong khyer ba ra na sa
387b5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba na/ri drang srong ljags shes bya ba la/sngon yang sangs rgyas mang po bzhugs bzhugs te/sangs rgyas 'jig rten du ma gshegs pa na yang /rang sangs
387b6(mdo sde): rgyas dog dan gnas te/re de la rang spongs rgyas me na yang lha mngon par shes pa'i drang srong dag gnas so//de'i tshe na ri de la drang srong nyis stong zhig gnas ste/phyi zhig
387b7(mdo sde): ni ltas mkhan dag gis/lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du char mi 'bab bo zhes lung bstan pa dang /de'i tshe na yul de na/khyim bdag phyug po longs spyod dang ldan pa/sdums byed ces
388a1(mdo sde): bya ba'i drung du song ste/khyim bdag de la/bdag cag rab tu byung ba stong po 'di dag gi lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zas dang /skom yod dngam /des smras pa/'ad
388a2(mdo sde): cag la mchis kyis/'phags pa'i rnams gud du mi gshegs par bzhugs su gsol lo//de nas yang drang srong stong yang der lhags nas/khyim bdag sngun sa byed la/bdag/
388a3(mdo sde): cag kyang lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zas dang skom dag so zhes smras pa dang /khyim bdag gis bang mdzod srung ba la/'phags pa 'di rnams kyi 'tsho ba/lo bcu gnyis bar du 'byor
388a4(mdo sde): tama? zhes dris na/mdzod srung gis 'byor te zhes gsol nas/khyim bdag nges drang srong nyis stong gi 'tsho ba sbyor ba'i las mi lnga brgya bskos nas/bsod snyoms sbyor du bcu//
388a5(mdo sde): de'i tshe na las mi dag bsod snyoms kyi g.yos byed pa la yun rings pas skye ste/'di skad ces smras//bdag cag 'di ltar rtag tu nyon mongs par gyur pa ni/spong po 'di dag
388a6(mdo sde): gi phyir ro zhes smras//de'i tshe na khyim bdag desau/gdugs ched la rtag tu spyan 'dren pa'i las mi gcig cag bsgoso//spyan 'dren de la khyi zhig yod do//khyi de yang rtag tu
388a7(mdo sde): sman 'dren gyi phyi bzhin du 'gro ba las/nyin cig spyan 'dren pa brjed pa dang /khyi de gdugs chod kyi dus su drang srong de dag gi drung du song nas/skad chen po phyung ste zug pa dang
388b1(mdo sde): drang srong de dag kyang kyi gzugs pa thos nas/gdugs chod la bab par sh+lo sa skyo bsod snyoms la gsheg so//phyi zhig na drang srong de dag bsod snyoms kyi bya ba byas nas/khyim bdag
388b2(mdo sde): le 'di skad ces smras so//khyim bdag da ni char pa 'ang gis/zhing pa dag zhing gi las byed du chug shig ces bsgo ba dang /khyim bdag gis kyang zhing pa rnams zhing las byed du bcug ste
388b3(mdo sde): nas dang /gro dang /'bru mang zhig rmos so//de nas phyi zhig na 'bru rmos parI rnams/thams cad sku bar skyes nas khyim bdag ya mtshan du gyur te/drang srong rnams la 'di dag don
388b4(mdo sde): med par mi 'gyur ram zhes smras pa dang /drang srong gis smras pa/don med par mi 'gyur gyis/dus su tshu bcu pa la sogs te las byos shog ces smos so//phyis ring po ma lon par/
388b5(mdo sde): sku ba kun cher skyes nas bkas te bltas nas/ci dang ci rmas pa bzhin du de dang de dag slu ba'i nang kun gang bar skyes te/khyim bdag rab tu dga' mi gu nas/bang ba kun kyang gang bar
388b6(mdo sde): gyur to//las byed pa'i mi lnga brgya po yang de lta bu dag mthong nas/'gyod pa'i sems skyes te/bdag cag gis ni tshig ngan pas/'phags pa la slado zhes 'gyod tshangs byas te/
388b7(mdo sde): po so nas bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/'phags pa dang phrad cing rnam par grol bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo//sprang po lnga brgya po 'di tshig ngan pa smras pos
389a1(mdo sde): skye ba la brgya'i bar du rtag tu snang por gyur to//'byud tshangs byas te skyon lam btab pas/da dang phrad de 'khor ba'i mthar phyin to//rgyal bu 'di ltar rig
389a2(mdo sde): par bya'o//de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag phyug po sdums byed de ni dA yin//bang mdzod srung ba de ni rgyal bu rgyal byed yin no//nyin cig bzhin du spyan 'dren pa de ni rgyal po
389a3(mdo sde): u tra yan yin no//de'i tshe khyod de ni khyim bdag skad stan yin te/de'i dbang gis skye ba thams cad du skad snyan par gyur to//de'i tshe na las byed pa'i me lnga brgya po ni/dgra btsa
389a4(mdo sde): ba lnga brgya po 'di dag yin no//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs nas/'khor mang po rnams kha cig gis 'bras bu dang po thob pa nas/'bras bu bzhi pa'i bar
389a5(mdo sde): du thob par gyur to//kha cig ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang nas mngon par dga'a'o//khyim bdag
389a6(mdo sde): sdums byed kyi le'u ste/sum cu bzhi pa'o////bam po btso pa/rgyal po mig 'byed kyi le'o//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan
389a7(mdo sde): yod na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te//skye bo mang po la dam pa'i chos ston to//de'i tshe na grong khyer gyi mi kun chos nyan du
389b1(mdo sde): chas pa dang /grong de na bram ze long ba gcig cig/lam ka na 'dug pa las mi mang po song ba las/khyed myur bar gar lodong zhes dris so//mi rnams kyis smras pa/khyod ci ma thos
389b2(mdo sde): sam/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du byung ste/da ltar yul 'di na bzhugs shing chos ston to//de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du byung ba dang phrad par shin tu dka' bas/
389b3(mdo sde): bdag cag ni sangs rgyas la chos nyan tu 'gro'o zhes smras so//bram ze de skad rnam pa brgyad la shin tu mkhas pa zhig ste/skad phyung ba tsam gyis dbang thang dang /tshe ji tsam brtag
389b4(mdo sde): so//brgyad gang zhe na/bya bang lta bu'i skad dang /khra lta bu'i skad dang /skad 'dzer 'dzer po dang /glang po che'i sgrad dang rnga'i skad dang 'brug gi skad dang /dril skad dang /tshungs pa'i skad dang brgyadado//
389b5(mdo sde): bya bang lta bu'i skad du spro ba ni/khrel ltas med de/byas pa drin du mi gzo'o//khwa lta bu'i skad du smra ba ni/khro zhing gtum la/gsod pa la dga' zhing snying rje med do//skyang mdzor
389b6(mdo sde): 'dzing po ni pho dag mo skad du sla ba dang mo dag pho skad du smra ba ste/de ni dbang thang med cing dbul ba dang /ma rabs so//glang po che'i skad du smra ba ni//rang bzhin gyis brang zhing /gnyen
389b7(mdo sde): gshes la phan 'dogs par sems so//rnga skad du smra ba ni/smra mkhas blo myur la/rig pa 'dzin te/rgyal po'i ston pa'o//'brug skad du smra ba ni/mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan
390a1(mdo sde): zhing chos mkhas so//dril skad du smra ba ni phyug cing longs spyod dang ldan la/gser srang brgya stong mang po bdog pa'o//tshangs pa'i skad du smra ba ni/bsod nams dang /
390a2(mdo sde): dbang thang chen po dang ldan te/khyim na 'dug na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/rab tu byung na nI gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya'o//de'i tshe na bram ze des mi de rnams la/
390a3(mdo sde): bdag ni skud la shin tu mkhas ste/yang dag par sangs rgyas yin na/tshangs pa'i skad dang ldan pa'i rigs kyis/kho bo yang khrid la 'grogs s+ho 'dong ngo //de dag gis kyang
390a4(mdo sde): bram ze long bA de khrid nas/song song ba las/phyogs der nye bar 'ongs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi gsungs tshangs pa'i dbyangs thos nas/long ba dga' mgur rangs ste/dad pa/
390a5(mdo sde): skyes pas/mig gnyis rang bye nas/sangs rgyas kyi sku gser gyi mdog can mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/nyi ma'i 'odi ltar shin tu gsal ba mthong nas/bcom
390a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/tshad med pa'i dga' ba skyes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan te/spro ba bskyed pas sdig pa mi dge ba'i las
390a7(mdo sde): phrag nyi shu zad de/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas/shes rab kyi mig dang ldan par gyur pas/bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das
390b1(mdo sde): kyis legs par 'ongs so zhes bka' stsal nas/dge slong du gyur to/ci rigs pa'i chos bstan pas/dgra bcom par gyur to//'khor mang po the tsom du gyur nas/tshe dang ldan pa
390b2(mdo sde): kun dga' bo 'dug pa las langs te/thal mo sbyar nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad pa/mdongs pa thams cad
390b3(mdo sde): la thugs rje ba'i nang na/bram ze dmus long 'di la lhag par thugs rjes che'o//bram ze mdongs pa gcig sha'i mig kyang thob la/shes rab kyi mig kyang thob mar gyur to//bcom ldan
390b4(mdo sde): 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/bram ze long ba 'di la/dus 'di 'ba' shig tu mig byin par ma zad de/'das pa'i dus na yang mig byin no//kun dga' bos gsol pa//
390b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'i dus na/ji lta bur mig stsal pa legs par bstan du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med tshad med
390b6(mdo sde): dpag tu med/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i pha rol na/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir/yul pu ka la da zhes bya ba nu/rgyal po mig 'byed ces bya ba zhig yod do//rgyal po de brag dang /rtsig pa
390b7(mdo sde): yang thogs pa med par/dpag tshad bzhi bcu tshun chad mthong bas/mig 'byed ces bya bar brtags ste/'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong kun la dbang byed do//rgyal
391a1(mdo sde): po de la btsun mo dang /pho brang slas nyi khri yod de/rgyal bu ni lnga brgya snyed yod do//rgyal tshab ni tshul khrims bzang po zhes bya ste/rgyal po nga tshul bzhin/
391a2(mdo sde): rgyal po byed pas/thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra b.rade sems spyi/rlung dang chur dus lus mi yol bas lo legs ste/thams cad bod spyad do//de nas rgyal po de
391a3(mdo sde): dben pa zhig na 'di snyam du sems par gyur to//bdag tshe snga ma'i bsod nams kyis/mo'i rgyal por gyur te/nor rin po che dang /longs spyod chen po dang ldan zhing thams
391a4(mdo sde): cad kyis ngag mnyan pa ni/ji ltar rtswa 'jam po la rlung gis btab na/phyogs gcig tu nyal po bzhin no//tshe 'di la yang phyi ma'i 'bras bu mo skyed na/sdug bsngal bar
391a5(mdo sde): 'gyur te/dper na zhing pa drag dpyad mang du rmos na/ston yang mang du bsngor yod pas/bdag kyang tshe 'di'i dpyid sa bon ma btab na/tshe phye ma'i ston bsdur med pas/da ni
391a6(mdo sde): le lo bya bar mi rigs kyi/bsod nams kyi zhing la/sa bon rgyas par gdab bo snyam bsams nas/blon po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//nga'i dkor bang mdzod thams
391a7(mdo sde): cad byung la/grong khyer gyi sgo dang lam srang mi mang po 'du ba'i gnas su thams cad spangs la/'gro ba mang po la sbyin par bya'o//rgyal phran brgyad khri ba ni stong gi bang mdzod
391b1(mdo sde): kyang thams cad la yad bzhin du sbyin cig ces d+d+ha smr-in sa/gser gyi rgyal mtshan bskyed/dril man+d+ra po bsgrags /'dzam bu'i gling gi dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /dngul po s+yA pU /
391b2(mdo sde): nas pa dang /na ba rnams thams cad 'dus shig/ci dang ci 'dod po de dag thams cad yid bzhin du sbyin no zhes bsgrags so//de'i tshe na 'brangs thams cad kyang /rgyal po chos
391b3(mdo sde): bzhin byed pas/de la dga' ste stod cing snyan par sgrogs so//mtha' 'khob kyi rgyal phran pa la dra bar zhes bya ba zhig/rgyal po dri'i bka' mi nyan par gyur te/chos ma yin pas
391b4(mdo sde): rgyal po byeng ngo //rgyal phran de la blon po mkhas pa/blon dang ldan pa lo nga dAng zhes bya ba zhig yod de/blon po des rgyal po las 'di skad ces gsol to//rgyal po nI yid thung la
391b5(mdo sde): gI tu m+bu ste/snga bsam phyi mno med pas phyis 'gyod par 'gyur ro//rgyal po zhi pa khyed ni shin tu snying rje che ba dang ldan pas//'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad la
391b6(mdo sde): drini phyis khyab ste/rgyal po thams cad de'i bka' nyan na/rgyal po 'ba'u shig gis/de lnga bsngo ba'i mi rigs kyi/de'i bka' nyan na/bu tsha rgyud du bde bar 'gyur ro//zhes gsol
391b7(mdo sde): pi dang /phyir blon po de la khros nas gros mnyan to//de nas blon po de yang mi dga' nas/'di snyam du bsams so//rgyal pos chos ma yin pa dang /mi rigs pa byas pas bdag gis
392a1(mdo sde): phan pa'i glos btab na//khros te ma nyan to//rgyal po 'di la ni 'bangs thams cad kyang mi dga' bas/med par bya'o snyam pasams nas/gros byas pa
392a2(mdo sde): las gsang shor nas/rgyal pos dmag bzlog ste 'dzin tu bcug go//blon po des kyang 'phrigs nas/rta mgyogs pa la zhon te bris so//dmag gi dpung gis phye bzhin
392a3(mdo sde): bdas nas slebs pa dang /blon po de 'phong skyen pa zhig pas/'phral du mi bcwa brgyad mangs 'phangs ste bsad do//de nas snyegs ma yang skegs ma nus pas/blon po
392a4(mdo sde): de yang mig 'byed kyi yul du phyin te/rgyal po mig 'byed la phyag 'tshal nas gtam byas te/rgyal po dga' bas de'i blon por bcug go//de nas rgyal po de bka' mi
392a5(mdo sde): nyan no zhes gsol nas/blon po rnams la rgyal po de nga dbang po la ma gtogs sam zhes dris no//de yang rgyal po mnga'o zhes gsol to//de nas blon po des dpung gi
392a6(mdo sde): tshogs bsdus te/rgyal po de dbab par gsol pa dang /rgyal pos kyang de bzhin du gnang ngo //de nas dpung gi tshogs mchog rnams bsdus te/bA la dra bar na'i
392a7(mdo sde): yul du 'dong ngo zhes 'gro ba'i zhag dus phog go//de'i tshe rgyal po des kyang /dpung gi tshogs bdag gi yul du 'ong ngo zhes thos nas rab tu mi dga' ste/sems khong du
392b1(mdo sde): chung nas/ci bya ba'i gtol med do//gaus dri ma can bgos nas myun khang du zhugas+ho//de'i rgyu yul de na/bram ze ma rungs pa zhig pa des/rgyal po la khyod ci mi dgra' na/'di//
392b2(mdo sde): ltar mya ngan byed ces dris pa dang /rgyal pos smras pa/khyod ma thos sam//kho bo'i blon po lo dA ra bros pa/rgyal po mig 'byed kyi yul du 'ongs nas/phyir kho bo'i yul du
392b3(mdo sde): dmago 'dren no zhes zer ba bdag mi dga'o//gal te dmag drangs nas/bdag cag kyang med par 'gyu ro zhes smras pa dang /bram zes smras pa/blon po rnams sdus shig dang /

392b5(mdo sde): pa byed do zhes thos kyis/yul 'di na bram ze long ba zhig yod pa de/rgyal po de la mig ya cig skyong du btang ngo //dgal te mig byin na dmag kyang mi 'dren par 'gyur ro zhes
392b6(mdo sde): bgos ste/rgyal po lnga gsol pa dang /rgyal pos kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras na bri ze long ba btang//khri ze long ba 'ongs nas/rgyal pos long ba la 'di skad ces smra so//khro bo khyod la
392b7(mdo sde): bsgrub du gsol ba zhig yod kyis//khyod kyis bya dgos so zhes bsgo ba dang /bram ze long bas smras pa/bdag mig gnyis ka mdongs na/ji srid bsgrub tu nus shes goso
393a1(mdo sde): to/rgyal pos bsgo ba/rgyal po mig 'byed dpung gi tshogs bshams ste/'dir 'ongs pas/khro bo ni bzhon pas/'bros kyang thar na/khyod mig med par gar/
393a2(mdo sde): bros/rgyal po de sbyin pa gtong ba la pha rol gyi yid dang mi 'gol bar gtong ngo zhes brag gis/khyod song la de'i mig skyongs shig dang gal te ster na dmag kyang mi 'ong
393a3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur gyis/khyod mig slong du song shig ces bsgo ba dang /bram zes bdag mig mi mthong na/ji ltar mchi zhes gsol to//rgyal pos bsgo ba khyod song shig dang /

393a5(mdo sde): mig 'byed kyi yul du ltas ngan rnams pa sna tshogs byung ngo //'di lta ste gonam grum pa dang /gnam lcags 'bab pa dang /skar ma ltung ba dang /nam rmus pa dang /gnam
393a6(mdo sde): lcags bab nas sa kun gas pa dang /bye rnams na mkha' la ngu bi'i skad 'byin cing sa la ltung ba dang /sang ge dang stag dang /phar spyod dag snying rje ba'i skad 'byed cing /

393b1(mdo sde): skad chen por 'di skad ces smra go//bdag ni yul gzhan nus 'dir mchis ste/rgyal po khyod kyi yon tan kun tu grags pa ni/slong pa 'ongs na ci yang gtong ste/slong ba'i yi dang mi

393b3(mdo sde): lam na ngal bar ma gar tam/nyon mongs sam/bde bar 'ongs sam zhes spro ba'i tshig smras nas/rgyul srid dom/rin po che 'am/rta'am/theg pa 'am/gos sam//
393b4(mdo sde): bza' ba 'am/btung ba 'am/nad kyi rkyen rtsi 'am/ci dang ci dgos pa slongs shig dang /de dang de dag tshig par sbyin no zhes smras pa dang /bram zes smras pa/phyi rol gyi
393b5(mdo sde): zang zing byin pas ni/bsod nams kyi dam par mi 'gyur gyi/nang gi sbyin pa byas na 'bras bu cha ste/bdag mig stor nas yun ring du lon pas/rtog tu mdongs shing
393b6(mdo sde): 'thom por gyur gyi gang bdag ni rgyal po'i spyan 'tshal lo zhes smraso//de skad ces smras pa la/rgyal po rab tu dga' nas/bram ze la khyod mig 'dod na sbyin no zhes
393b7(mdo sde): badro'o//bram zes smras pa/rgyal pos 'dag la stsal na/nam stsol ces smras pa dang /da ste zhag bdun na mig sbyin no zhes bsgo nas/dril bsgrubs ste/rgyal po
394a1(mdo sde): brgyad khwa bzhi stod yang sbran to//rgyal po mig 'byed de ste zhag bdun na/bram ze la mig gi sbyin pa byed kyis/lta 'dud pa rnams thams cang

394a3(mdo sde): blon po dang chas ste/rgyal po'i thang du lhags nas/lto ba sa la phab ste mchi ma blags nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bdag cag 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad rgyal po la

394a5(mdo sde): rdebs shing sa la kha sbub du nyal nas/bram ze mi gcig gi slad du/bdag cag kun ma spangs shik+ki ces gsol nas/tshong nges 'deb so//rgyal bu lnga brgya'i rnams kyang

394b1(mdo sde): mgon ma mchis ste/dpud gnyen med par 'gyur ro zhes gsol pa dang /rgyal blos rgyal phran dang /blon po dang /btsun mo dang /rgyal nu rnams la 'di skad ces bsgo'o//dran rtsa

394b6(mdo sde): gcod cing gnod par byed do//der yang lus dang mig grangs med pa zhig chud gzan ne/gal te lhur skyes na yang ring por mi thub skye/mdor na khams gsum gyi rgyud drug tu 'dod
394b7(mdo sde): chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi rdul phra mo snyed kyi lus chud zos ni/lan 'ga' yang sbyin po ma byas ste/sangs rgyas kyi byang chub btsal ma myong ngo //shin tu bcog cing

395b7(mdo sde): ba'i'adis rnam par sprin po'i lan ci zhig 'dod/byang chub sems dpes smras pa/bdud kyi rgyal po 'am/tshangs pa 'am/brgya byin nam/rgyal chen bzhi'am/'khor los sbyor
396a1(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal po la sogs ste/khams gsum gyi bde ba 'dod pa ma yin gyi/bsod nams 'dis mngon par byang chub nas/sems can thams cad mya ngan
396a2(mdo sde): 'dar ba'i bde ba la dgod pa'i phyi ro//brgya byin gyis yang smras pa/'di ltar mig phyung ba 'di rab tu sdug bsngal bar gyur na/'gyod pa 'am/khro ba'i sems ma byung ngam

396a6(mdo sde): bas/de'i tshe na lha dang mi thams cad rab tu dga' zhing mgu rangs par gyur to//de nas rgyal pos bram ze la bsgo ba ngas mig byin pas khyod kyang mthong bar gyur kyis nam
396a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas pa na yang /khyod la chos kyi mig sbyin par bya'o//rin po che 'di dag kyang khyer la phyir song shig ces bsgo'o//bram ze mig dang /rin po che thob nas phyir chas te//
396b1(mdo sde): yul du phyin pa dang /rgyal po nyid kyis kyang bsu nas/phrad ma thag tu mig thob bam zhes dris so//bram zes smras pa/mig kyang thab nas bdag kyang 'di ltar mthong ba gyur to//rgyal pos smras pa 'o na/
